original: 'du ba yod pas ni 'dus byas 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du ba yod pas ni 'dus byas 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When there is a coming together, there is an increase in conditioned things.

original: 'du ba dang bral bas ni 'phel ba med do //
analyzed: 'du ba dang bral bas ni 'phel ba med do //
translated: When there is no coming together, there is no increase.

original: rgyu rkyen dang ldan pas ni 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen dang ldan pas ni 'du byed 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When there are causes and conditions, there is an increase in formations.

original: rgyu rkyen dang mi ldan pas ni 'phel ba med do //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen dang mi ldan pas ni 'phel ba med do //
translated: When there are no causes and conditions, there is no increase.

original: de lta bas na bdag gis de lta bu 'dus byas nyes pa mang po'i skyon can shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na bdag gis de lta bu 'dus byas nyes pa mang po'i skyon can shes par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, I should understand that conditioned things have the fault of many problems.

original: 'du ba dang / rgyu rkyen dang ldan pa 'di dag rgyun gcad par @150a *//
analyzed: 'du ba dang / rgyu rkyen dang ldan pa 'di dag rgyun gcad par @150a *//
translated: I should cut off the continuity of those things that have a coming together and have causes and conditions.

original: bya'o // sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed rnams shin tu zhi ba'ang mngon du mi bya'o zhes te /
analyzed: bya'o // sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed rnams shin tu zhi ba'ang mngon du mi bya'o zhes te /
translated: But I should not manifest the complete pacification of formations in order to ripen beings.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: de de ltar 'du byed kyi rnam pa de ltar nyes pa mang po'i skyon can /
analyzed: de de ltar 'du byed kyi rnam pa de ltar nyes pa mang po'i skyon can /
translated: In that way, formations have the fault of many problems.

original: snying po dang / rang bzhin med pa /
analyzed: snying po dang / rang bzhin med pa /
translated: They are without essence and without nature.

original: skye ba med pa /
analyzed: skye ba med pa /
translated: They are unborn.

original: 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu rtog pa dang / snying rje chen por rab tu sgrub pa dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong bas chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon sum zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu rtog pa dang / snying rje chen por rab tu sgrub pa dang / sems can yongs su mi gtong bas chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon sum zhes bya ba /
translated: He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the three times, and he has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the Dharma-element and the perfection of wisdom.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and skill in means.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa snang ba'i tshul du mngon sum du 'gyur ro //🔽de de lta bu ye shes dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas snang bar gyur nas kyang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa snang ba'i tshul du mngon sum du 'gyur ro // de de lta bu ye shes dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas snang bar gyur nas kyang /
translated: He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of non-rejection.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of own-nature.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of other-nature.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su sdud pa'i rkyen nye bar gsog cing yang dag par sdud do //🔽'dus byas dang 'grogs par yang mi gnas so //🔽'du byed rnams rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'ang rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su sdud pa'i rkyen nye bar gsog cing yang dag par sdud do // 'dus byas dang 'grogs par yang mi gnas so // 'du byed rnams rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'ang rab tu rtog go /
translated: He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of own-nature and other-nature.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of all dharmas.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of own-marks.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of non-existence.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of existence.

original: 'on kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma rdzogs pa'i phyir de la mi gnas te /
analyzed: 'on kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma rdzogs pa'i phyir de la mi gnas te /
translated: He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of non-existence and existence.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the limited.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the unlimited and the limited.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of the past.🔽He has the direct realization of the non-differentiation of the perfection of wisdom and the emptiness of

original: de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: When he is on this bhūmi, the bodhisattva

original: 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa stong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: generates the samādhi called “the emptiness of engagement.”

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 'du ba stong pa nyid dang / mngon par sgrub pa stong pa @150b nyid dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 'du ba stong pa nyid dang / mngon par sgrub pa stong pa @150b nyid dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The samādhi called “the emptiness of nature,” the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of the great, the emptiness of the composite, the emptiness of accomplishment, the emptiness of correct discernment,

original: ltos pa stong pa nyid dang / tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ltos pa stong pa nyid dang / tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: the emptiness of dependence, and the emptiness of difference and non-difference are generated.

original: de dag la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Ten hundred thousand samādhis such as these, which are the doors of emptiness, are actualized.

original: de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, ten thousand doors of the concentration of signlessness and ten thousand doors of the concentration of wishlessness become manifest.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de phyir zhing mi phyed pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob bo //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de phyir zhing mi phyed pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob bo //
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, the Manifest, attains the perfection of an undivided intention.

original: nges pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa dang / zab pa'i bsam pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam pa dang / dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa dang /
analyzed: nges pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa dang / zab pa'i bsam pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam pa dang / dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa dang /
translated: He attains the perfection of a definite intention, a virtuous intention, a profound intention, an irreversible intention, an uninterrupted intention, a stainless intention, an infinite intention,

original: ye shes la mngon par mos pa'i bsam pa dang / thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob ste /
analyzed: ye shes la mngon par mos pa'i bsam pa dang / thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob ste /
translated: an intention that is devoted to wisdom, and an intention that is endowed with means and insight.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa 'di bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa 'di bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin /
translated: These ten attitudes of the bodhisattva are in accord with the enlightenment of the Tathagata.

original: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog pa yin /
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog pa yin /
translated: They are irreversible in the face of all adversaries.

original: ye shes kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol ba yin /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol ba yin /
translated: They are intent on the stage of wisdom.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las rnam par log pa yin /🔽sangs rgyas kyi ye @151a *//
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las rnam par log pa yin / sangs rgyas kyi ye @151a *//
translated: They are turned away from the stages of the disciples and the solitary sages.

original: shes mngon du bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin /
analyzed: shes mngon du bya ba la shin tu nges pa yin /
translated: They are certain to realize the wisdom of the Buddha.

original: bdud dang nyon mongs pa kun nas rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs pa kun nas rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: They are unassailable by any of the activities of Mara or the afflictions.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba la shin tu gnas pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba la shin tu gnas pa yin /
translated: They are well established in the light of the bodhisattvas.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos yang dag par spyad pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos yang dag par spyad pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin /
translated: They have cultivated the practice of the dharmas of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: thabs dang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par dpyad pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par dpyad pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are endowed with the investigation of means, insight, and wisdom.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang rnam par 'dres pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang rnam par 'dres pa yin /
translated: He is thoroughly mixed with the accomplishment of the factors of awakening.

original: de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: “When he is on this Manifest bodhisattva bhūmi,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i shas che ba yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i shas che ba yin /
translated: he is mostly abiding in the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos de dag la tshul bzhin du mthun par byed cing mi mthun par mi byed pas /
analyzed: chos de dag la tshul bzhin du mthun par byed cing mi mthun par mi byed pas /
translated: He is in accord with those dharmas and not in discord.

original: mthun pa'i bzod pa gsum pa rab tu rno ba rab tu skyes pa yin /
analyzed: mthun pa'i bzod pa gsum pa rab tu rno ba rab tu skyes pa yin /
translated: He has the third concordant patience, which is very sharp and very arisen.

original: de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar de byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: “When he is on this Manifest bodhisattva bhūmi,

original: de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas mang po snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: through the power of his vast view and his prayers many buddhas appear to him.

original: lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /
analyzed: lta ba rgya chen po dang / smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po dang /
translated: Through the power of their vast view and their prayers, they will see many hundreds of buddhas, many thousands of buddhas, many hundreds of thousands of buddhas, many millions of buddhas, many tens of millions of buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas khrag khrig @151b brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas khrag khrig @151b brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: many billions of buddhas, many tens of billions of buddhas, many trillions of buddhas, and many quintillions of buddhas.

original: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas /
analyzed: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas /
translated: Having seen those tathāgatas, those arhats, those samyaksaṃbuddhas,

original: bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do //🔽bkur sti byed do //🔽bsti stang byed do //
analyzed: bsam pa rgya chen pos rim gro byed do // bkur sti byed do // bsti stang byed do //
translated: they will serve them with a vast attitude.🔽They will honor them,🔽revere them,

original: mchod pa byed do //
analyzed: mchod pa byed do //
translated: and make offerings to them.

original: na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
analyzed: na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dag kyang 'bul zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
translated: They offer them clothing, alms, bedding, medicine for curing the sick, and all the necessities of life.

original: dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi tshogs rnams la yang yang dag par mchod pa byed de /
translated: They make offerings to the Saṅgha and

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: dedicate all those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing rim gro dang / bkur stis nan tan du chos nyan cing len to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing rim gro dang / bkur stis nan tan du chos nyan cing len to //
translated: They serve those tathāgatas, those worthy ones, those perfectly awakened ones, and with respect and reverence they listen to the Dharma and take it up.🔽They take it up, and having taken it up, they practice it correctly.

original: 'dzin to // thos nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed do //
analyzed: 'dzin to // thos nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu brtson par byed do //
translated: They practice it correctly, and having practiced it correctly, they attain the illumination of wisdom and knowledge.

original: nan tan gyis yongs su 'dzin pas de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pa yin /🔽de ltar de byang chub sems @152a *//
analyzed: nan tan gyis yongs su 'dzin pas de sngon pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod rab tu thob pa yin / de ltar de byang chub sems @152a *//
translated: and by maintaining it with effort, he attains the Tathāgata’s treasure of the Dharma even more than before.

original: dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
analyzed: dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i tshe / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
translated: “Thus, when the bodhisattva is on this Manifest bodhisattva bhūmi,🔽his roots of goodness become purified, refined, and radiant in many eons, in many hundreds of eons, in many thousands of eons, in many hundreds of thousands of eons, in many millions of eons, in many tens of millions of eons, in many billions of eons, in many tens of billions of eons, in many trillions of eons, and in many quintillions of eons.

original: bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang; bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar sngon pas kyang ches byang ba dang; ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas so //
analyzed: bskal pa khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya phrag du ma dang; bskal pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar sngon pas kyang ches byang ba dang; ches 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas so //
translated: “He is born in the world as a great precious one, a great precious human being, and he becomes a great precious human being.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid beed'uryas btab na sngon pas kyang shin tu 'tsher la 'od gsal zhing dvangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na / gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid beed'uryas btab na sngon pas kyang shin tu 'tsher la 'od gsal zhing dvangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, when that very refined gold is touched by beryl, it becomes even more radiant, luminous, and clear.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang shes rab dang ye shes kyis shin tu brtags pas sngon pas kyang shin tu byang la 'od gsal zhing dvangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang shes rab dang ye shes kyis shin tu brtags pas sngon pas kyang shin tu byang la 'od gsal zhing dvangs pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, the roots of virtue of the bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi called Luminous are even more purified by the examination with wisdom and knowledge, and they become even more radiant, luminous, and clear.

original: phyi phyir zhing yang rab tu zhi bas mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi phyir zhing yang rab tu zhi bas mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They become increasingly unassailable by the peace of the śrāvakas.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / zla ba'i 'od ni sems can gyi lus kyang sim par byed la /
analyzed: dper na / zla ba'i 'od ni sems can gyi lus kyang sim par byed la /
translated: For example, the light of the moon refreshes the bodies of sentient beings

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor @152b chen po bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor @152b chen po bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: and is unassailable by the four great wind maṇḍalas.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
translated: In the same way, the roots of virtue of the bodhisattva

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang sems can du ma'i bsam pa'i nyon mongs pa 'bar ba yang zhi zhing sim par byed la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum 'di la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang sems can du ma'i bsam pa'i nyon mongs pa 'bar ba yang zhi zhing sim par byed la /
translated: great being who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, Luminous, are even more purified, and they pacify and soothe the burning afflictions of the thoughts of many beings.

original: bdud kyi lam gyi rgyud bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: bdud kyi lam gyi rgyud bzhis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: He is not overcome by the fourfold continuity of the path of Māra.

original: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
translated: From among the ten perfections, the perfection of wisdom is predominant,

original: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: and the other perfections are not accomplished fully and completely.

original: kye ;rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye ;rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon sum zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the bodhisattva bhūmi called Luminous.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o //
translated: It is the sixth bodhisattva bhūmi.

original: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar 'gyur te /
translated: The bodhisattvas who are on this bhūmi mostly become Śakra, king of the gods.

original: sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal zhi bar bya ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal zhi bar bya ba la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin /
translated: They are skilled and powerful in pacifying the excessive pride of all sentient beings.

original: nyan pa thams cad kyi yongs su dri bas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: nyan pa thams cad kyi yongs su dri bas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: They are unassailable by any questions.

original: de sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'am /
translated: Whatever roots of virtue they create, whether through generosity,

original: ngag snyan pa'am /
analyzed: ngag snyan pa'am /
translated: pleasant words,🔽fulfilling goals,

original: don bsgrub pa'am /🔽don mthun pa sa dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
analyzed: don bsgrub pa'am / don mthun pa sa dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
translated: or consistency between words and deeds,

original: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /🔽gtso bor 'gyur /🔽thu bor 'gyur /🔽phul du 'gyur /🔽dam par 'gyur /🔽bla na med par 'gyur /🔽'dren par 'gyur /
analyzed: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur / gtso bor 'gyur / thu bor 'gyur / phul du 'gyur / dam par 'gyur / bla na med par 'gyur / 'dren par 'gyur /
translated: they do so with the thought, ‘How can I become supreme among all sentient beings?

original: yongs su 'dren par @153a *//🔽'gyur ba nas /🔽thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
analyzed: yongs su 'dren par @153a *//🔽'gyur ba nas /🔽thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
translated: How can I become the best, the foremost, the highest, the most excellent, the unsurpassed, the guide, the leader, the one who goes first, the one who goes on the right, the one who goes in front, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes last, the one who goes in the rear, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle, the one who goes in the front, the one who goes in the back, the one who goes in the middle

original: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
translated: They are never separate from keeping in mind the Buddha, keeping in mind the Dharma, keeping in mind the Saṅgha, keeping in mind the bodhisattvas, keeping in mind the bodhisattva activities, keeping in mind the bodhisattva levels,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
translated: keeping in mind the perfections, keeping in mind the powers, keeping in mind the fearlessnesses, keeping in mind the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
translated: up to keeping in mind omniscient wisdom endowed with all supreme aspects.

original: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
analyzed: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin khrag khrig brgya stong rab tu 'thob cing de dag la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / sangs rgyas khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang /
translated: If they wish, in an instant, a brief moment, a short second, they can attain and rest in as many samādhis as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion world systems. They can see as many buddhas as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion world systems. They can understand the blessings of those buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brgya stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong skyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig brgya stong du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig brgya stong snang bar bya ba dang / sems can khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
translated: They can shake as many world systems as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion world systems. They can illuminate as many world systems as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion world systems. They can ripen as many beings as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion world systems.

original: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / @153b phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang /
analyzed: bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / @153b phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo khrag khrig brgya stong rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su bstan pa dang /
translated: They will remain for a hundred thousand quintillion eons, and they will enter into a hundred thousand quintillion eons of the past and the future. They will open a hundred thousand quintillion Dharma doors, and they will manifest a hundred thousand quintillion bodies.

original: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
analyzed: lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor khrag khrig brgya stong yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
translated: In each of those bodies they will manifest a retinue of a hundred thousand quintillion bodhisattvas.

original: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
analyzed: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
translated: “Beyond that, bodhisattvas who have the power of prayer will manifest through the particularities of their prayers.

original: de dag gi lus sam /
analyzed: de dag gi lus sam /
translated: Their bodies,🔽their light,

original: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
analyzed: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
translated: their miracles,🔽their eyes,

original: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
analyzed: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
translated: their range,🔽their voices,

original: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
analyzed: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
translated: their conduct,

original: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
analyzed: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
translated: their ornaments,🔽and their blessings will be beyond measure.

original: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
analyzed: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to count them even for many eons, many hundreds of eons, many thousands of eons, many hundreds of thousands of eons, many millions of eons, many billions of eons, many trillions of eons.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajra garbha, in order to analyze and teach the meaning of this stage, recited these verses:

original: mkhas pas lam gyi spyod pa lnga por yongs rdzogs nas //
analyzed: mkhas pas lam gyi spyod pa lnga por yongs rdzogs nas //
translated: “Having perfected the five courses of conduct,🔽The wise ones, with knowledge of the way things are, enter the second stage,

original: chos rnams mtshan med mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang // ma byung snga nas yongs su zhi zhing spros med pa //🔽yongs su sgom @154a *//
analyzed: chos rnams mtshan med mtshan nyid med dang ma skyes dang // ma byung snga nas yongs su zhi zhing spros med pa // yongs su sgom @154a *//
translated: Which is called the luminous, because of the light of Dharma.🔽“The bodhisattvas, seeing the light of the Dharma,

original: pas ye shes blo can drug pa gnon //
analyzed: pas ye shes blo can drug pa gnon //
translated: Are filled with joy, thinking of the buddhas and the teachings.

original: chos rnams dben zhing len med rnam par rtog med dang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis kyi dngos las rnam grol bas //
analyzed: chos rnams dben zhing len med rnam par rtog med dang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis kyi dngos las rnam grol bas //
translated: And are liberated from the two realities, which are like illusions.

original: chos kyi tshul la 'gal med rjes su mthun byed cing //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul la 'gal med rjes su mthun byed cing //
translated: They are in harmony with the way of the Dharma, which is free of contradiction,

original: ye shes ldan pa'i dam pa drug pa yongs su gnon //
analyzed: ye shes ldan pa'i dam pa drug pa yongs su gnon //
translated: And they master the sixth stage, that of The Manifest.

original: mthun pa rno la gnas shing ye shes stobs ldan pa //
analyzed: mthun pa rno la gnas shing ye shes stobs ldan pa //
translated: They are in harmony with the sharp faculties and have the power of wisdom.

original: 'jig rten kun gyi 'byung dang 'jig la rab tu rtog /
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi 'byung dang 'jig la rab tu rtog /
translated: They understand the origin and destruction of the entire world.

original: gti mug mun pas 'gro ba 'byung ba kun tu bskyed //
analyzed: gti mug mun pas 'gro ba 'byung ba kun tu bskyed //
translated: The darkness of delusion produces all the worlds of beings.

original: gti mug de nyid bral bas 'byung ba med pa yin //
analyzed: gti mug de nyid bral bas 'byung ba med pa yin //
translated: When one is free of that delusion, there is no origin.

original: rkyen gyi rnam pa don dam stong par rnam pa 'byed //
analyzed: rkyen gyi rnam pa don dam stong par rnam pa 'byed //
translated: They discern the ultimate emptiness of the aspects of conditions.

original: bya ba mi 'gal rgyu rkyen byed pa mnyam par shes //
analyzed: bya ba mi 'gal rgyu rkyen byed pa mnyam par shes //
translated: They know that the activity is not contradictory and that the causes and conditions are equal.

original: yang dag ji bzhin byed pa med par las shes nas //
analyzed: yang dag ji bzhin byed pa med par las shes nas //
translated: They know that the action is not real and that there is no agent.

original: 'dus byas sprin sdug lta bur byed pa med par shes //
analyzed: 'dus byas sprin sdug lta bur byed pa med par shes //
translated: They know that conditioned phenomena are like beautiful clouds, which are without an agent.

original: bden pa mi shes de ni yang dag ma rig pa //
analyzed: bden pa mi shes de ni yang dag ma rig pa //
translated: Not knowing the truth is the absence of true knowledge.

original: las ni sems kyi stobs kyis mgo rmongs byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: las ni sems kyi stobs kyis mgo rmongs byung bar 'gyur //
translated: The function of mind is to create confusion.

original: sems la rten te lhan cig byung ba ming dang gzugs //
analyzed: sems la rten te lhan cig byung ba ming dang gzugs //
translated: Name and form arise together, based on mind.

original: de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po'i bar du 'byung //
analyzed: de ltar sdug bsngal phung po chen po'i bar du 'byung //
translated: In this way, the great mass of suffering comes to be.

original: khams gsum sems kyi rgyu las byung ba der 'jug ste //
analyzed: khams gsum sems kyi rgyu las byung ba der 'jug ste //
translated: The three realms arise from the cause of mind.

original: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'di dag sems gcig rten //
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'di dag sems gcig rten //
translated: The twelve links of existence are based on a single mind.

original: 'dod chags skyes pa de las sems su brjod pa yin //
analyzed: 'dod chags skyes pa de las sems su brjod pa yin //
translated: When desire arises, it is called mind.

original: de bzhin srid pa'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin srid pa'i dngos po sems kyi rnam pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the things of existence are the manifestations of mind.

original: ma rig bya ba @154b gnyis byed rmongs bya'i dngos po la //
analyzed: ma rig bya ba @154b gnyis byed rmongs bya'i dngos po la //
translated: Ignorance performs two functions: it causes confusion and

original: rmongs par byas shing de nas sems pa'i rgyu yang 'byin //
analyzed: rmongs par byas shing de nas sems pa'i rgyu yang 'byin //
translated: it creates the cause for the mind to arise.

original: de bzhin rga ba phung po gzhig bya 'jig byed par //
analyzed: de bzhin rga ba phung po gzhig bya 'jig byed par //
translated: Likewise, aging destroys the aggregates.

original: de las sdug bsngal ming thogs thams cad mi zad 'byung //🔽ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa min //
analyzed: de las sdug bsngal ming thogs thams cad mi zad 'byung // ma rig rkyen gyis chad par 'gyur ba yod pa min //
translated: From that, all the sufferings that are named arise without end.🔽Ignorance is not cut off by conditions.

original: rnam par chad cing rgyu rkyen bral bas yod pa 'gag /
analyzed: rnam par chad cing rgyu rkyen bral bas yod pa 'gag /
translated: It is cut off by the absence of conditions.

original: gti mug sred pa nyer len nyon mongs lam yin te //
analyzed: gti mug sred pa nyer len nyon mongs lam yin te //
translated: Ignorance, craving, and grasping are the afflictions on the path.

original: las dang srid pa sems pa lhag ma sdug bsngal yin //
analyzed: las dang srid pa sems pa lhag ma sdug bsngal yin //
translated: Action, becoming, and intention are the remaining sufferings.

original: gti mug skye mched bar du 'dus byas sdug bsngal te //
analyzed: gti mug skye mched bar du 'dus byas sdug bsngal te //
translated: From ignorance up to the sense bases is the suffering of conditioned existence.

original: reg dang tshor ba de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin //
analyzed: reg dang tshor ba de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin //
translated: Contact and feeling are the suffering of suffering.

original: yan lag lhag mar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnam 'phel ba //
analyzed: yan lag lhag mar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnam 'phel ba //
translated: The remaining links are the increase of suffering.

original: bdag med shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po 'chad par 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag med shes pas sdug bsngal gsum po 'chad par 'gyur //
translated: Through knowing selflessness, the three sufferings are eliminated.

original: mun pa sems dang 'dus byas 'di ni sngon bltas yin //
analyzed: mun pa sems dang 'dus byas 'di ni sngon bltas yin //
translated: The darkness of the mind and the conditioned are seen in the past.

original: rnam par shes nas tshor ba'i rgyud du da ltar byung //
analyzed: rnam par shes nas tshor ba'i rgyud du da ltar byung //
translated: Consciousness and feeling are present in the continuum.

original: sred dang srid par sdug bsngal 'byung ba phyi ma'i mtha'//
analyzed: sred dang srid par sdug bsngal 'byung ba phyi ma'i mtha'//
translated: Craving and becoming are the future suffering of origination.

original: 'gags shing zad pa de dag lta ba chad pa yin //
analyzed: 'gags shing zad pa de dag lta ba chad pa yin //
translated: The cessation and exhaustion of those is the view of annihilation.

original: gti mug rkyen gyis de dag rnam par 'brel pa 'byung //
analyzed: gti mug rkyen gyis de dag rnam par 'brel pa 'byung //
translated: Through the condition of ignorance, they arise in connection.

original: zad pas byang chub rkyen rnams rnam par 'brel pa yin //
analyzed: zad pas byang chub rkyen rnams rnam par 'brel pa yin //
translated: Through exhaustion, awakening is the connection of conditions.

original: rgyu las rgyu 'byung med na rgyu yi rgyun chad 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu las rgyu 'byung med na rgyu yi rgyun chad 'gyur //
translated: From cause arises cause; without it, the continuum of cause is severed.

original: bde phan shes ldan rang bzhin stong pa de ltar rtog /
analyzed: bde phan shes ldan rang bzhin stong pa de ltar rtog /
translated: The wise should understand that happiness and suffering are empty by nature.

original: rgyud du mthun pa gti mug mun pas byung ba yin //
analyzed: rgyud du mthun pa gti mug mun pas byung ba yin //
translated: The continuity of concordant conditions arises from the darkness of ignorance.

original: mi mthun bzlog pa gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mi mthun bzlog pa gti mug zad pas mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: The reversal of discordant conditions does not arise from the exhaustion of ignorance.

original: @155a *// zad pa'i rkyen dang de dag yod dang med pa las //
analyzed: @155a *// zad pa'i rkyen dang de dag yod dang med pa las //
translated: From the conditions of exhaustion, their existence and nonexistence,

original: gnas pa med blo rnam pa bcur ni de ltar rtog /
analyzed: gnas pa med blo rnam pa bcur ni de ltar rtog /
translated: The mind that is not located is understood to be of ten kinds.🔽The links of existence, the boundary, the single mind, concordant activity,🔽Not being intentional, the three continuums, following, the past limit,🔽The three sufferings, arising from causes, birth and destruction,

original: srid pa'i yan lag mtshams dang sems gcig las mthun dang // ched du mi byed rgyud gsum rjes 'brang sngon mtha' dang // sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus byung skye dang 'jig pa dang // srid pa'i mthar phyin zad dang rkyen gyi lugs mthun par /
analyzed: srid pa'i yan lag mtshams dang sems gcig las mthun dang // ched du mi byed rgyud gsum rjes 'brang sngon mtha' dang // sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyus byung skye dang 'jig pa dang // srid pa'i mthar phyin zad dang rkyen gyi lugs mthun par /
translated: The end of existence, exhaustion, and the order of conditions—

original: ;de ltar rten 'brel 'byung la yang dag 'jug byed pas //
analyzed: ;de ltar rten 'brel 'byung la yang dag 'jug byed pas //
translated: In that way, one who engages in the arising of dependent origination

original: sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tshor bar byed med cing //🔽rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin mig yor 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tshor bar byed med cing // rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin mig yor 'dra ba ste //
translated: Knows that it is illusory, unreal, and without feeling,🔽Like a dream, and also like a mirage.

original: byis pa slu ba'i smig rgyu rang bzhin mchungs  mnyam pa //
analyzed: byis pa slu ba'i smig rgyu rang bzhin mchungs  mnyam pa //
translated: Like a mirage that deceives the childish, it is equal and the same.

original: de ltar bsgom pa mkhas pa'i stong pa nyid kyi sgo //
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pa mkhas pa'i stong pa nyid kyi sgo //
translated: “This is the meditation of the wise, the gateway to emptiness.

original: rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste //
analyzed: rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste //
translated: The absence of conditions is the absence of characteristics.

original: log par shes pas nam yang smon pa med pa yin //
analyzed: log par shes pas nam yang smon pa med pa yin //
translated: With wrong understanding, there is never any aspiration.

original: gzhan du sems can snying brtse'i don du skye ba 'dzin //
analyzed: gzhan du sems can snying brtse'i don du skye ba 'dzin //
translated: But elsewhere, out of love for beings, they take birth.🔽“Those who meditate on such a gateway to liberation have great power.

original: de 'dra'i rnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu che ba; ;snying brtse ba yi blo ldan sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod cing //
analyzed: de 'dra'i rnam thar sgo la sgom byed mthu che ba; ;snying brtse ba yi blo ldan sangs rgyas yon tan mngon 'dod cing //
translated: The wise, who are full of love and long for the qualities of buddhahood,

original: 'dus byas 'dus pa mkhas pa yongs su rtog byed pas //
analyzed: 'dus byas 'dus pa mkhas pa yongs su rtog byed pas //
translated: And who are skilled in the composite and the conditioned,

original: bsam pa nges shing gcig min legs dang ldan pa yin //
analyzed: bsam pa nges shing gcig min legs dang ldan pa yin //
translated: Are certain in their intentions and not single-minded, but good.

original: stong nyid ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas //
analyzed: stong nyid ting 'dzin stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su rgyas //
translated: “They expand the ten thousand gateways to the absorption of emptiness.

original: de bzhin brtan pa mtshan ma med dang smon med ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin brtan pa mtshan ma med dang smon med ldan //
translated: Likewise, the steadfast ones have the absence of characteristics and the absence of aspiration.

original: shes rab shas che mthun pa'i bzod @155b pa mchog can te //
analyzed: shes rab shas che mthun pa'i bzod @155b pa mchog can te //
translated: They have great wisdom and the supreme acceptance that accords with the Dharma.

original: mkhas pa'i rnam thar ye shes chags pa med dang ldan //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i rnam thar ye shes chags pa med dang ldan //
translated: The wise have the wisdom of liberation and are free from attachment.

original: de 'dra'i bsam pas drang srong che mang mchod byed pas //
analyzed: de 'dra'i bsam pas drang srong che mang mchod byed pas //
translated: By such thoughts, the great sages are worshipped.

original: rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la shin tu bsngags pa yin //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la shin tu bsngags pa yin //
translated: This is highly praised in the teachings of the Victorious Ones.

original: de ni sangs rgyas mdzod thob khong du chud pas na //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas mdzod thob khong du chud pas na //
translated: Having attained the treasure of the Buddha, they understand:

original: bee d'uryas btab gser mdog bzhin du sngon pas gsal //
analyzed: bee d'uryas btab gser mdog bzhin du sngon pas gsal //
translated: Like gold inlaid with lapis lazuli, they shine with blue.

original: zla ba'i 'od ni 'gro ba'i lus la sim par byed //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od ni 'gro ba'i lus la sim par byed //
translated: The light of the moon refreshes the bodies of beings,

original: rlung bzhi langs pas yongs su 'phrogs par mi nus so //
analyzed: rlung bzhi langs pas yongs su 'phrogs par mi nus so //
translated: But the four winds cannot scatter it.

original: rgyal sras 'od kyang bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das //
analyzed: rgyal sras 'od kyang bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das //
translated: The light of the Victorious One's heirs is beyond the path of Mara,

original: nyon mongs yongs su gdung dang sdug bsngal nad kyang sel //
analyzed: nyon mongs yongs su gdung dang sdug bsngal nad kyang sel //
translated: Dispelling the torment of afflictions and the sickness of suffering.

original: sa 'di phyogs su phyin pa lha yi bdag por 'gyur //
analyzed: sa 'di phyogs su phyin pa lha yi bdag por 'gyur //
translated: Having reached this ground, one becomes a lord of the gods,

original: 'phrul dga'i dam pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal sel la mkhas //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i dam pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal sel la mkhas //
translated: Skilled in dispelling the conceit of the highest in the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations.

original: ye shes lam dang ldan pa de ni ci rtsom yang //
analyzed: ye shes lam dang ldan pa de ni ci rtsom yang //
translated: Endowed with the path of wisdom, whatever they undertake

original: nyan thos lam las 'das te brtan zhing mi 'phrogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos lam las 'das te brtan zhing mi 'phrogs pa'o //
translated: Surpasses the path of the Hearers, being steadfast and unshakable.

original: bde gshegs sras po brtson 'grus ldan pa 'dod gyur na //
analyzed: bde gshegs sras po brtson 'grus ldan pa 'dod gyur na //
translated: If the heirs of the Sugatas wish to be diligent,

original: ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong tshang pa 'thob par byed //
analyzed: ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong tshang pa 'thob par byed //
translated: And they attain the full measure of a billion concentrations.

original: skad cig gcig tu phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mang po lta //
analyzed: skad cig gcig tu phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mang po lta //
translated: In a single instant they see many buddhas in the ten directions,

original: dpyid kyi nyi ma gsal zhing lhan par byed pa bzhin //
analyzed: dpyid kyi nyi ma gsal zhing lhan par byed pa bzhin //
translated: Like the shining, warming sun in the spring.

original: zab cing blta dka' phra ba ste //
analyzed: zab cing blta dka' phra ba ste //
translated: It is profound, difficult to see, and subtle,

original: nyan thos rang rgyal shes mi nus //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal shes mi nus //
translated: And cannot be known by śrāvakas or pratyekabuddhas.

original: bdag nyid che la sa drug pa //
analyzed: bdag nyid che la sa drug pa //
translated: The sixth ground, The Manifest,

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa yin //🔽mngon sum zhes ni bya ba ste //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa yin // mngon sum zhes ni bya ba ste //
translated: Is explained by the bodhisattvas, the heirs of the victors.🔽The sixth bodhisattva ground

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o ////🔽bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'o //// bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa /
translated: Is called The Manifest.

original: de nas @156a *//
analyzed: de nas @156a *//
translated: Then,

original: sna tshogs yid 'ong sprin //
analyzed: sna tshogs yid 'ong sprin //
translated: Clouds of various delightful things

original: lha tshogs mang po mkha' la gnas shing mngon par mthong //
analyzed: lha tshogs mang po mkha' la gnas shing mngon par mthong //
translated: Are seen in the sky by the hosts of gods,

original: tshig snyan rnam par rjod pa byed //
analyzed: tshig snyan rnam par rjod pa byed //
translated: And they utter sweet words.

original: dga' ba'i dam pa mchog gis yongs su rgyas //
analyzed: dga' ba'i dam pa mchog gis yongs su rgyas //
translated: They are completely filled with the highest joy.🔽They think, “How good it is!

original: dge'o don dam sems mdzad cing //
analyzed: dge'o don dam sems mdzad cing //
translated: They have the highest intention.

original: yon tan brgya dang yan lag ldan zhing dbang sgyur ba //
analyzed: yon tan brgya dang yan lag ldan zhing dbang sgyur ba //
translated: They have hundreds of qualities and are powerful.

original: mi yi punda ri ka yin //
analyzed: mi yi punda ri ka yin //
translated: They are the pundarīka lotuses of humans.

original: 'gro la phan pa'i spyod rab yang dag bshad //
analyzed: 'gro la phan pa'i spyod rab yang dag bshad //
translated: And the conduct that benefits beings is explained well.🔽You who have beautiful, supreme light,

original: yid 'ong 'od mchog ldan khyod dang // mi yi gtso bo mya ngan yongs su sel mdzad la //
analyzed: yid 'ong 'od mchog ldan khyod dang // mi yi gtso bo mya ngan yongs su sel mdzad la //
translated: And you who are the chief of humans, the one who completely removes sorrow,

original: dbang phyug chen po mkha' gnas shing //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po mkha' gnas shing //
translated: The great lord who dwells in the sky,

original: spos sprin yid 'ong dam pa mngon par 'thor //
analyzed: spos sprin yid 'ong dam pa mngon par 'thor //
translated: Spontaneously emits beautiful, supreme incense clouds.

original: tshig snyan rab tu rjod pa byed //
analyzed: tshig snyan rab tu rjod pa byed //
translated: They utter pleasant words

original: lha tshogs mang po mkha' las dgar 'gyur dbyangs sgrog cing //
analyzed: lha tshogs mang po mkha' las dgar 'gyur dbyangs sgrog cing //
translated: And the many hosts of gods in the sky sing with joy.

original: gang gis sa bstan 'di thos pa //
analyzed: gang gis sa bstan 'di thos pa //
translated: Those who hear this teaching on the levels

original: de dag thob pa bzang po thob ces zer //🔽rol mo brdung dkrol dbyangs snyan pa //
analyzed: de dag thob pa bzang po thob ces zer // rol mo brdung dkrol dbyangs snyan pa //
translated: Say, 'They have attained excellent attainment.'🔽The many hundreds of delightful sounds of musical instruments

original: brgya mang lha yi bu mos dga' bar byas //
analyzed: brgya mang lha yi bu mos dga' bar byas //
translated: Are played by the daughters of the gods.

original: bde bar gshegs dang khyod mthu yis //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs dang khyod mthu yis //
translated: Through the power of you Sugatas

original: tshig rab 'di 'dra rab tu brjod par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshig rab 'di 'dra rab tu brjod par 'gyur //
translated: They utter these kinds of words.

original: zhi dang nges spyod dam pa can //
analyzed: zhi dang nges spyod dam pa can //
translated: Those who are peaceful, of excellent, definite conduct,

original: ma dul 'dul mdzad 'jig rten kun gyis mchod byas pa //
analyzed: ma dul 'dul mdzad 'jig rten kun gyis mchod byas pa //
translated: Tame the untamed and are worshipped by the whole world.

original: 'jig rten kun las 'das pa yi; ;'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phra ba bstan //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun las 'das pa yi; ;'jig rten spyod pa shin tu phra ba bstan //
translated: “They teach the most subtle conduct in the world,

original: sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan //
analyzed: sna tshogs lus kyang rab tu bstan //
translated: And also teach various bodies.

original: lus dang lus la chos nyid phun sum tshogs shing ldan //
analyzed: lus dang lus la chos nyid phun sum tshogs shing ldan //
translated: They are endowed with the perfection of the nature of the body and the Dharma.

original: rnam dpyod zhi gnas mthus @156b bcil pas //
analyzed: rnam dpyod zhi gnas mthus @156b bcil pas //
translated: They are free of the power of analysis and śamatha.

original: dbyangs su sgrog kyang yi ge brjod mi byed //
analyzed: dbyangs su sgrog kyang yi ge brjod mi byed //
translated: They do not utter words or syllables.

original: zhing rnams brgyar yang 'dod byed cing //
analyzed: zhing rnams brgyar yang 'dod byed cing //
translated: They go to a hundred realms

original: mgon po mchod par 'os la mchod par byed //
analyzed: mgon po mchod par 'os la mchod par byed //
translated: And make offerings to the lords who are worthy of offerings.🔽They completely eliminate the perception of a self in the realms,

original: zhing rgyal bdag tu 'du shes pa; ;ye shes dbang sgyur mchog gi rab tu sel //
analyzed: zhing rgyal bdag tu 'du shes pa; ;ye shes dbang sgyur mchog gi rab tu sel //
translated: And they have the supreme mastery of wisdom.

original: sems can yongs su smin byed kyang //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin byed kyang //
translated: They ripen beings

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu med //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes rnam pa kun tu med //
translated: And do not have any perception of self or other.

original: dge ba yangs pa yang dag gsog /
analyzed: dge ba yangs pa yang dag gsog /
translated: They accumulate vast virtue

original: 'on kyang dge ba gsog la gnas pa med //🔽'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis //
analyzed: 'on kyang dge ba gsog la gnas pa med // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis //
translated: But do not abide in the accumulation of virtue.

original: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong gyur cing //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong gyur cing //
translated: They see all worlds burning with desire, anger, and ignorance,

original: 'du shes thams cad rnam spangs nas //
analyzed: 'du shes thams cad rnam spangs nas //
translated: And they abandon all perceptions.

original: snying brtse ldan par brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom //
analyzed: snying brtse ldan par brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom //
translated: They are diligent in their practice, full of compassion.

original: lha mang lha yi bu mo yis //
analyzed: lha mang lha yi bu mo yis //
translated: Many gods and goddesses

original: gsung ba'i mchog la mchod byas nas //
analyzed: gsung ba'i mchog la mchod byas nas //
translated: make offerings to the supreme speaker.

original: kun kyang mi smra dgar gyur te //
analyzed: kun kyang mi smra dgar gyur te //
translated: All of them are silent and joyful,

original: drang srong che la lta zhing gnas //
analyzed: drang srong che la lta zhing gnas //
translated: gazing at the great sage.

original: thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa //
analyzed: thar pa'i zla bas yang smras pa //
translated: Vimukticandra then said,🔽“The retinue is very pure.

original: 'khor rnams shin tu rnam par dang // sa bdun pa yi rnam pa dag /
analyzed: 'khor rnams shin tu rnam par dang // sa bdun pa yi rnam pa dag /
translated: The aspects of the seventh bhūmi

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa mdzod //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bshad pa mdzod //
translated: should be explained by the Jina’s son.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vajra garbha said,

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la de ltar sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la de ltar sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattva who has thus completed the path of the sixth bhūmi

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongs su gnon to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa yongs su gnon to //
translated: ascends to the seventh bodhisattva bhūmi.

original: de thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par bcus yongs su gnon te /
analyzed: de thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par bcus yongs su gnon te /
translated: He ascends by means of the path of accomplishment through method and wisdom, with ten special qualities:

original: bcu @157a *// gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu @157a *// gang zhe na /
translated: What are those ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la /
translated: They have minds that are well trained in the meditative absorptions of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang yang dag par gsog pa yin /
analyzed: bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yang yang dag par gsog pa yin /
translated: They also gather the great accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: bdag med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos la'ang rab tu 'jug la /
analyzed: bdag med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos la'ang rab tu 'jug la /
translated: They engage with the teachings on selflessness, the absence of living beings, and the absence of persons.

original: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa yang yongs su mi gtong ba yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa yang yongs su mi gtong ba yin /
translated: They do not abandon the accomplishment of the four immeasurables.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis shin tu mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub la /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis shin tu mtho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub la /
translated: They accomplish the perfection of the exalted state of the accumulation of merit.

original: chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med pa yin /
analyzed: chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med pa yin /
translated: They are not attached to any phenomenon.

original: khams gsum pa las dben par gyur pa'ang thob la khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang / rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: khams gsum pa las dben par gyur pa'ang thob la khams gsum pa bsdu ba dang / rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
translated: They attain the state of being secluded from the three realms, yet they accomplish the adornment of the three realms.

original: nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa 'bar ba thams cad shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ste /
translated: They completely pacify and extinguish all the blazing afflictions.

original: nye bar zhi ba yang yin la /
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba yang yin la /
translated: They are also at peace,

original: sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi bar mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i me lce rab tu zhi bar mngon par bsgrub pa'ang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
translated: and they accomplish the pacification of the flames of desire, anger, ignorance, and afflictions of all sentient beings.🔽They understand all that is existent, nonexistent, and neither existent nor nonexistent, which is like an illusion, a dream, a mirage, an echo, the moon in the water, a reflection, or a magical creation,

original: sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mi yor dang; sgra brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bur yod pa dang / med pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud @157b la; las dang bya ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mi yor dang; sgra brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bur yod pa dang / med pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa thams cad kyang khong du chud @157b la; las dang bya ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
translated: and they accomplish the immeasurable intention to distinguish between actions and deeds.🔽They have minds that are well trained in the vastness of the realms of the world, which is equal to space,

original: zhing gi tha gru nam mkha' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang ldan la; sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan kyang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: zhing gi tha gru nam mkha' dang mnyam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang ldan la; sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong zhing bsgrub pa dang / rgyan kyang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
translated: and they accomplish the purification and adornment of the buddha realms.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / chos dang / sku nam mkha' lta bur yang rab tu 'jug la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / chos dang / sku nam mkha' lta bur yang rab tu 'jug la /
translated: They penetrate the nature of all the buddhas, the Dharma, and the sky-like body.

original: gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po bsdu zhing rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po bsdu zhing rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
translated: They also manifest the gathering of forms, marks, and excellent signs.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par yang yid ches la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rang bzhin gyis zhi zhing brjod du med pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par yang yid ches la /
translated: They have confidence in the fact that the speech of the tathāgatas is naturally peaceful and endowed with the melody of the inexpressible.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par phye ba'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par phye ba'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin /
translated: They also manifest the adornment of the different aspects of the melody of all beings.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis skad cig gcig tu dus gsum thugs su chud par yang khong du chud la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis skad cig gcig tu dus gsum thugs su chud par yang khong du chud la /
translated: They understand that the blessed buddhas comprehend the three times in a single instant.

original: dus dang bskal pa'i grangs mtshan nyid tha dad pa la'ang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: dus dang bskal pa'i grangs mtshan nyid tha dad pa la'ang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa yin te /
translated: They also follow the different characteristics of the enumeration of time and eons in order to contemplate the thoughts of beings.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par 'di bcus byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa sa bdun yongs su @158a *//
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lam brtsam pa'i khyad par 'di bcus byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa sa bdun yongs su @158a *//
translated: With these ten distinctive features of the path that is accomplished through means and wisdom, the bodhisattvas have thoroughly analyzed the sixth bodhisattva ground and ascend to the seventh bodhisattva ground.

original: gnon to // kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: gnon to // kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi tshogs thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i khyad par snang bar gyur pa 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun yongs su gnon ces bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi tshogs thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i khyad par snang bar gyur pa 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun yongs su gnon ces bya ste /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva great beings, by accomplishing these distinctive features of the path that is accomplished through means and wisdom, are said to ascend to the seventh bodhisattva ground.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: The bodhisattvas who abide on the seventh bodhisattva ground in this way enter into the immeasurable realms of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba'i 'phrin las tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba'i 'phrin las tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable activity of the blessed buddhas to ripen and guide sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable worlds of the world systems.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable pure buddha realms of the blessed buddhas.

original: chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable different Dharmas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable attainment of the wisdom of the blessed buddhas.

original: bskal pa'i grangs tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: bskal pa'i grangs tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable number of eons.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus gsum thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus gsum thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable understanding of the three times of the blessed buddhas.

original: sems can gyi mos pa'i khyad par tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sems can gyi mos pa'i khyad par tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They engage in the immeasurable different aspirations of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang / sku gzugs dang / @158b sku sna tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang / sku gzugs dang / @158b sku sna tshogs ston pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They understand the limitless ways in which the blessed buddhas display their names, forms, and various bodies.

original: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They understand the limitless different aspirations and faculties of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung brjod pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung brjod pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They understand the limitless ways in which the blessed buddhas bring sentient beings to maturity through their speech.

original: sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They understand the limitless minds and conduct of sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes 'byams klas pas thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes 'byams klas pas thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They understand the limitless ways in which the blessed buddhas’ boundless wisdom is realized.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pas 'byung ba la mos pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pas 'byung ba la mos pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: They understand the limitless aspirations for liberation through the vehicle of the hearers.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa tshad med pa la 'jug cing mos par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa tshad med pa la 'jug cing mos par byed do //
translated: They understand and aspire to the limitless ways in which the blessed buddhas’ wisdom is realized through the teaching of the path.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa shin tu rdzogs par bya ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: they enter into the immeasurable perfect accomplishment of the wisdom of the pratyekabuddhas;🔽they enter into the immeasurable teachings on entering the profound wisdom of the bhagavān buddhas;

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go ;byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go ;byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba tshad med pa la 'jug go /
translated: they enter into the immeasurable teachings on the application of the bodhisattva conduct of the bodhisattvas;

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go /🔽de 'di snyam du sems te /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @159a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jug go / de 'di snyam du sems te / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @159a *//
translated: and they enter into the immeasurable teachings on the perfect accomplishment of the Mahāyāna of the bhagavān buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni de ltar tshad med pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni de ltar tshad med pa ste /
translated: “They think, ‘The domain of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas is thus immeasurable.

original: de ni bskal pa brgya phrag khrag khrig dang / bskal pa stong phrag khrag khrig dang; bskal pa brgya stong phrag khrag khrig nas de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka' ste /
analyzed: de ni bskal pa brgya phrag khrag khrig dang / bskal pa stong phrag khrag khrig dang; bskal pa brgya stong phrag khrag khrig nas de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka' ste /
translated: It is difficult to count that number of eons even in a hundred thousand quintillion eons.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul de bdag gis lhun gyis grub par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul de bdag gis lhun gyis grub par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: I will accomplish that which is the domain of the blessed buddhas through spontaneous accomplishment.🔽I will perfect it without thought and without conceptualization.’

original: rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes de de ltar shin tu brtags pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: “ In this way, with a wisdom that is thoroughly investigated and endowed with superknowledge,

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'i lam gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i ye shes la mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas pa yin /
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'i lam gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i ye shes la mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis yongs su gnas pa yin /
translated: he always and continuously applies himself to the path of the vast accumulation of wisdom that is cultivated through method and wisdom. He remains in a way that is unshakable.

original: de skad cig gcig tu yang lam mngon par bsgrub pa las ldang bar mi byed de /
analyzed: de skad cig gcig tu yang lam mngon par bsgrub pa las ldang bar mi byed de /
translated: He does not rise from the practice of the path for even a moment.

original: de 'gro yang de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin /
analyzed: de 'gro yang de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin /
translated: Even when he goes, he is practicing that kind of knowledge.

original: 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / rmi lam dag tu yang sgrib pa med cing /
analyzed: 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / rmi lam dag tu yang sgrib pa med cing /
translated: Even when he stands, sits, lies down, or dreams, he is without obscurations.

original: spyod lam thams cad la gnas kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'du shes yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin /
analyzed: spyod lam thams cad la gnas kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'du shes yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin /
translated: He is never separated from the attention of the kind of perception that is present in all his activities.

original: de'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang /
analyzed: de'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang /
translated: In each of his thoughts

original: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu @159b phyin pa bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu @159b phyin pa bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag par 'byung ngo //
