translated: In every instant of mind, they accomplish the qualities of enlightenment.

original: pha rol phyin pa bcur 'jug yongs su rdzogs par byed //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcur 'jug yongs su rdzogs par byed //
translated: They engage in and perfect the ten perfections.

original: sems skyes 'gro la yongs bsngo de ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems skyes 'gro la yongs bsngo de ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: The dedication of the arising of the mind to beings is generosity.

original: tshul khrims nyon mongs zhi ba bzod pa mi 'tshig pa //
analyzed: tshul khrims nyon mongs zhi ba bzod pa mi 'tshig pa //
translated: Morality is the pacification of the afflictions, patience is the non-abandonment of anger,

original: brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa ste //
analyzed: brtson 'grus de nas khyad par gong du rtsom pa ste //
translated: and effort is the undertaking of the special higher qualities.

original: lam las mi sgul de ni legs ldan bsam gtan no //
analyzed: lam las mi sgul de ni legs ldan bsam gtan no //
translated: Concentration is the non-distraction from the path,

original: mi skye'i bzod pa rdul med mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog /
analyzed: mi skye'i bzod pa rdul med mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog /
translated: and wisdom is the supreme non-arising patience of the dust-free wise one.

original: da dung mngon 'dod bsngo ba de yi smon lam ste //
analyzed: da dung mngon 'dod bsngo ba de yi smon lam ste //
translated: The dedication of the aspiration for the future is the prayer,🔽and the power of the unassailable is the wisdom of complete realization.

original: mi thub stobs yin shin tu rtogs pa ye shes so; ;de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan //
analyzed: mi thub stobs yin shin tu rtogs pa ye shes so; ;de ltar byang chub yon tan thams cad skad cig ldan //
translated: In this way, in a single instant, the bodhisattva possesses all the qualities of enlightenment.

original: dang por dmigs pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: dang por dmigs pas yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: In the first, the qualities are perfected through observation.

original: gnyis la dri ma bsal phyir gsum la bgegs @169b bsal bas //
analyzed: gnyis la dri ma bsal phyir gsum la bgegs @169b bsal bas //
translated: In the second, the stains are removed, and in the third, the hindrances are cleared away.

original: bzhi la lam gyis lnga la mnyam pa nyid kyis te //
analyzed: bzhi la lam gyis lnga la mnyam pa nyid kyis te //
translated: In the fourth, the path is traversed, and in the fifth, equality is attained.

original: mi skye'i snang bas mkhas pa'i drug pa rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: mi skye'i snang bas mkhas pa'i drug pa rnam par 'phel //
translated: In the sixth, the wise one increases through the light of non-arising.

original: bdun pa 'dir phyin yon tan mtha' dag kun rdzogs par //
analyzed: bdun pa 'dir phyin yon tan mtha' dag kun rdzogs par //
translated: In the seventh, all the qualities of perfection are completely perfected.

original: smon lam du ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa byed //
analyzed: smon lam du ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa byed //
translated: Here, various aspirations are accomplished.

original: ci phyir zhe na ye shes spyod pa 'dir grub pa //
analyzed: ci phyir zhe na ye shes spyod pa 'dir grub pa //
translated: Why is that? Because the conduct of wisdom is accomplished here.

original: de ni brgyad pa yan chad kun tu rnam dag 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni brgyad pa yan chad kun tu rnam dag 'gyur //
translated: That is completely pure from the eighth stage onward.

original: 'da' dka' phyin dka' ye shes mang po'i las kyis 'grub //
analyzed: 'da' dka' phyin dka' ye shes mang po'i las kyis 'grub //
translated: It is difficult to transcend and difficult to reach, accomplished through the activity of many wisdoms.

original: zhing gnyis bar mtshams ji ltar yongs su brgal dka' bzhin //
analyzed: zhing gnyis bar mtshams ji ltar yongs su brgal dka' bzhin //
translated: Just as it is difficult to cross the gap between the two fields,

original: bdun la spyod pa rgyal po chags med ji bzhin te //
analyzed: bdun la spyod pa rgyal po chags med ji bzhin te //
translated: The one on the seventh stage is like a king who is unattached.

original: lam la gnas pa yin gyi thams cad brtan ma 'das //
analyzed: lam la gnas pa yin gyi thams cad brtan ma 'das //
translated: He is on the path, but he has not passed beyond all stability.

original: brgyad pa'i ye shes sa dang gang tshe ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i ye shes sa dang gang tshe ldan gyur pa //
translated: When one possesses the wisdom of the eighth stage,

original: de tshe sems kyi yul 'das ye shes las la gnas //
analyzed: de tshe sems kyi yul 'das ye shes las la gnas //
translated: One is beyond the domain of mind and abides in the activity of wisdom.

original: tshangs pa 'gro ba lta yang mi yi bdag nyid min //
analyzed: tshangs pa 'gro ba lta yang mi yi bdag nyid min //
translated: Brahma is seen, but he is not the lord of humans.

original: de bzhin mkhas pa pad mo bzhin du mi chags spyod //
analyzed: de bzhin mkhas pa pad mo bzhin du mi chags spyod //
translated: In the same way, the wise one acts without attachment, like a lotus.

original: 'di la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu 'da'//
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa nyon mongs sna tshogs rab tu 'da'//
translated: One who abides here transcends the various afflictions.

original: de dag nyon mongs spyod med byang ba'ang thob pa min //
analyzed: de dag nyon mongs spyod med byang ba'ang thob pa min //
translated: They do not have the conduct of afflictions, but they do not attain purification.

original: lam la gnas kyang de 'dra'i nyon mongs spyod med min //
analyzed: lam la gnas kyang de 'dra'i nyon mongs spyod med min //
translated: They are on the path, but they do not have the conduct of such afflictions.

original: rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'dod de bas zad pa min //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i ye shes mngon 'dod de bas zad pa min //
translated: And so, not being exhausted, they aspire to the wisdom of the Victorious Ones.

original: 'jig rten bzo dang las gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
analyzed: 'jig rten bzo dang las gnas rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
translated: The wise ones, who are skilled in the various worldly crafts and activities,🔽who have knowledge of the treatises, who possess the powers of concentration and super-knowledge,

original: mkhas pas gtsug lag rgyus la gnas te shes byas dang // bsam gtan mngon shes stobs sgom ldan par gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: mkhas pas gtsug lag rgyus la gnas te shes byas dang // bsam gtan mngon shes stobs sgom ldan par gyur pa rnams //
translated: and who are endowed with the cultivation of the powers,

original: de bas gsal 'gyur ting 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par sgrub //
analyzed: de bas gsal 'gyur ting 'dzin sna tshogs mngon par sgrub //
translated: will become more radiant and accomplish various kinds of concentration.

original: nyan thos rang rgyal spyod las yongs @170a *//🔽su 'das pa ste //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal spyod las yongs @170a *// su 'das pa ste //
translated: They have transcended the conduct of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas

original: bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mkhas pa gnas //
analyzed: bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mkhas pa gnas //
translated: and abide in the conduct of the bodhisattvas of the seventh ground.

original: sngon chad bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ye shes kyis //
analyzed: sngon chad bsam pas yin gyi 'di la ye shes kyis //
translated: This is due to their previous intention, not to their wisdom.

original: nar son mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin no //
analyzed: nar son mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i bu bzhin no //
translated: They are like princes who have reached maturity and have power.

original: shin tu zab dang ldan pas gong du rtsom byed de //
analyzed: shin tu zab dang ldan pas gong du rtsom byed de //
translated: Endowed with the extremely profound, they engage in the higher stages,

original: 'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i sems dang ldan yang mngon par mi byed do //
translated: but even with the intention to stop, they do not manifest it.

original: ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin cing gru chen zhugs gyur pa //
analyzed: ji ltar rgya mtshor phyin cing gru chen zhugs gyur pa //
translated: It is like when one has reached the ocean and boarded a great ship,

original: chu tshul thams cad mngon gyur gru la skyon mi gyur //
analyzed: chu tshul thams cad mngon gyur gru la skyon mi gyur //
translated: And the boat does not break up, even though it is in the water.

original: de dag sngon pas thabs dang shes rab mchog dang ldan //
analyzed: de dag sngon pas thabs dang shes rab mchog dang ldan //
translated: They have the supreme method and wisdom,

original: shes dka' 'gro ba kun tu shes spyod yon tan mang //
analyzed: shes dka' 'gro ba kun tu shes spyod yon tan mang //
translated: And have the qualities of difficult-to-attain knowledge and conduct.

original: sangs rgyas bye ba mang du bsam pa dag pas mchod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba mang du bsam pa dag pas mchod //
translated: They make offerings to many millions of buddhas with pure intentions.

original: gser sbram de nyid rin chen mang pos smras pa bzhin //
analyzed: gser sbram de nyid rin chen mang pos smras pa bzhin //
translated: Just as that gold ingot is adorned with many jewels,

original: 'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog gi 'ong //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa'i mkhas pa'i shes rab mchog gi 'ong //
translated: The wisdom of the wise who are on this bhūmi is supreme.

original: sred pa'i chu rnams ji ltar nyi bzhin yongs su skem //
analyzed: sred pa'i chu rnams ji ltar nyi bzhin yongs su skem //
translated: They dry up the water of craving, just as the sun dries up water.

original: sa mchog 'di la gnas pa dbang sgyur rgyal por 'gyur //
analyzed: sa mchog 'di la gnas pa dbang sgyur rgyal por 'gyur //
translated: Those who are on this supreme bhūmi become kings with power.

original: ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod mkhas //
analyzed: ye shes dam pa'i 'bras bu ston la mthu yod mkhas //
translated: They are skilled in demonstrating the result of supreme wisdom.

original: 'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa //
analyzed: 'dod na brtson 'grus dam pa'i stobs dang ldan gyur pa //
translated: If they wish, they can have the power of supreme diligence.

original: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang bdag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshang bdag /
translated: They see the complete assembly of many quintillions of buddhas

original: phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong /
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas mthong /
translated: In all directions through being in equipoise.

original: yan chad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang med //
analyzed: yan chad smon lam yon tan mchog can tshad kyang med //
translated: And beyond that, the aspirations and qualities are immeasurable.

original: 'di ni sa mchog bdun pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni sa mchog bdun pa ste //
translated: This is the seventh supreme ground.🔽The pratyekabuddhas and the powerful ones

original: rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang // 'jig rten kun gyis shes par dka'//
analyzed: rang rgyal dbang la spyod pa dang // 'jig rten kun gyis shes par dka'//
translated: are difficult for the world to know.

original: thabs dang @170b shes rab sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: thabs dang @170b shes rab sbyor ba'o //
translated: They are the union of method and wisdom.

original: ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ring du song ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is called “Gone Afar.”

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'o ////
translated: This is the seventh bodhisattva ground.

original: bam po lnga bcu pa /
analyzed: bam po lnga bcu pa /
translated: Chapter 50

original: mkhas pa'i spyod pa de 'dra dam pa thos nas //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i spyod pa de 'dra dam pa thos nas //
translated: Having heard such sacred conduct of the wise,

original: lha yi tshogs dang lha yi dbang po kun dga'//
analyzed: lha yi tshogs dang lha yi dbang po kun dga'//
translated: the hosts of gods and the lord of gods rejoice.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan brtson pa mang po //
translated: Many bodhisattvas who strive to benefit beings

original: bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras rnams la mchod byed //🔽me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan ba dan yid 'ong //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras rnams la mchod byed // me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan ba dan yid 'ong //
translated: make offerings to the Sugatas and the bodhisattvas.🔽Garlands, banners, and beautiful flags,

original: spos dang phye ma rin chen na bza' rgyan pa //
analyzed: spos dang phye ma rin chen na bza' rgyan pa //
translated: incense, powders, precious clothes, and ornaments,

original: dbyig gis spras pa'i gdugs rab khrag khrig du ma //
analyzed: dbyig gis spras pa'i gdugs rab khrag khrig du ma //
translated: billions of parasols adorned with jewels,

original: phreng ba'i sprin gyi dam pa'i char yang mngon 'bebs //
analyzed: phreng ba'i sprin gyi dam pa'i char yang mngon 'bebs //
translated: and the excellent rain of clouds of garlands descend.

original: lha yi bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs //
analyzed: lha yi bu mos yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs //
translated: The divine maidens, with their beautiful voices,

original: du ma'i sil snyan gar gyi mchog dang ldan byas //
analyzed: du ma'i sil snyan gar gyi mchog dang ldan byas //
translated: And with many cymbals and the best of dances,

original: bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras mchod pa'i don du //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs dang rgyal sras mchod pa'i don du //
translated: For the sake of making offerings to the Sugata and the Bodhisattvas,🔽They spoke of the wonderful qualities of the Sage.

original: thub pa'i yon tan rmad du byung brjod byed; ;thams cad gzigs pa rkang gnyis khyu mchog gtso bo //
analyzed: thub pa'i yon tan rmad du byung brjod byed; ;thams cad gzigs pa rkang gnyis khyu mchog gtso bo //
translated: The Omniscient One, the supreme human, the chief of men,

original: sangs rgyas spyod yul 'gro la phan phyir ston mdzad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyod yul 'gro la phan phyir ston mdzad //
translated: The Buddha, for the sake of benefiting beings, taught the sphere of activity.

original: dbyangs sprin yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: dbyangs sprin yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'byung ba'i //
translated: From the beautiful clouds of his voice,

original: rnga dang sil snyan sna tshogs rnams la 'di byung //
analyzed: rnga dang sil snyan sna tshogs rnams la 'di byung //
translated: Various drums and cymbals arose.

original: skra yi rtse la bde gshegs brgya phrag stong snyed //
analyzed: skra yi rtse la bde gshegs brgya phrag stong snyed //
translated: On the tip of a single hair, there are thousands of Sugatas,

original: gangg'a khrag khrig bye ba'i rdul bas de mang //
analyzed: gangg'a khrag khrig bye ba'i rdul bas de mang //
translated: More numerous than the atoms in a quintillion Ganges Rivers.

original: zhing mchog dam pa mnyam pa med pa dag na //
analyzed: zhing mchog dam pa mnyam pa med pa dag na //
translated: In the supreme, excellent, incomparable fields,

original: khyu mchog rnams ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad //🔽spu gcig rtse la 'byams klas dam pa'i zhing mang //
analyzed: khyu mchog rnams ni rdul bral chos rnams ston mdzad // spu gcig rtse la 'byams klas dam pa'i zhing mang //
translated: The bulls teach the dust-free Dharma.🔽On the tip of a single hair, there are infinite, excellent fields,

original: gling bzhi du ma rgya mtsho mtsho chen kun nas //
analyzed: gling bzhi du ma rgya mtsho mtsho chen kun nas //
translated: With many continents, oceans, and great lakes.

original: khor yug bye ba de bzhin ri rab @171a *//
analyzed: khor yug bye ba de bzhin ri rab @171a *//
translated: And the surrounding ten million mountains, Sumerus,

original: thams cad // so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur //
analyzed: thams cad // so so'i tshul dang ldan par kun kyang snang gyur //
translated: And all the other features of the world, each in its place, all appeared.

original: skra yi rtse mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po //
analyzed: skra yi rtse mo de la 'gro rgyud drug po //
translated: On the tip of a hair, the six life-paths,🔽The hungry ghosts, animals, humans, hell-dwellers, gods,

original: yi dvags byol song mi dang sems dmyal lha dang; ;gnod sbyin srin po klu dang lha min mang po //
analyzed: yi dvags byol song mi dang sems dmyal lha dang; ;gnod sbyin srin po klu dang lha min mang po //
translated: Yakshas, rakshasas, nagas, and asuras,

original: sna tshogs las kyi yul la kun kyang spyod byed //
analyzed: sna tshogs las kyi yul la kun kyang spyod byed //
translated: All experiencing the results of their various actions.

original: rdul bral kun gyi zhing gi spyod yul kun tu //
analyzed: rdul bral kun gyi zhing gi spyod yul kun tu //
translated: In the field of the dust-free, in all the realms,

original: 'khor lo dam pa'i mchog kyang de tshe 'khor gyur //
analyzed: 'khor lo dam pa'i mchog kyang de tshe 'khor gyur //
translated: The supreme, holy wheel was turned.

original: 'gro ba'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin spyod pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i 'du shes sems dang de bzhin spyod pa //
translated: The perceptions, thoughts, and actions of beings

original: bde gshegs gsung gi dam pa kun kyang bstan byas //
analyzed: bde gshegs gsung gi dam pa kun kyang bstan byas //
translated: Were all revealed by the holy speech of the Sugata.

original: sems can lus la bde gshegs zhing mar sna tshogs //
analyzed: sems can lus la bde gshegs zhing mar sna tshogs //
translated: In the bodies of beings are various buddha-fields,

original: zhing la sems can rmad snyed lus kyang de bzhin //
analyzed: zhing la sems can rmad snyed lus kyang de bzhin //
translated: And in the buddha-fields are bodies of beings.

original: lha dang mi yi lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs //
analyzed: lha dang mi yi lam rgyud de bzhin sna tshogs //
translated: The various life-paths of humans and gods

original: mkhyen nas bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun ston //
analyzed: mkhyen nas bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams kun ston //
translated: Were known, and the Sugata taught the Dharma.

original: shin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes phrar gyur //
analyzed: shin tu yangs pa'i zhing la 'du shes phrar gyur //
translated: In the vast realm, the perception becomes subtle.

original: rdul gyi mtshan ma dag la 'du shes yangs gyur //
analyzed: rdul gyi mtshan ma dag la 'du shes yangs gyur //
translated: In the sign of the dust, the perception becomes vast.

original: de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul //
analyzed: de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul //
translated: These and other miracles of the sugatas

original: 'jig rten kun gyis brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur //🔽che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyis brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur // che ba nyid dbyangs de skad du //
translated: cannot be exhausted even if described by all the worlds.🔽In that way, the sound of greatness

original: snyan pa'i dbyangs su grag gyur nas //
analyzed: snyan pa'i dbyangs su grag gyur nas //
translated: is heard as a pleasant melody.

original: 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing zhi //
analyzed: 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing zhi //
translated: The retinue is delighted and peaceful,

original: gsung ba'i mchog la lta zhing gnas //
analyzed: gsung ba'i mchog la lta zhing gnas //
translated: gazing at the supreme speaker.

original: 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas //
analyzed: 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas //
translated: Knowing that the retinue is peaceful,

original: rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa //
analyzed: rnam grol zla bas yang smras pa //
translated: Vimukticandra spoke again:🔽“Please teach the aspects of the eighth bhumi

original: sa brgyad pa yi rnam pa dang // de lta 'jug pa bstan par mdzod //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa yi rnam pa dang // de lta 'jug pa bstan par mdzod //
translated: and the way to enter it.”

original: byang chub sems @171b dang 'a rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems @171b dang 'a rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: Bodhisattva Vajra Heart said:

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “Oh, sons of the victors!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa thabs dang shes rab kyis lam shin tu sbyangs pa /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pa thabs dang shes rab kyis lam shin tu sbyangs pa /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva great being who has thoroughly analyzed the seventh bodhisattva stage, who has thoroughly trained in the path through method and wisdom,

original: tshogs shin tu bsags pa /
analyzed: tshogs shin tu bsags pa /
translated: who has thoroughly accumulated the collections,

original: smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa'i stobs dang shugs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin tu brlabs pa rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs thob pa /
analyzed: smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa'i stobs dang shugs can de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin tu brlabs pa rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs thob pa /
translated: who has the power and force of having thoroughly made great aspirations, who has been empowered by the empowerment of the blessing of the tathāgatas, who has attained the power and force of his own roots of virtue,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba dang ldan pa /
translated: who is endowed with the mental activity of the powers, confidences, and unshared qualities of the tathāgatas,

original: bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: who has a mind that has been purified of intention and superior intention,

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa /
translated: who is exalted by the power of merit and wisdom,

original: snying rje dang snying brtse ba chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: snying rje dang snying brtse ba chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa /
translated: They are endowed with the application of never abandoning the realms of sentient beings with great compassion and great love.

original: ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba de chos thams cad thog ma nas ma byung ba nyid la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug go /
analyzed: ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba de chos thams cad thog ma nas ma byung ba nyid la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug go /
translated: They have followed the path of immeasurable wisdom. They correctly engage with all phenomena as they are, in their primordial non-arising.

original: ma skyes pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / thug pa med pa dang / mi rgyu ba dang / mi ldog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang / thog ma dang /
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / thug pa med pa dang / mi rgyu ba dang / mi ldog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin dang / thog ma dang /
translated: They correctly engage with the non-arising, the absence of characteristics, the absence of origination, the absence of destruction, the absence of limit, the absence of movement, the absence of reversal, the absence of substantial nature, the sameness of the beginning,

original: tha ma dang / dbus mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la'ang @172a *//
analyzed: tha ma dang / dbus mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la'ang @172a *//
translated: the end, and the middle, and the non-conceptuality of omniscient wisdom through suchness.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste /
translated: They correctly engage with all phenomena as they are, in their primordial non-arising.

original: des rnam pa thams cad du sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes dang bral zhing thogs pa med la nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing /
analyzed: des rnam pa thams cad du sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes dang bral zhing thogs pa med la nam mkha' dang 'dra zhing /
translated: In this way, they are free from the concepts of mind, thought, and consciousness, and they are unobstructed, like space.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ces bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ces bya'o //
translated: They have realized the nature of space, and so they are said to have attained acceptance that phenomena are unborn.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag de la de lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag de la de lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: “ O children of the Victorious Ones, bodhisattvas who have such acceptance

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka' ba tha mi dad pa mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zab mo shes par dka' ba tha mi dad pa mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba /
translated: immediately attain the bodhisattva ground Immovable. They attain the profound bodhisattva state, which is difficult to know, is not differentiated, is free from all characteristics,

original: 'du shes kyi bgegs thams cad las phyir log pa tshad med pa /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi bgegs thams cad las phyir log pa tshad med pa /
translated: is the opposite of all the obstacles of perception, is immeasurable,

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa dben pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa shin tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa dben pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa shin tu thob pa yin /
translated: cannot be taken away by any hearers or solitary realizers, and is the actualization of all forms of solitude.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “ O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dper na / dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa /
translated: For example, a monk who has attained miraculous powers

original: sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa /
translated: and has gained control over all sentient beings

original: mthar gyis 'gog pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa ni rgyu ba dang / sems pa dang / g-yo ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis 'gog pa'i bar du mnyam par bzhag pa ni rgyu ba dang / sems pa dang / g-yo ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba yin /
translated: and who is absorbed in meditative concentration up to the cessation of perception and sensation is free from all conceptual thoughts of movement, intention, and change, and is free from all perceptions.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g-yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g-yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad dang bral te /
translated: In the same way, as soon as the bodhisattva has attained this eighth bodhisattva level, Immovability, he is free from all deliberate actions.

original: lhun gyis grub pa'i chos @172b nyid thob cing lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rtsol ba thams cad dang bral te /
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa'i chos @172b nyid thob cing lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rtsol ba thams cad dang bral te /
translated: He has attained the spontaneous dharmatā and is free from all the efforts of body, speech, and mind

original: shin tu dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin /
analyzed: shin tu dben pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa yin /
translated: and abides in the extremely isolated dharmatā.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du bdag chu klung chen pos khyer ba snyam byed la /
analyzed: dper na / mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du bdag chu klung chen pos khyer ba snyam byed la /
translated: For example, suppose a man, while asleep and dreaming, were to think that he was being carried away by a great river.

original: de de nas ci phyin du 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po rtsom rtsom pa las de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid kyis sad par gyur na /
analyzed: de de nas ci phyin du 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po rtsom rtsom pa las de 'bad cing rtsol ba chen po de nyid kyis sad par gyur na /
translated: Then, as he was struggling and making great effort to escape, he would wake up from his sleep by the very force of his struggle and effort.

original: de sad ma thag tu 'bad cing rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sad ma thag tu 'bad cing rtsol ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As soon as he woke up, he would be free from all his struggles and efforts.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the Victorious Ones!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dod bar shes nas 'bad cing rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i chu klung chen po bzhir sems can mang po dod bar shes nas 'bad cing rtsol ba yongs su rtsom mo //
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva, seeing that many beings are carried away by the four great rivers of the afflictions, makes great effort and struggle.

original: de brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad bral ba yin te /
analyzed: de brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob ma thag tu ched du bya ba thams cad bral ba yin te /
translated: As soon as he has attained this bodhisattva ground of The Immovable, he is free from all deliberate effort.

original: de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i gnyis po rgyu ba 'am mtshan ma rgyu ba dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The two of them, the movement and the signs of movement, will not appear at all.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas pa ni /
analyzed: dper na / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas pa ni /
translated: For example, those who are born and dwell in the world of Brahmā

original: 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te /
translated: do not engage in the afflictions of desire.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones,🔽in the same way, the bodhisattvas on the bodhisattva level Immovable do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su rgyu ba rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du @173a *//🔽yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te /🔽de sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su rgyu ba rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du @173a *// yongs su mi rgyu ba yin te / de sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
translated: They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.

original: byang chub la yongs su rgyu ba'am /🔽byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub la yongs su rgyu ba'am / byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
translated: They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.🔽They do not engage in the movements of mind, mentation, and consciousness at all.

original: rang sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
translated: They do not engage in

original: nyan thos la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
analyzed: nyan thos la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
translated: He does not pursue the śrāvakas,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am /🔽dgra bcom pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am / dgra bcom pa la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
translated: he does not pursue nirvāṇa,🔽he does not pursue the arhats,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
translated: he does not pursue the nonreturners,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la yongs su rgyu ba'am /
translated: he does not pursue the once-returners,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa la yongs su rgyu ba yang yongs su mi rgyun 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rgyu ba yongs su mi rgyu ba lta ci smos /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa la yongs su rgyu ba yang yongs su mi rgyun 'jig rten pa'i yongs su rgyu ba yongs su mi rgyu ba lta ci smos /
translated: he does not pursue the stream enterers, and needless to say he does not pursue mundane pursuits.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors,

original: de ltar mi g-yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de /🔽de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de ltar mi g-yo ba'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs la gnas pa de'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyud de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de / de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: in that way, the bodhisattva who is on the Immovable Ground, abiding in the power and force of his previous aspirations, the buddhas, the blessed ones, establish him in the wisdom of the tathāgatas through that stream of the Dharma gateway.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: They say to him, ‘Son of good family,

original: legs so // legs so //
analyzed: legs so // legs so //
translated: excellent, excellent!

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa yang yin na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su rtogs par bya ba la 'di ni don dam pa'i bzod pa yang yin na /
translated: This is the ultimate acceptance of the realization of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'on kyang / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: 'on kyang / rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: nged kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyi /
analyzed: nged kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyi /
translated: you do not have our ten powers, four forms of fearlessness, and the perfect qualities of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig /
translated: Therefore, apply yourself to the practice of the perfections in order to attain the perfect qualities of the Buddha.

original: bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma gtong zhig /
analyzed: bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang ma gtong zhig /
translated: Do not give up this very gateway of acceptance.

original: @173b rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: @173b rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / khyod kyis de ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa thob kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag zhi ba ma yin /
translated: it is like this:

original: rab tu zhi ba ma yin te /🔽nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su rgyu bar gyur na /🔽de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su mnar ba la soms /
analyzed: rab tu zhi ba ma yin te / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su rgyu bar gyur na / de ltar rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su mnar ba la soms /
translated: although you have attained the liberation of peace, these ordinary, childish beings are not peaceful, not completely at peace.🔽They are overwhelmed by the various afflictive emotions.

original: 'di ltar yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang /
translated: Consider how they are tormented by the various forms of conceptualization.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam sems can gyi don yongs su 'grub par bya bar btab pa dang / ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dran par gyis shig /🔽'di ltar yang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam sems can gyi don yongs su 'grub par bya bar btab pa dang / ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dran par gyis shig / 'di ltar yang /
translated: Son of noble family, remember your previous aspirations, which were made for the sake of accomplishing the welfare of sentient beings, and remember the inconceivable gateway of wisdom.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: this is the intrinsic nature of phenomena.

original: ma byung yang rung /
analyzed: ma byung yang rung /
translated: Whether the thus-gone ones appear or not,

original: chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'dug pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid 'di ni de bzhin du 'dug pa ste /
translated: this expanse of reality and this suchness of reality remain just as they are.

original: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The thus-gone ones are not to be described as limited,

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo //
translated: and all hearers and solitary buddhas attain this nonconceptual intrinsic nature.

original: rigs kyi bu khyod nged kyi lus tshad med pa dang / ye shes tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa tshad med pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la ltos /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod nged kyi lus tshad med pa dang / ye shes tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa tshad med pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa la ltos /
translated: “Noble son, behold our immeasurable bodies, our immeasurable wisdom, our immeasurable buddha realms, our immeasurable accomplishment of wisdom, our immeasurable maṇḍala of light, and our immeasurable pure melodious voices.

original: khyod kyis kyang de bzhin tu mngon par bsgrub par bya dgos so //
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang de bzhin tu mngon par bsgrub par bya dgos so //
translated: You should also accomplish such things.

original: 'di ltar / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: 'di ltar / rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

original: gang de ltar chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa de ni khyod kyi snang ba gcig pur zad de /
analyzed: gang de ltar chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa de ni khyod kyi snang ba gcig pur zad de /
translated: the nonconceptualization of all phenomena is your sole illumination.

original: rigs kyi @174a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi @174a *//
translated: Noble son,

original: bu; de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste /
analyzed: bu; de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba ni 'di 'dra ste /
translated: the illumination of the Dharma of the thus-gone ones is like this.

original: yongs su mtha' yas par song la yongs su mtha' yas par bsgrubs pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su mtha' yas par song la yongs su mtha' yas par bsgrubs pa ste /
translated: It extends infinitely and is accomplished infinitely.

original: de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka'/
analyzed: de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang bgrang bar dka'/
translated: It is difficult to count even with a hundred thousand quintillion eons.

original: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cig /
analyzed: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub pa skyed cig /
translated: Generate the accomplishment of attaining them.

original: 'di ltar yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang /
translated: In this way,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: son of noble family,

original: phyogs bcu'i zhing tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad med pa dang / chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa la ltos te /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i zhing tshad med pa dang / sems can tshad med pa dang / chos rnam par phye ba tshad med pa la ltos te /
translated: consider the immeasurable fields in the ten directions, the immeasurable sentient beings, and the immeasurable classifications of phenomena.

original: de dag thams cad ma nor bar bgrang bar gyis shig /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ma nor bar bgrang bar gyis shig /
translated: Count all of them without error.

original: ces te / kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag; de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par phye ba'i🔽tshul mngon par bsgrub pa'i las tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
analyzed: ces te / kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag; de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par phye ba'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa'i las tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
translated: O sons of the victors, in this way, the blessed buddhas establish in the bodhisattvas endowed with such wisdom the immeasurable and incalculable gateways of accomplishing wisdom,

original: gzhal du med pa dag nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa dag nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: through which the bodhisattvas will perfect the activity of accomplishing the way of the classification of wisdom.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O sons of the victors,

original: khyed kyis yid ches pa dang / khong du chud par bya na /
analyzed: khyed kyis yid ches pa dang / khong du chud par bya na /
translated: You should have faith in and understand this:

original: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgor gzhug pa mdzad du zin na /
analyzed: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgor gzhug pa mdzad du zin na /
translated: If the blessed buddhas were to cause that bodhisattva to enter the gateway of accomplishment,

original: de nyid de'i mtha' las brgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid de'i mtha' las brgal ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te /
translated: that would be his transcendence of the limit of nirvana.

original: sems can thams cad kyis dgos pa'ang rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis dgos pa'ang rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would also be the end of the need for all sentient beings.

original: de ltar sangs rgyas @174b bcom ldan 'das de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i las gang gis skad cig gcig tu mngon par bsgrubs pas kyang thog ma sems bskyed pa phyin chad sa bdun la zhugs shing rjes su song ba
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas @174b bcom ldan 'das de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i las gang gis skad cig gcig tu mngon par bsgrubs pas kyang thog ma sems bskyed pa phyin chad sa bdun la zhugs shing rjes su song ba
translated: In that way, the blessed buddhas would accomplish in a single instant the activity of accomplishing the wisdom of that bodhisattva, which would surpass by a hundred times the previous activity of accomplishing the wisdom of that bodhisattva who has entered the seventh stage and has gone beyond the first generation of the mind of awakening.

original: yongs su rtsom pa'i bar snga ma de dag gis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
analyzed: yongs su rtsom pa'i bar snga ma de dag gis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
translated: It would not even come close to a hundredth of that.

original: stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya'i cha dang / khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
analyzed: stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya'i cha dang / khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
translated: It would not be a hundredth, a thousandth, a hundred thousandth, a ten millionth, a billionth, a ten billionth part of it.🔽It would not be comparable, or equal, or measurable, or counted, or recounted, or numbered, or indicated, or demonstrated, or suggested, or defined, or likened, or illustrated by any example.

original: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog pa de snyed du tshad med pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa las nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
analyzed: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog pa de snyed du tshad med pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa las nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do //
translated: It would not even be a fraction of a simile.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sngon chad lus gcig gis mngon par bsgrub pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par gyur gyi /
analyzed: sngon chad lus gcig gis mngon par bsgrub pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par gyur gyi /
translated: Previously, the bodhisattva engaged in the conduct of the bodhisattva through the accomplishment of a single body.

original: 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pas /
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pas /
translated: However, the bodhisattvas who are in this bhūmi, through the accomplishment of immeasurable bodies,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mthu yongs su sdud de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mthu yongs su sdud de /
translated: He gathers the power of the bodhisattva’s conduct.

original: dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / zhing yongs su sbyong ba tshad med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa dang /🔽sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur @175a *//
analyzed: dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med pa dang / zhing yongs su sbyong ba tshad med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing bsnyen bkur @175a *//
translated: He has immeasurable accomplishment of melody, immeasurable accomplishment of wisdom, immeasurable accomplishment of birth, immeasurable purification of realms, immeasurable ripening of beings,

original: ba tshad med pa dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad med pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs dang shugs tshad med pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rnam par phye ba dang / tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i lus dang /
analyzed: ba tshad med pa dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa tshad med pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs dang shugs tshad med pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa rnam par phye ba dang / tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i lus dang /
translated: immeasurable worship and service of buddhas, immeasurable comprehension of the way of the Dharma, immeasurable power and strength in accomplishing super-knowledge, immeasurable opening of circles of retinue, and a body that has gone to immeasurability.

original: ngag dang / yid kyi las kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi mthu mi sgul ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par sgrub bo //
analyzed: ngag dang / yid kyi las kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi mthu mi sgul ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par sgrub bo //
translated: and with his speech and mind he accomplishes all the bodhisattva activities with the method of unshakable power.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i gru ni rgya mtsho chen por ma phyin gyi bar du ched du bskyod cing 'gro bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na / rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i gru ni rgya mtsho chen por ma phyin gyi bar du ched du bskyod cing 'gro bar bya ba yin te /
translated: A ship that sails on the great ocean must be propelled by effort until it reaches the great ocean.

original: rgya mtsho chen po la zhen ma thag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bsu bas ched du bskyod mi dgos pa yin /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po la zhen ma thag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bsu bas ched du bskyod mi dgos pa yin /
translated: As soon as it reaches the great ocean, it is welcomed by the circle of wind and does not need to be propelled by effort.

original: des rgya mtsho chen po la nyin gcig gis ci chod pa de ni sngon du bskyod cing 'gro bas lo brgyar yang de ltar tshad med par phyin par mi nus so //
analyzed: des rgya mtsho chen po la nyin gcig gis ci chod pa de ni sngon du bskyod cing 'gro bas lo brgyar yang de ltar tshad med par phyin par mi nus so //
translated: In one day it travels as far as it could not travel in a hundred years by its previous propulsion.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge pa'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs yang dag par bsags pa theg pa chen po'i grur zhugs pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya mtshor phyin nas yud tsam gcig tu lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge pa'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs yang dag par bsags pa theg pa chen po'i grur zhugs pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgya mtshor phyin nas yud tsam gcig tu lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva great being who has gathered the great accumulations of roots of virtue, who has embarked on the ship of the Great Vehicle, who has reached the ocean of bodhisattva conduct, and who in a single instant with effortless wisdom

original: kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ji tsam yang dag par gnon pa de ni sngon gyi ched du bya ba'i las kyis bskal pa brgya stong du yang yang dag par non par mi nus so //
analyzed: kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ji tsam yang dag par gnon pa de ni sngon gyi ched du bya ba'i las kyis bskal pa brgya stong du yang yang dag par non par mi nus so //
translated: overcomes the wisdom of omniscience, cannot be overcome by the previous intentional actions of beings even in a hundred thousand eons.

original: kye; @175b rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; @175b rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis bsgrub pa lhun gyis grub pa la shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam par dpyod cing 'jig
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis bsgrub pa lhun gyis grub pa la shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i blos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam par dpyod cing 'jig
translated: The bodhisattva who has attained this eighth bodhisattva bhūmi, through the wisdom of skillful methods, has entered the effortless accomplishment. With the mind of a bodhisattva, he examines the wisdom of omniscience and is

original: rten gyi khams 'byung ba yang rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: rten gyi khams 'byung ba yang rnam par spyod do //
translated: He knows the formation of the world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa'ang rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa'ang rnam par spyod do //
translated: He knows the destruction of the world systems.

original: de 'jig rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de 'jig rten ji ltar 'byung ba de yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows how the world is formed.

original: 'jig rten ji ltar 'jig pa de yang rab tu shes so //🔽las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten ji ltar 'jig pa de yang rab tu shes so // las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows how the world is destroyed.🔽He knows the actions that cause the formation of the world.

original: las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so //🔽dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so; ;dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: las gang bsags pas 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so // dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so; ;dus ji srid kyis 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the actions that cause the destruction of the world.🔽He knows the length of time that the world remains formed.

original: dus ji srid du 'jig rten byung nas gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so //🔽dus ji srid du 'jig rten zhig par gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dus ji srid du 'jig rten byung nas gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so // dus ji srid du 'jig rten zhig par gnas pa de yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the length of time that the world remains destroyed.

original: de sa'i khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de sa'i khams shin tu chung ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the smallest particles of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams shin tu che ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sa'i khams shin tu che ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the earth element to be vast.🔽They know the earth element to be immeasurable.

original: sa'i khams tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so; ;sa'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sa'i khams tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so; ;sa'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the divisions of the earth element.

original: de chu'i khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de chu'i khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: “They know the water element to be small.

original: chu'i khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so //🔽chu'i khams tshad med pa @176a *//
analyzed: chu'i khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so // chu'i khams tshad med pa @176a *//
translated: They know the water element to be vast.

original: yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the water element to be immeasurable.

original: chu'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chu'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the divisions of the water element.

original: de me'i khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so //🔽me'i khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de me'i khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so // me'i khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: “They know the fire element to be small.🔽They know the fire element to be vast.

original: me'i khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: me'i khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the fire element to be immeasurable.

original: me'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: me'i khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the divisions of the fire element.

original: de rlung khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so //🔽rlung gi khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de rlung khams shin tu chung ba'ang rab tu shes so // rlung gi khams shin tu che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: “They know the wind element to be small.🔽They know the wind element to be vast.

original: rlung gi khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the wind element to be immeasurable.

original: rlung gi khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //🔽de shin tu phra ba'i rdul phra ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so // de shin tu phra ba'i rdul phra ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the analysis of the wind element.🔽He knows the subtlety of the most subtle particles.

original: shin tu phra ba'i rdul yangs pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i rdul yangs pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the vastness of the most vast particles.

original: shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i rdul tshad med pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the immeasurability of immeasurable particles.

original: shin tu phra ba'i rdul rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //🔽'jig rten gyi khams gang na sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i rdul rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so // 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the analysis of particles.🔽He knows the number of particles in the earth element in all worlds.

original: chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //🔽me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so // me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the number of particles in the water element.🔽He knows the number of particles in the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the number of particles in the wind element.

original: rin po che rnam par phye ba ji snyed pa yod pa dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rin po che rnam par phye ba ji snyed pa yod pa dang / rin po che'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the number of atoms in the precious substances and the number of atoms in the dust particles.

original: sems can gyi lus @176b la rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems can gyi lus @176b la rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the number of atoms in the bodies of sentient beings.

original: zhing gi lhun la rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zhing gi lhun la rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the number of atoms in the mountains of the world systems.

original: de sems can gyi lus che ba dang / lus yangs pa dang; lus phra ba dang / lus rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de sems can gyi lus che ba dang / lus yangs pa dang; lus phra ba dang / lus rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the bodies of sentient beings, whether they are large or small, extensive or narrow.

original: sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang /
translated: He knows the number of atoms in the bodies of the beings in the hells, the number of atoms in the bodies of the animals, the number of atoms in the bodies of the beings in the world of Yama,

original: lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / lha'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / mi'i ris su gtogs pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / lha'i 'jig rten pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba dang / mi'i ris su gtogs pa'i lus rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed kyis byung ba de dag kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the number of atoms in the bodies of the beings of the hells, the animal realms, and the world of Yama. He knows the number of atoms in the bodies of humans and gods.

original: de de ltar rdul shin tu phra ba rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa ni 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de de ltar rdul shin tu phra ba rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa ni 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: “He who has thus entered into the analysis of atoms knows the destruction of the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so; ;gzugs med pa'i khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so; ;gzugs med pa'i khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the destruction of the form realm and the formless realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so //🔽gzugs kyi khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so // gzugs kyi khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the formation of the desire realm.🔽He knows the formation of the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so //🔽'dod pa'i khams chung ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams 'du ba yang rab tu shes so // 'dod pa'i khams chung ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the formation of the formless realm.🔽He knows the smallness of the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the greatness of the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams tshad med @177a *//🔽pa'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams tshad med @177a *// pa'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the immensity of the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the divisions of the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams chung ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams chung ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the smallness of the form realm and the formless realm.

original: che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: che ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows their immensity.

original: tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: tshad med pa'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows their immeasurability.

original: rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows their divisions.

original: de khams gsum rnam par spyad pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan la /
analyzed: de khams gsum rnam par spyad pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan la /
translated: “He has the light of wisdom that is accomplished through the wisdom that comprehends the three realms.

original: sems can gyi lus rab tu dbye ba la mkhas shing zhing gi lhun rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pas skye ba'i skye mched thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la blo shin tu gtong ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi lus rab tu dbye ba la mkhas shing zhing gi lhun rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pas skye ba'i skye mched thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la blo shin tu gtong ste /
translated: He is skilled in the classification of the bodies of beings and has the wisdom that classifies the forms of realms. He has the intelligence to accomplish all the entrances to birth.

original: de ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to ripen all beings,

original: sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang / yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur rang gi lus byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang / yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur rang gi lus byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: He blesses his own body to be like the birth and perfection of all beings.

original: de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang zhing sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub ste /
analyzed: de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang zhing sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub ste /
translated: He fills the great trichiliocosm with his own body, and in accordance with the aspirations of beings, he manifests it in order to be born, following the wisdom of a magical illusion.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis sam /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis sam /
translated: He fills two great trichiliocosms,

original: gsum mam / bzhi'am /
analyzed: gsum mam / bzhi'am /
translated: three, four,

original: lnga'am / bcu'am /
analyzed: lnga'am / bcu'am /
translated: five, ten,

original: nyi shu'am / sum cu'am /
analyzed: nyi shu'am / sum cu'am /
translated: twenty, thirty,

original: bzhi bcu'am / lnga bcu dag nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: bzhi bcu'am / lnga bcu dag nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: forty, fifty, up to inexpressibly inexpressible numbers of great trichiliocosms.

original: sems can @177b gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: sems can @177b gyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rang gi lus mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: He manifests himself in accordance with the aspirations of sentient beings, following after the wisdom that is like a magical display.

original: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: Endowed with such wisdom, he does not move from one buddha-field,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu yang snang bar phyin pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu yang snang bar phyin pa yin /
translated: yet he appears in the circles of the assemblies of the Tathāgatas in inexpressibly many buddha-fields.

original: de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par phye ba dang / mos pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhing de dang de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu de lta de ltar rang gi lus ston te /
analyzed: de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par phye ba dang / mos pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhing de dang de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu de lta de ltar rang gi lus ston te /
translated: In accordance with the different bodies, aspirations, and intentions of sentient beings, he manifests his own body in this and that field, in this and that circle of the assembly.

original: de dge sbyong gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: de dge sbyong gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In an assembly of ascetics, he manifests the color and form of an ascetic.

original: bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In the midst of the assembly of brahmins, he displays the color and form of a brahmin.

original: rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //🔽rje'u rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to // rje'u rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In the midst of the assembly of kṣatriyas, he displays the color and form of a kṣatriya.🔽In the midst of the assembly of vaiśyas, he displays the color and form of a vaiśya.

original: khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khyim bdag gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //🔽rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal po chen po bzhi'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khyim bdag gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to // rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyal po chen po bzhi'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In the midst of the assembly of householders, he displays the color and form of a householder.🔽In the midst of the assembly of the Cāturmahārājika gods, he displays the color and form of a Cāturmahārājika god.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In the midst of the assembly of the Trāyastriṃśa gods, he displays the color and form of a Trāyastriṃśa god.

original: de bzhin du mtshe ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / @178a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du mtshe ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / @178a *//
translated: Similarly, in the midst of the assembly of the Yāma gods, the Tuṣita gods, the Nirmāṇarati gods, and the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin gods, he displays the color and form of a Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin god.

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas /
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas /
translated: In the retinue of the maṇḍala of the Heaven of Making Use of Others’ Emanations, in the retinue of the maṇḍala of the Heaven of Brahmā,

original: 'og min gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du de lta de lta bu'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: 'og min gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du de lta de lta bu'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: and in the retinue of the maṇḍala of the Akaniṣṭha Heaven, he manifests such and such colors and forms.

original: de nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: de nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: For those beings who are to be guided by the śrāvakas, he manifests the body, color, and form of a śrāvaka.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: For those beings who are to be guided by the pratyekabuddhas, he manifests the body, color, and form of a pratyekabuddha.

original: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang / gzugs ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang / gzugs ston to //
translated: For those beings who are to be guided by the bodhisattvas, he manifests the body, color, and form of a bodhisattva.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang sku gzugs ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang sku gzugs ston to //
translated: For those beings who are to be guided by the tathāgatas, he manifests the body, color, and form of a tathāgata.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors!

original: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi mos pa rab tu mang ba de dag thams cad du rang gi lus de lta de ltar rnam par phye ba yongs su ston to //
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi mos pa rab tu mang ba de dag thams cad du rang gi lus de lta de ltar rnam par phye ba yongs su ston to //
translated: In this way, in all those buddha-fields, as many as there are, he manifests his body in a corresponding way, in order to teach the Dharma to all those beings who are to be taught.

original: de lus kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang rnam par bral ba ste /
analyzed: de lus kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes thams cad dang rnam par bral ba ste /
translated: He is free from all conceptual thoughts and ideas about the body.

original: lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can gyi lus rab tu shes so //
analyzed: lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can gyi lus rab tu shes so //
translated: He has attained the sameness of the body, and so he knows the bodies of beings.🔽He knows the body of the realm, the body of the maturation of karma, the body of the śrāvakas, the body of the pratyekabuddhas, the body of the bodhisattvas, the body of the tathāgatas, the body of wisdom, the body of the Dharma,🔽and the body of space.🔽He knows the bodies of beings.

original: zhing gi lus dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
analyzed: zhing gi lus dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
translated: He knows the body of the Dharma.🔽He knows the body of space.

original: @178b nam mkha'i lus kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: @178b nam mkha'i lus kyang rab tu shes so //
