translated: He knows the body of the realm.🔽He knows the body of the maturation of karma.🔽He knows the body of the śrāvakas.🔽He knows the body of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽He knows the body of the bodhisattvas.🔽He knows the body of the tathāgatas.🔽He knows the body of wisdom.🔽He knows the body of the Dharma.🔽He knows the body of space.🔽He knows the bodies of beings.🔽He knows the body of the realm.🔽He knows the body of the maturation of karma.🔽He knows the body of the śrāvakas.🔽He knows the body of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽He knows the body of the bodhisattvas.🔽He knows the body of the tathāgatas.🔽He knows the body of wisdom.🔽He knows the body of the Dharma.🔽He knows the body of space.🔽He knows the bodies of beings.🔽He knows the body of the realm.🔽He knows the body of the maturation of karma.🔽He knows the body of the śrāvakas.🔽He knows the body of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽He knows the body of the bodhisattvas.🔽He knows the body of the tathāgatas.🔽He knows the body of wisdom.🔽He knows the body of the Dharma.🔽He knows the body of space.🔽He knows the bodies of beings.🔽He knows the body of the realm.🔽He knows the body of the maturation of karma.

original: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas 'dod na /
analyzed: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas 'dod na /
translated: He knows the body

original: sems can gyi lus nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: sems can gyi lus nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: He blesses the bodies of beings as the body of space.

original: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang /
translated: In the same way, he blesses the bodies of fields, the bodies of the ripening of karma, the bodies of śrāvakas, the bodies of pratyekabuddhas, the bodies of bodhisattvas, the bodies of tathāgatas, the bodies of pristine awareness,

original: chos kyi lus kyang nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: chos kyi lus kyang nam mkha'i lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: and the bodies of phenomena as the body of space.

original: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: “By knowing how to accomplish the thoughts and intentions of beings, he blesses the bodies of beings as his own body.

original: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang; byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang; byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
translated: In the same way, he blesses the bodies of fields, the bodies of the ripening of karma, the bodies of śrāvakas, the bodies of pratyekabuddhas, the bodies of bodhisattvas, the bodies of tathāgatas, the bodies of pristine awareness, the bodies of phenomena,🔽and the bodies of space as his own body.

original: nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: He manifests the bodies of the gods in his own body.🔽He manifests the bodies of the nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas in his own body.🔽He manifests the bodies of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas in his own body.🔽He manifests the bodies of the bodhisattvas in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the Tathāgata in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the Dharma in his own body.

original: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas /
analyzed: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su shes pas /
translated: He manifests the body of the Saṅgha in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the world in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the Dharma realm in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of space in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the past in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the future in his own body.

original: lus gang dang gang lus gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang de'i lus su lus de dang de dag byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: lus gang dang gang lus gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang de'i lus su lus de dang de dag byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: He manifests the body of the present in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the unconditioned in his own body.

original: de sems can gyi lus kyi lus rnams kyi las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de sems can gyi lus kyi lus rnams kyi las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He manifests the body of the conditioned in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in his own body.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned in the body of the unconditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the unconditioned in the body of the conditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the conditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the unconditioned.

original: rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyon mongs pa'i lus dang / gzugs kyi lus dang / gzugs med pa'i lus @179a *//🔽kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyon mongs pa'i lus dang / gzugs kyi lus dang / gzugs med pa'i lus @179a *// kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the conditioned and unconditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the conditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the unconditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the conditioned and unconditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the conditioned.

original: zhing gi lus rnams kyis chung ba'i rang bzhin yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: zhing gi lus rnams kyis chung ba'i rang bzhin yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the unconditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the conditioned and unconditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the conditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body of the unconditioned.🔽He manifests the body of the conditioned and unconditioned in the body

original: che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / gzhi mnyam par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba yang rab tu shes so //🔽las rnam par smin pa'i lus rnam par phyi ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so //🔽de bzhin du nyan thos kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par phye ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / gzhi mnyam par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye ba yang rab tu shes so // las rnam par smin pa'i lus rnam par phyi ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so // de bzhin du nyan thos kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rnam par phye ba'i brda dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par phye ba'i brda yang rab tu shes so //
translated: the great, the immeasurable, the defiled, the pure, the inverted, the upright, the even, and the uneven, and the webs of the directions.🔽He also knows the signs of the body that is the ripening of karma.🔽Similarly, he knows the signs of the classification of the bodies of śrāvakas, the signs of the classification of the bodies of pratyekabuddhas, and the signs of the classification of the bodies of bodhisattvas.🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams kyi mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i lus kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams kyi mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i lus kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the bodies of the hells, the bodies of animals, the bodies of pretas, the bodies of fighting spirits, the bodies of humans, the bodies of celestials, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of celestials, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of fighting spirits, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of gandharvas, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of smell-eaters, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of great smell-eaters, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of sky-walkers, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of non-corporeals, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those who have attained, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those who have gone forth, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of gods, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of humans, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those in the underworld, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those in the animal realm, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of pretas, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of fighting spirits, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of smell-eaters, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of great smell-eaters, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of sky-walkers, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of non-corporeals, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those who have attained, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those who have gone forth, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of gods, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of humans, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those in the underworld, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of those in the animal realm, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of pretas, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of fighting spirits, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of smell-eaters, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of great smell-eaters, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of sky-walkers, the bodies of the abodes of the various classes of non

original: smon lam gyi lus dang; sprul pa'i lus dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi lus dang / gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyi lus dang / 'od kyi lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang / bsod nams kyi lus dang /
analyzed: smon lam gyi lus dang; sprul pa'i lus dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi lus dang / gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyi lus dang / 'od kyi lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus dang / bsod nams kyi lus dang /
translated: the body of aspiration, the body of emanation, the body of blessing, the body of form, the body of marks and signs, the body of light, the body of mind, the body of merit,

original: ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi lus dang / chos kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: the body of wisdom, and the body of Dharma.

original: ye shes kyi lus rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dpyad pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi lus rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dpyad pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the bodies of wisdom to be thoroughly investigated.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa yang rab tu shes so //🔽'bras bu'i sbyor bas yang dag par bzung ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par phye ba dang / theg @179b pa gsum rnam par dgod pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa yang rab tu shes so // 'bras bu'i sbyor bas yang dag par bzung ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par phye ba dang / theg @179b pa gsum rnam par dgod pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba dang /
translated: He knows them to be correctly investigated.

original: ma 'byung ba dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: ma 'byung ba dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the bodies of beings to be connected with results, to be mundane and supramundane, to be classified in the three vehicles, to be common and uncommon, to be arisen and unarisen, and to be those of training and beyond training.

original: chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the sameness of the bodies of the Dharma.

original: 'khrul pa med pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the absence of error.

original: gnas dang / brda dang / kun rdzob rnam par dgod pa dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam par dgod pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gnas dang / brda dang / kun rdzob rnam par dgod pa dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam par dgod pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the arrangement of the world, the arrangement of language, the arrangement of the conventional, the arrangement of the dharmas of sentient beings and non-sentient beings, and the arrangement of the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Ārya Saṅgha.

original: nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the immeasurability of the bodies of space.

original: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / lus med pa dang / nor ba med cing /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / lus med pa dang / nor ba med cing /
translated: He knows the absence of body, the absence of error,

original: mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mang po mngon zhing gsal bar byed pa yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs mang po mngon zhing gsal bar byed pa yang rab tu shes so //
translated: the infinitude, and the manifestation and illumination of many forms.

original: des lus kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu rab tu thob pas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir tshe'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: des lus kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu rab tu thob pas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir tshe'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: By attaining this kind of manifest realization of the gnosis of the body, they attain the power of life, because they bless their lives for inexpressibly inexpressible kalpas.

original: ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the power of mind, in order to enter into the gnosis of the realization of concentration.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan cing shin tu klubs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yo byad kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan cing shin tu klubs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yo byad kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the power of resources, in order to display the blessing of adorning and beautifying all world systems with many ornaments.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dus bzhin du ma nor bar bstan pa'i phyir las kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //🔽'jig rten gyi khams thams @180a *//
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dus bzhin du ma nor bar bstan pa'i phyir las kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo // 'jig rten gyi khams thams @180a *//
translated: They attain the power of action, in order to display the blessing of the ripening of actions without error.

original: cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir skye ba'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir skye ba'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the power of birth, in order to display birth in all world systems.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / dus gang du ci dga' bar mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / dus gang du ci dga' bar mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the power of vows in order to demonstrate perfect enlightenment whenever and in whatever buddha-land he wishes.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gang ba yang dge bar bstan pa'i phyir mos pa'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gang ba yang dge bar bstan pa'i phyir mos pa'i dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the power of resolve in order to demonstrate the complete filling with buddhas of all world-realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the power of miracles in order to demonstrate the miracles and magical transformations in all buddha-fields.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ye shes kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ye shes kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the power of knowledge in order to demonstrate the powers, the fearlessnesses, the special qualities of the Buddha, the major and minor characteristics, and perfect enlightenment.

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains the power of Dharma in order to reveal the door of the Dharma that is without end or middle.

original: de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu po 'di dag thob ma thag nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu po 'di dag thob ma thag nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
translated: “ As soon as the bodhisattva obtains these ten masteries, he is endowed with inconceivable wisdom,

original: tshad med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
translated: he is endowed with immeasurable wisdom,

original: yangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: yangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
translated: he is endowed with vast wisdom,

original: mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin /
translated: he is endowed with unassailable wisdom.

original: des de lta bu rjes su song zhing de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: des de lta bu rjes su song zhing de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin /
translated: In this way, he is endowed with such wisdom and, in accordance with it, he moves about and acts with physical actions that are completely irreproachable.

original: ngag gi @180b las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: ngag gi @180b las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ba yin /
translated: He moves about and acts with verbal actions that are completely irreproachable.

original: yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med cing ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes rjes su 'brang ba /
analyzed: yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med cing ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes rjes su 'brang ba /
translated: He moves about and acts with mental actions that are completely irreproachable, with wisdom preceding and wisdom following.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang bsgyur ba /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang bsgyur ba /
translated: It is governed by the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba /
analyzed: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba /
translated: It is distinguished by skillful means that are preceded by great compassion.

original: smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa /
translated: It is accomplished by prayers.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa /
translated: It is blessed by the power of the tathāgatas.

original: sems can gyi don bya zhing sbyor ba rgyun ma chad pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi don bya zhing sbyor ba rgyun ma chad pa /
translated: It is uninterrupted in its application to benefit beings.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par phye ba yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par phye ba yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo //
translated: It is the arising of the movement of the wheel that is distributed throughout all world systems.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: de la mdor bsdu na /
analyzed: de la mdor bsdu na /
translated: In brief,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i phyir yang dag par rgyu zhing 'byung ngo //
translated: the activity of the body, speech, and mind of the bodhisattva who has attained this bodhisattva bhūmi of Perfect Joy is the arising of the movement of the wheel that is distributed throughout all world systems in order to gather together all the qualities of the buddhas.”

original: de ltar des byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar des byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
translated: “Thus, through attaining this bodhisattva bhūmi, the Immovable, he is endowed with the power of a stable intention because he is free from all the movements of the afflictions.

original: lam dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yin /🔽sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
analyzed: lam dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yin / sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with the power of a stable superior intention because he is never separated from the path.🔽He is endowed with the power of a stable great compassion because he never abandons the welfare of sentient beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /🔽nyams pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi stobs shin @181a *//
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin / nyams pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi stobs shin @181a *//
translated: He is endowed with the power of a stable great love because he protects all beings.

original: tu brtan pa yin /
analyzed: tu brtan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with the power of a stable dhāraṇī because he is endowed with the Dharma of nonregression.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag la mkhas pa'i phyir spobs pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag la mkhas pa'i phyir spobs pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with the power of a stable eloquence because he is skilled in the specific divisions of all the buddhadharmas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par spyod pa'i rnam pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par spyod pa'i rnam pa la mkhas pas mngon par shes pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
translated: They have the very stable power of preternatural knowledge, being skilled in the ways of conduct in infinite world systems.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas smon lam gyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas smon lam gyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
translated: They have the very stable power of aspiration, never abandoning any bodhisattva activity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs shin tu brtan pa yin /
translated: They have the very stable power of the perfections, accomplishing all the qualities of buddhahood.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad du mngon du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad du mngon du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs shin tu brtan pa yin te /
translated: They have the very stable power of the blessing of the tathagatas, having actualized omniscient wisdom in all its aspects.

original: de de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas bya ba thams cad kyang yang dag par ston la /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas bya ba thams cad kyang yang dag par ston la /
translated: “ With such power, they manifest all activities.

original: bya ba thams cad la kha na ma tho ba'ang med pa yin /
analyzed: bya ba thams cad la kha na ma tho ba'ang med pa yin /
translated: And yet they are without any wrongdoing in any activity.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “ O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sa brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sa brgyad pa ste /
translated: This is the eighth bodhisattva ground, the Immovable.

original: mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the immovable stage because it is unshakable.

original: ye shes mi zlog pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes mi zlog pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the unchanging stage because it is unchangeable.🔽It is called the difficult to conquer stage because it is difficult for all beings to know.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' bas na thob par dka' ba'i sa zhes bya'o; ;kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' bas na thob par dka' ba'i sa zhes bya'o; ;kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the stage of youth because it is without fault.

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin dbang bsgyur bas skye ba'i sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin dbang bsgyur bas skye ba'i sa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the stage of birth because it is the mastery of the will.

original: gzod bya ba med pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa @181b zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzod bya ba med pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa @181b zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the stage of completion because it is without action.

original: ye shes kyis rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pas mthar thug pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyis rnam par dbye ba shin tu byas pas mthar thug pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the stage of culmination because it is the ultimate of wisdom.

original: smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the stage of nirvana because it is the accomplishment of the vow.

original: gzhan gyis rnam par mi 'khrugs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rnam par mi 'khrugs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the stage of blessing because it is undisturbed by others.

original: sngon gyi mtha' mngon par bsgrubs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' mngon par bsgrubs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the stage of spontaneity because it is the accomplishment of the past.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the Victorious One,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: In this way, bodhisattvas, who have accomplished such wisdom,

original: sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su song ba /
translated: follow the lineage of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyis shin tu gsal bar gyur ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyis shin tu gsal bar gyur ba /
translated: are illuminated by the qualities of the buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang tshul gyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang tshul gyi rjes su song ba /
translated: follow the conduct, behavior, and way of life of the thus-gone ones,

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon du gyur pa de ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon du gyur pa de ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis shin tu brlabs pa yin /
translated: and are constantly and uninterruptedly blessed by the thus-gone ones.

original: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon pos rab tu bsu ba yin /
analyzed: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon pos rab tu bsu ba yin /
translated: They are welcomed by Śakra, Brahmā, and the guardians of the world.

original: lag na rdo rje rtag par rjes su 'brang ba yin /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rtag par rjes su 'brang ba yin /
translated: They are always followed by Vajrapāṇi.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su ma btang ba yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su ma btang ba yin /
translated: They do not give up the power of absorption.

original: lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pa mngon par grub pa yin /
analyzed: lus rnam par phye ba tshad med pa mngon par grub pa yin /
translated: They have accomplished the infinite division of bodies.

original: lus kyi spyod pa'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: lus kyi spyod pa'i stobs thams cad dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They possess the power of physical conduct.

original: mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par smin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par smin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin /
translated: He has perfected the ripening of great superknowledge.

original: ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba yin /
translated: He has mastered infinite samādhis.

original: lung bstan pa tshad med pa yang dag par nod pa yin /🔽yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la mngon par 'tshang @182a *//
analyzed: lung bstan pa tshad med pa yang dag par nod pa yin / yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la mngon par 'tshang @182a *//
translated: He has received countless prophecies.🔽He has manifested the attainment of buddhahood in accordance with the ripening of beings.

original: rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin te /
analyzed: rgya ba yongs su ston pa yin te /
translated: He has taught the Dharma to beings in accordance with their aspirations.🔽He has the power of the great superknowledges.🔽He has the power of the great strengths.🔽He has the power of the great fearlessnesses.🔽He has the power of the great discernments.

original: de de lta bu'i sa dang ldan zhing theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa shin tu rnam par dpyad pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa chen po dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab snang ba'i 'od zer gtong ba /🔽chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i lam du zhugs pa /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i sa dang ldan zhing theg pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa shin tu rnam par dpyad pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa chen po dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab snang ba'i 'od zer gtong ba / chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i lam du zhugs pa /
translated: He has the power of the great aspirations.🔽He has the power of the great samādhis.🔽He has the power of the great liberations.🔽He has the power of the great dhāraṇīs.🔽He has the power of the great wisdoms.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lam rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lam rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa /
translated: He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great love.🔽He has the power of the great equanimity.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.🔽He has the power of the great compassion.

original: yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa rang gi sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba /
analyzed: yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa rang gi sems bskyed pa la dbang bsgyur ba /
translated: They are masters of the generation of their own minds, which manifests all aspects of good qualities.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can /
translated: They have the wisdom that fully realizes the past and the future.

original: bdud kyi lam thams cad yongs su bzlog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang spyod yul gyi rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas shing mu med pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis spyod pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems
analyzed: bdud kyi lam thams cad yongs su bzlog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang spyod yul gyi rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas shing mu med pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis spyod pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems
translated: They have the wisdom that turns away from all the paths of Mara.

original: dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob pa yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob pa yin zhes bya'o //
translated: They have entered the domain and sphere of activity of the tathagatas. They practice bodhisattva conduct in the infinite, limitless world systems by means of the irreversible way. Therefore, those bodhisattvas are said to have attained the bodhisattva ground Immovable.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba yin /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba yin /
translated: The bodhisattva who has attained the bodhisattva level of The Immovable, by the power of his concentration, always and uninterruptedly sees infinite tathagatas and never loses this vision.

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba mchod cing bsnyen @182b bkur ba rgya chen po yang yongs su mi gtong ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba mchod cing bsnyen @182b bkur ba rgya chen po yang yongs su mi gtong ste /

translated: He has attained the treasury of the Dharma of the Tathāgata, and he is unassailable by any questions regarding the classification of world systems.🔽“His roots of virtue have been purified for many eons, for many hundreds of eons, many thousands of eons, many hundreds of thousands of eons, many millions of eons,🔽many billions of eons, many trillions of eons, many quintillions of eons,

original: pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas pa yin /
analyzed: pa khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar shin tu byang ba dang / yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu 'od gsal zhing dang bar gnas pa yin /
translated: many sextillions of eons, many septillions of eons, and many octillions of eons.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

analyzed: dper na / gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pa des yongs su zin par gyur nas /
translated: When that very refined gold is taken by a skilled goldsmith and

original: 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po'i mgul lam /
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag po'i mgul lam /
translated: placed around the neck or on the head of the lord of Jambudvīpa,

original: mgo la btags na sems can 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa kun gyis mi thub mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: mgo la btags na sems can 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa kun gyis mi thub mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: it cannot be surpassed or outshone by any ornaments of all the beings of Jambudvīpa.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bar gyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bar gyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: In the same way, the roots of virtue of a bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi of Unwavering cannot be outshone by those of all śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, up to and including those of bodhisattvas who are on the seventh bodhisattva bhūmi.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sgo shin tu rnam par phye bas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i mun pa rab tu sel to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sgo shin tu rnam par phye bas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i mun pa rab tu sel to //
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, Stainless, with the opening of the door of wisdom, removes the darkness of the kleśas of beings.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: 'di lta ste; dper na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste; dper na /
translated: It is like this:

original: stong la dbang ba'i tshangs pa ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas bkang zhing 'od kyis snang bar byed do //
analyzed: stong la dbang ba'i tshangs pa ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas bkang zhing 'od kyis snang bar byed do //
translated: For example, Brahmā, lord of a billion-world universe, fills the billion-world universe with love and illuminates it with his light.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: de bzhin du byang chub @183b sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub @183b sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, Immovable, fills with light and illuminates world realms as numerous as the atoms in one hundred thousand buddha realms.

original: kyi nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba mthar gyis zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: kyi nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba mthar gyis zhi bar byed do //
translated: He gradually pacifies the torment of the kleśas of beings.

original: lus kyang shin tu tshim par byed do //
analyzed: lus kyang shin tu tshim par byed do //
translated: and it also satisfies the body.

original: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
translated: From among the ten perfections, the perfection of vows is predominant,

original: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: but this is not to say that he does not practice the other perfections in accordance with his ability and in a perfect manner.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: this is the bodhisattva ground called The Immovable.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: This concludes the brief explanation of the eighth bodhisattva ground.

original: rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pas bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o //
translated: If one were to explain it in detail, one would have to explain it until the end of time.

original: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher stong gi bdag po tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te /🔽gzhan zil gyis gnon cing /
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher stong gi bdag po tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te / gzhan zil gyis gnon cing /
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this ground is mostly reborn as a great Brahma king who rules over a chiliocosm.🔽He outshines all others and is not outshone by any.

original: gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa dang / don mthong zhing dbang thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa dang / don mthong zhing dbang thob par 'gyur te /
translated: He sees the meaning and has attained mastery.

original: sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin; 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa yin; 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba yongs su dris pas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: They are unassailable by questions about the classification of world systems.

original: de sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'am /
translated: Whatever roots of virtue they create, whether through generosity,

original: ngag snyan pa'am /🔽don bsgrub pa'am /
analyzed: ngag snyan pa'am / don bsgrub pa'am /
translated: pleasant words,🔽beneficial actions,

original: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba @184a *//🔽gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
analyzed: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba @184a *// gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
translated: or consistency between words and deeds,

original: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /
analyzed: de thams cad ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /
translated: they do so with the thought, ‘How can I become the best,

original: gtso bor 'gyur /🔽thu bor 'gyur /🔽phul du 'gyur /
analyzed: gtso bor 'gyur / thu bor 'gyur / phul du 'gyur /
translated: the foremost,🔽the highest,🔽the most excellent,

original: dam par 'gyur /
analyzed: dam par 'gyur /
translated: the supreme,

original: bla na med par 'gyur /
analyzed: bla na med par 'gyur /
translated: the unsurpassed,

original: 'dren par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dren par 'gyur /
translated: the leader,

original: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
translated: and the protector of all sentient beings, up to the one who supports the wisdom of omniscience?’

original: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
translated: They are never separate from keeping in mind the Buddha, keeping in mind the Dharma, keeping in mind the Saṅgha, keeping in mind the bodhisattvas, keeping in mind the bodhisattva activities, keeping in mind the bodhisattva levels,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
translated: keeping in mind the perfections, keeping in mind the powers, keeping in mind the fearlessnesses, keeping in mind the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
translated: up to keeping in mind omniscient wisdom endowed with all supreme aspects.

original: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob cing /
analyzed: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob cing /
translated: “If they wish, in one instant, in one moment, in one second, they attain as many samādhis as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion world systems.

original: de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong @184b gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang /
analyzed: de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong @184b gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang /
translated: They are: to enter into samādhi; to see buddhas as numerous as the atoms in one trillion worlds; to understand their blessings; to shake worlds as numerous as the atoms in one trillion worlds;

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang / sems can stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang / sems can stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
translated: to go to buddha realms as numerous as the atoms in one trillion worlds; to illuminate worlds as numerous as the atoms in one trillion worlds; to ripen beings as numerous as the atoms in one trillion worlds;

original: bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang /
translated: They strive to remain for as many eons as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion of world systems, and to engage in the past and future for as many eons as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion of world systems.

original: chos kyi sgo stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir brtson /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang / lus stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir brtson /
translated: They strive to open a hundred thousand quintillion of Dharma doors, to manifest a hundred thousand quintillion of bodies, and to manifest a retinue of bodhisattvas equal to the number of atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion of world systems for each body.

original: 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
analyzed: 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
translated: They are dedicated to such an array of diligence.

original: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
analyzed: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
translated: From this point on, the bodhisattvas, by the power of their vows, manifest in various ways through the power of their vows.

original: de dag gi lus sam /
analyzed: de dag gi lus sam /
translated: Their bodies,

original: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
analyzed: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
translated: their light, their miracles,

original: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
analyzed: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
translated: their eyes, their range of action,

original: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
analyzed: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
translated: their voices, their conduct,

original: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
analyzed: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
translated: their adornments, their transformations,

original: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / @185a *//
analyzed: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / @185a *//
translated: their aspirations, and their manifestations cannot be enumerated even in many eons,

original: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
analyzed: bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar gyis kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
translated: even in many hundreds of eons, even in many thousands of eons, even in many hundreds of thousands of eons.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajra garbha, in order to analyze and demonstrate this very meaning of the stages, at that time spoke these verses:

original: de dag sa bdun shes rab thabs kyis lam sbyangs shing;/
analyzed: de dag sa bdun shes rab thabs kyis lam sbyangs shing;/
translated: “Having trained on the seven stages in the path of wisdom and means,

original: shin tu tshogs bsags smon lam chen po rab btab pa //
analyzed: shin tu tshogs bsags smon lam chen po rab btab pa //
translated: They have made great aspirations and accumulated a great deal of merit.

original: mi yi dam pas byin brlabs dge ba'i rtsa ldan zhing //
analyzed: mi yi dam pas byin brlabs dge ba'i rtsa ldan zhing //
translated: They are blessed by the supreme ones among men and have the roots of virtue.

original: ye shes mngon 'dod mkhas pa brgyad pa yongs su gnon //
analyzed: ye shes mngon 'dod mkhas pa brgyad pa yongs su gnon //
translated: They are skilled in pursuing wisdom and have attained the eighth bhūmi.

original: bsod nams ye shes nyer bsags snying rje byams ldan zhing //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes nyer bsags snying rje byams ldan zhing //
translated: They have accumulated merit and wisdom, and have compassion and love.

original: tshad med sems kyi rjes srong mkhas dang 'dra ba'i blo //
analyzed: tshad med sems kyi rjes srong mkhas dang 'dra ba'i blo //
translated: They have the mind of infinite love and are skilled in their intelligence.

original: drang srong chen po chos thos rtogs pa'i stobs ldan pa //
analyzed: drang srong chen po chos thos rtogs pa'i stobs ldan pa //
translated: They are great sages who have heard the Dharma and have the power of realization.

original: mi skye ba yi bzod pa phra zhing zhi ba rab tu 'thob //
analyzed: mi skye ba yi bzod pa phra zhing zhi ba rab tu 'thob //
translated: They attain the subtle and peaceful acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena.🔽They understand that phenomena are unborn, do not arise, are without characteristics,

original: snga nas ma skyes mi skye mtshan nyid med pa dang // ma byung 'jig pa med cing rgyu ba med pa dang // dngos po skye 'jig med pa'i de nyid rtog med pa //
analyzed: snga nas ma skyes mi skye mtshan nyid med pa dang // ma byung 'jig pa med cing rgyu ba med pa dang // dngos po skye 'jig med pa'i de nyid rtog med pa //
translated: Do not come into being, do not cease, and are not subject to change.

original: yid dang sems kyi rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra //
analyzed: yid dang sems kyi rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra //
translated: They are without conceptual thoughts and are like space.

original: de dag 'di 'dra'i bzod ldan spros pa med gyur pa'i //
analyzed: de dag 'di 'dra'i bzod ldan spros pa med gyur pa'i //
translated: They have such patience and are free from conceptual elaboration.

original: mkhas pa zab spyod zhi ba'i gnas rab thob pa yin //
analyzed: mkhas pa zab spyod zhi ba'i gnas rab thob pa yin //
translated: The wise ones have attained the profound conduct and the state of peace.

original: dgra bcom rang rgyal 'gro ba kun gyi shes par dka'//
analyzed: dgra bcom rang rgyal 'gro ba kun gyi shes par dka'//
translated: “Arhats, pratyekabuddhas, and all beings find it difficult to understand.

original: mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsal //
analyzed: mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsal //
translated: It is free from the perception of grasping at various signs.

original: de ltar gnas pa'i yid dang sems dang rtog pa med //
analyzed: de ltar gnas pa'i yid dang sems dang rtog pa med //
translated: In that way, there is no mind, thought, or concept that abides.

original: dge slong 'gog @185b dang ldan ltar rnam par mi rtog thob //
analyzed: dge slong 'gog @185b dang ldan ltar rnam par mi rtog thob //
translated: Like a monk who has attained cessation, it is nonconceptual.

original: rmi lam chus khyer gnyid sad bzhin du rtsol dang bral //
analyzed: rmi lam chus khyer gnyid sad bzhin du rtsol dang bral //
translated: Like someone who is carried away by water in a dream and then wakes up, it is free from effort.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas kyi 'dod pa ji bzhin gnyis kyang med //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas kyi 'dod pa ji bzhin gnyis kyang med //
translated: Like the desire for the abode of Brahmā, it is free from duality.

original: sngon gyi byin gyis bde gshegs yang dag bskul ba mdzad //
analyzed: sngon gyi byin gyis bde gshegs yang dag bskul ba mdzad //
translated: The Sugata of the past has given rise to the blessings.

original: 'di ni bde gshegs dbang bskur bzod pa dam pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni bde gshegs dbang bskur bzod pa dam pa ste //
translated: This is the supreme patience of the Sugata’s empowerment.

original: nged kyi ye shes stobs yangs sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams //
analyzed: nged kyi ye shes stobs yangs sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams //
translated: “Our vast power of wisdom and the qualities of buddhahood

original: de dag khyod la med kyi de la brtson 'grus rtsom //
analyzed: de dag khyod la med kyi de la brtson 'grus rtsom //
translated: do not exist in you, so you must make an effort in that.

original: ci phan khyad kyi nyon mongs 'bar ba kun zhi yang //
analyzed: ci phan khyad kyi nyon mongs 'bar ba kun zhi yang //
translated: What is the use of extinguishing the blazing afflictions

original: 'jig rten nyon mongs mes tshig de dag mi lta'am //
analyzed: 'jig rten nyon mongs mes tshig de dag mi lta'am //
translated: if you do not look at the world burning in the fire of afflictions?🔽“

original: sems can phan phyir spyad pa'i sngon gyi smon lam soms //
analyzed: sems can phan phyir spyad pa'i sngon gyi smon lam soms //
translated: “Think of your previous aspirations to benefit beings!

original: 'gro ba mthar rgyur ye shes don zhugs shes par gyis //
analyzed: 'gro ba mthar rgyur ye shes don zhugs shes par gyis //
translated: Know that you have entered the meaning of wisdom for the sake of the ultimate goal of beings!

original: chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'di mi rtog rtag tu 'dug /
analyzed: chos nyid de bzhin nyid 'di mi rtog rtag tu 'dug /
translated: This reality, suchness, is nonconceptual and always present.

original: sa 'di rgyal ba nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyi ste //
analyzed: sa 'di rgyal ba nyan thos rang rgyal kun gyi ste //
translated: “This bhūmi is that of all the jinas, śrāvakas, and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'dis ni 'jig rten dag tu stobs bcu mi brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'jig rten dag tu stobs bcu mi brjod do //
translated: The ten strengths are not proclaimed in the world.

original: gzhan du ye shes yangs pa dus gsum tshad kyis brjod //
analyzed: gzhan du ye shes yangs pa dus gsum tshad kyis brjod //
translated: “The vast wisdom is proclaimed by the measure of the three times.

original: de ltar de la mtshungs med lha dang mis mchod pa //
analyzed: de ltar de la mtshungs med lha dang mis mchod pa //
translated: Thus, you are incomparable, worshipped by gods and humans,

original: ye shes sgo mo rnam mang nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad //
analyzed: ye shes sgo mo rnam mang nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad //
translated: And you have accomplished the many doors of wisdom.

original: rgyal ba'i chos sgrub pha rol mtha' yas gzhug mdzad pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i chos sgrub pha rol mtha' yas gzhug mdzad pa //
translated: “You have entered the infinite other side of accomplishing the Dharma of the jinas.

original: de la sngon gyi byang chub spyod pas char mi 'gro //
analyzed: de la sngon gyi byang chub spyod pas char mi 'gro //
translated: The conduct of previous bodhisattvas does not compare.🔽“Having attained this supreme bhūmi of wisdom, the supreme leader

original: khyu mchog de dag ye shes sa mchog 'di thob nas; ;phyogs rnams kun tu skad cig gcig gis rgyas 'gengs pa //
analyzed: khyu mchog de dag ye shes sa mchog 'di thob nas; ;phyogs rnams kun tu skad cig gcig gis rgyas 'gengs pa //
translated: Fills all the directions in an instant.

original: ye shes zhugs dang ldan zhing mngon shes mchog thob pas //
analyzed: ye shes zhugs dang ldan zhing mngon shes mchog thob pas //
translated: “Endowed with the entry to wisdom and having attained the highest higher cognition,

original: rgya mtsho cher phyin gru chen rlung gis bkur ba @186a *//
analyzed: rgya mtsho cher phyin gru chen rlung gis bkur ba @186a *//
translated: Like a great ship on the ocean, driven by the wind,

original: bzhin // ched du bskyod sems bral zhing ye shes las la gnas //
analyzed: bzhin // ched du bskyod sems bral zhing ye shes las la gnas //
translated: They are free from any deliberate thought, and abide in the activity of wisdom.

original: zhing rnams 'byung zhing gnas pa rnam par dpyod pa byed //
analyzed: zhing rnams 'byung zhing gnas pa rnam par dpyod pa byed //
translated: They analyze the arising and abiding of the realms,🔽The four elements, their different colors, their vastness,

original: khams rnams bzhi po kha dog tha dad yangs pa dang // phra zhing che dang rnam par phye la yang dag 'jug /
analyzed: khams rnams bzhi po kha dog tha dad yangs pa dang // phra zhing che dang rnam par phye la yang dag 'jug /
translated: Their subtlety, their magnitude, and their differentiation.

original: stong gsum shin tu rdul phra kun la 'jug byed de /
analyzed: stong gsum shin tu rdul phra kun la 'jug byed de /
translated: They penetrate all the atoms of the trichiliocosm,🔽The differentiation of the bodies of beings in the four realms,

original: khams bzhi 'gro ba'i lus rnams rnam par phye ba dang // rgyud drug rin chen rnam par phye ba'i rdul phran rnams //
analyzed: khams bzhi 'gro ba'i lus rnams rnam par phye ba dang // rgyud drug rin chen rnam par phye ba'i rdul phran rnams //
translated: And the atoms of the differentiation of the six classes of beings.

original: rnam par phye zhing ye shes yul gyis ma lus 'brang //
analyzed: rnam par phye zhing ye shes yul gyis ma lus 'brang //
translated: They penetrate them all with the domain of wisdom.

original: ye shes rnam bsgoms yid ldan lus rnams thams cad du //
analyzed: ye shes rnam bsgoms yid ldan lus rnams thams cad du //
translated: Those who have the mind of wisdom meditation,

original: 'gro ba'i don phyir rang gi lus rnams gzud par byed //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don phyir rang gi lus rnams gzud par byed //
translated: In order to benefit beings, enter all bodies.

original: stong gsum thams cad sna tshogs gzugs kyis khyab byas shing //
analyzed: stong gsum thams cad sna tshogs gzugs kyis khyab byas shing //
translated: They pervade all the trichiliocosm with various forms,

original: 'jig rten mtha' yas dag tu sna tshogs lus kyang ston //
analyzed: 'jig rten mtha' yas dag tu sna tshogs lus kyang ston //
translated: In infinite worlds they manifest various bodies.

original: bar snang mkha' la nyi zla rlung gi rgyu 'gro yang //
analyzed: bar snang mkha' la nyi zla rlung gi rgyu 'gro yang //
translated: The sun and moon move through the sky by the power of wind,

original: so so'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan chu dkyil rab tu snang //
analyzed: so so'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan chu dkyil rab tu snang //
translated: And their reflections appear in all the water vessels.🔽In the same way, the supreme wisdom of the immovable ones

original: de bzhin mi g-yo'i chos la ye shes dam pas rgyu; ;bsam dag 'gro ba rnams la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan snang //
analyzed: de bzhin mi g-yo'i chos la ye shes dam pas rgyu; ;bsam dag 'gro ba rnams la mkhas pa'i gzugs brnyan snang //
translated: Appears in the reflections of the bodies of the wise in pure worlds.

original: 'gro ba'i bsam pa bzhin du lus kyi rnam phye ba //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bsam pa bzhin du lus kyi rnam phye ba //
translated: They manifest bodies in accordance with the aspirations of beings,

original: mi dang lha yi 'khor rnams kun tu ston par byed //
analyzed: mi dang lha yi 'khor rnams kun tu ston par byed //
translated: And they appear in the retinues of humans and gods.🔽They manifest the bodies of hearers, solitary buddhas, and bodhisattvas,

original: nyan thos rang rgyal bde gshegs sras kyi lus rnams dang // bde bar gshegs sku yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston //
analyzed: nyan thos rang rgyal bde gshegs sras kyi lus rnams dang // bde bar gshegs sku yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston //
translated: And the bodies of sugatas with their eight features.

original: sems can zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnam smin lus //
analyzed: sems can zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnam smin lus //
translated: They manifest bodies of sentient beings, and likewise bodies of fields and karmic ripening,

original: 'phags lus @186b sna tshogs de bzhin chos dang ye shes lus //
analyzed: 'phags lus @186b sna tshogs de bzhin chos dang ye shes lus //
translated: And various bodies of noble ones, as well as bodies of Dharma and wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i lus dang mnyam pa nyid du khyu mchog ldan //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus dang mnyam pa nyid du khyu mchog ldan //
translated: They are supreme in having bodies equal to the sky.

original: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'gro ba tshim par bya phyir ston //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'gro ba tshim par bya phyir ston //
translated: They display various miracles to satisfy beings.

original: dbang bcu dri ma med pa'i ye shes dpyod pa thob //
analyzed: dbang bcu dri ma med pa'i ye shes dpyod pa thob //
translated: They attain the ten masteries, the analysis of stainless pristine consciousness,

original: ye shes spyod dang las rnams snying rje mthun pa'ang thob //
analyzed: ye shes spyod dang las rnams snying rje mthun pa'ang thob //
translated: The conduct of pristine consciousness, and the activities of compassion.

original: las rnams ji snyed rgyal ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsgrub //
analyzed: las rnams ji snyed rgyal ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsgrub //
translated: As many activities as there are, they accomplish the qualities of the Victor.

original: sdom pa gsum la gnas shing mi g-yo ri rab bzhin //
analyzed: sdom pa gsum la gnas shing mi g-yo ri rab bzhin //
translated: Abiding in the three vows, they are immovable like Mount Meru.

original: rgyal sras rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyod par mi nus pa //
analyzed: rgyal sras rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyod par mi nus pa //
translated: The ten powers of the Victor’s heirs cannot be shaken.

original: de dag kun nas bdud rnams kun gyi yong mi zlog /
analyzed: de dag kun nas bdud rnams kun gyi yong mi zlog /
translated: They are not overcome by any of the māras.

original: sangs rgyas byin brlabs brgya byin tshangs pas phyag kyang bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byin brlabs brgya byin tshangs pas phyag kyang bya //
translated: Śakra and Brahmā bow down to the Buddha’s blessing.

original: lag na rdo rje'i dpung rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje'i dpung rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang //
translated: The hosts of Vajrapāṇis always follow behind.

original: sa phyogs 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te //
analyzed: sa phyogs 'di la gnas pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te //
translated: The qualities that abide in this ground are limitless.

original: de dag bskal pa khrag khrig stong gis zad mi nus //
analyzed: de dag bskal pa khrag khrig stong gis zad mi nus //
translated: They cannot be exhausted in a trillion eons.

original: de dag sangs rgyas bye ba bsnyen bkur yang byed pas //
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas bye ba bsnyen bkur yang byed pas //
translated: They serve ten million buddhas.

original: rgyal po'i mgo la 'dug pa'i rgyan bzhin shin tu gsal //
analyzed: rgyal po'i mgo la 'dug pa'i rgyan bzhin shin tu gsal //
translated: And is as clear as an ornament on the head of a king.

original: sa phyogs 'di gnas byang chub sems dpa' shes ldan pa //
analyzed: sa phyogs 'di gnas byang chub sems dpa' shes ldan pa //
translated: “The wise bodhisattvas who live in this bhūmi

original: stong gi bdag po tshangs chen yon tan mang por 'gyur //
analyzed: stong gi bdag po tshangs chen yon tan mang por 'gyur //
translated: Become Mahābrahmās, lords of a thousandfold worlds, with many good qualities.

original: theg pa gsum ston yongs su mi 'khrugs mi 'phrogs te //
analyzed: theg pa gsum ston yongs su mi 'khrugs mi 'phrogs te //
translated: They teach the three vehicles without being disturbed or agitated.

original: 'od bzang byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel //🔽skad cig gcig tu stong phrag bcu yi zhing rnams kyi //
analyzed: 'od bzang byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel // skad cig gcig tu stong phrag bcu yi zhing rnams kyi //
translated: With their beautiful light and loving thoughts, they clear away the defilements of beings.🔽In a single instant, they attain as many samādhis

original: rdul khams ji snyed de snyed ting 'dzin ldan pa thob //
analyzed: rdul khams ji snyed de snyed ting 'dzin ldan pa thob //
translated: As there are atoms in a hundred thousand worlds.

original: phyogs bcu'i sems can gtso bo de snyed mang po mthong //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sems can gtso bo de snyed mang po mthong //
translated: They see that many principal beings in the ten directions.

original: yan chad smon lam mchog gi rgyan can @187a *//
analyzed: yan chad smon lam mchog gi rgyan can @187a *//
translated: “And more, adorned with the supreme of prayers,

original: gcig min no //
analyzed: gcig min no //
translated: Not just one.

original: 'di ni mdor bsdus rgyal sras kyi //
analyzed: 'di ni mdor bsdus rgyal sras kyi //
translated: This is a brief teaching

original: sa brgyad shin tu bstan pa ste //
analyzed: sa brgyad shin tu bstan pa ste //
translated: Of the eight bhūmis of the bodhisattvas.

original: rgya chen bskal pa bye bar yang //
analyzed: rgya chen bskal pa bye bar yang //
translated: Even in many millions of eons,

original: thams cad mthar phyin mi nus so //
analyzed: thams cad mthar phyin mi nus so //
translated: One would not be able to fully describe them.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa ste /
translated: This was the eighth bodhisattva bhūmi,

original: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'o ////🔽bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa /
analyzed: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'o //// bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa /
translated: It is called Immovable.

original: sa yi dam pa 'di bshad tshe //
analyzed: sa yi dam pa 'di bshad tshe //
translated: When this stage was explained,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
translated: through the blessing of the Tathāgata,

original: tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
analyzed: tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
translated: inconceivable, immeasurable

original: bye ba'i zhing rnams g-yos par 'gyur //
analyzed: bye ba'i zhing rnams g-yos par 'gyur //
translated: millions of realms shook.

original: thams cad gzigs pa'i sku las kyang //
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pa'i sku las kyang //
translated: From the body of the Omniscient One

original: 'od zer yid du 'ong ba bkye //
analyzed: 'od zer yid du 'ong ba bkye //
translated: a beautiful light was emitted

original: des ni zhing rnams snang bar byas //
analyzed: des ni zhing rnams snang bar byas //
translated: which illuminated the realms

original: sems can rnams kyang bde bar gyur //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang bde bar gyur //
translated: and brought happiness to sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' stong snyed kyang //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' stong snyed kyang //
translated: Thousands of bodhisattvas

original: bar snang gnas la 'khod gyur te //🔽lha rdzas lhag pa'i mchod pa yis //
analyzed: bar snang gnas la 'khod gyur te // lha rdzas lhag pa'i mchod pa yis //
translated: gathered in the sky🔽and made offerings to the supreme teacher

original: gsung ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed //
analyzed: gsung ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed //
translated: with offerings surpassing those of the gods.🔽The lord of gods, Maheśvara,

original: lha yi rgyal po dbang phyug dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyang dga' bar gyur //
analyzed: lha yi rgyal po dbang phyug dang // dbang sgyur rnams kyang dga' bar gyur //
translated: and Vaśavartin were delighted🔽and made offerings to the ocean of qualities

original: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //🔽yon tan rgya mtsho mchod pa byed //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis // yon tan rgya mtsho mchod pa byed //
translated: with various kinds of offerings.

original: de nas lha yi bu mo stong //
analyzed: de nas lha yi bu mo stong //
translated: Then thousands of celestial maidens,

original: dga' zhing dbang po bder gyur pas //
analyzed: dga' zhing dbang po bder gyur pas //
translated: delighted and with blissful senses,

original: sbyar legs snyan pa'i glu yi dbyangs //
analyzed: sbyar legs snyan pa'i glu yi dbyangs //
translated: And the sound of beautiful songs,

original: ston pa mchod pa'i don du len //
analyzed: ston pa mchod pa'i don du len //
translated: I will take them all to offer to the Teacher.

original: rol mo'i sgra dbyangs de dag las //
analyzed: rol mo'i sgra dbyangs de dag las //
translated: From the sounds of those musical instruments,

original: drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
translated: Through the blessing of the great sage,

original: 'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs stong snyed du //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs stong snyed du //
translated: Sounds like these, in a thousand melodies,

original: snyan pa'i dbyangs su grags par gyur //
analyzed: snyan pa'i dbyangs su grags par gyur //
translated: Will resound as beautiful songs.

original: zhi dul rab zhi dri ma thams cad med gyur cing //
analyzed: zhi dul rab zhi dri ma thams cad med gyur cing //
translated: Peaceful, disciplined, and completely pacified, free from all stains,

original: sa yi @187b mchog dang ldan pas spyod pa legs spyod pa //
analyzed: sa yi @187b mchog dang ldan pas spyod pa legs spyod pa //
translated: Possessing the supreme bhūmis, they practice well.

original: phyogs bcur 'gro la phan par spyod pa'i khyu mchog rnams //
analyzed: phyogs bcur 'gro la phan par spyod pa'i khyu mchog rnams //
translated: The supreme leaders who benefit beings in the ten directions

original: mkha' dbyings 'dra ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod pa ston //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings 'dra ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod pa ston //
translated: Display the conduct of the victors with a mind like the realm of space.

original: mi yi gnas dang lha yi gnas dang klu gnas su //
analyzed: mi yi gnas dang lha yi gnas dang klu gnas su //
translated: In the abodes of humans, the abodes of gods, and the abodes of nāgas,

original: phyogs bcur bsod nams stobs kyis rgyan rnams mang po byung //
analyzed: phyogs bcur bsod nams stobs kyis rgyan rnams mang po byung //
translated: In the ten directions, through the power of merit, many ornaments appear.

original: de las yang du rgyal sras ye shes la mos pa //
analyzed: de las yang du rgyal sras ye shes la mos pa //
translated: From them, the bodhisattvas, devoted to wisdom,

original: rgyal ba'i yon tan bsngags pa rgya chen rab tu ston //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i yon tan bsngags pa rgya chen rab tu ston //
translated: Proclaim the extensive praises of the qualities of the victors.

original: zhing gcig ma g-yos rdul med zhing rnams thams cad du //
analyzed: zhing gcig ma g-yos rdul med zhing rnams thams cad du //
translated: Without moving from one buddha realm, they are in all buddha realms,

original: 'gro la phan byed zla ba lta bu'i 'od ldan pa //
analyzed: 'gro la phan byed zla ba lta bu'i 'od ldan pa //
translated: Benefiting beings, like the moon reflected in water.🔽They know all sounds as the voice of the Buddha, and with a peaceful mind and a clear intellect,

original: thams cad dbyangs su 'du shes sems zhi yid rab kyis; ;so so skad bzhin sgra skad brgya yang rnam par brjod //
analyzed: thams cad dbyangs su 'du shes sems zhi yid rab kyis; ;so so skad bzhin sgra skad brgya yang rnam par brjod //
translated: They speak in the languages of all beings, in hundreds of thousands of languages.

original: sems can gang rnams blo zhan sems yid dmar gyur pa //
analyzed: sems can gang rnams blo zhan sems yid dmar gyur pa //
translated: To those beings whose minds are weak, whose minds are red,

original: de la mkhas pa khyu mchog nyan thos spyod pa ston //
