analyzed: de la mkhas pa khyu mchog nyan thos spyod pa ston //
translated: The wise ones, the best of beings, teach the way of the śrāvakas.

original: sems can gang rnams sems rno rang rgyal theg brtson pa //
analyzed: sems can gang rnams sems rno rang rgyal theg brtson pa //
translated: To those beings whose minds are sharp, who are intent on the vehicle of the solitary buddhas,

original: de la rdul med rang rgyal theg pa'i ye shes sten //
analyzed: de la rdul med rang rgyal theg pa'i ye shes sten //
translated: They teach the wisdom of the vehicle of the solitary buddhas.

original: sems can gang rnams phan sems snying rje brtse yid can //
analyzed: sems can gang rnams phan sems snying rje brtse yid can //
translated: To those beings who have a compassionate mind, who have a mind of love and kindness,

original: de la de dag rgyal sras spyod pa'i mchog kyang ston //
analyzed: de la de dag rgyal sras spyod pa'i mchog kyang ston //
translated: They teach the supreme conduct of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can gang rnams blo mchog dam pa'i yid mos pa //
analyzed: sems can gang rnams blo mchog dam pa'i yid mos pa //
translated: To those beings who have the highest aspiration, who have a holy mind,

original: de la mkhas pa tshad med sangs rgyas sku ston to //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa tshad med sangs rgyas sku ston to //
translated: The wise ones teach the immeasurable body of the Buddha.

original: ji ltar sgyu mkhan 'gro ba rnams la sgyu ston pa //
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu mkhan 'gro ba rnams la sgyu ston pa //
translated: Just as a magician shows illusions to people,

original: lus mang bye ba sna tshogs de dag dngos po med //
analyzed: lus mang bye ba sna tshogs de dag dngos po med //
translated: And those many millions of bodies are not real.

original: de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa ye shes sgyu mkhas pa //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa ye shes sgyu mkhas pa //
translated: In the same way, the wise bodhisattvas, skilled in the illusion of wisdom,

original: spyod pa thams cad ston kyang de dag dngos po med //🔽'di 'dra'i @188a *//
analyzed: spyod pa thams cad ston kyang de dag dngos po med // 'di 'dra'i @188a *//
translated: Demonstrate all kinds of conduct, but it is not real.

original: sgra skad brgya stong du //
analyzed: sgra skad brgya stong du //
translated: In this way, with hundreds of thousands of melodious voices,

original: snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
analyzed: snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
translated: They spoke these pleasing words.

original: lha yi bu mo mi smra bar //
analyzed: lha yi bu mo mi smra bar //
translated: Then the daughters of the gods fell silent,

original: zhi la mos pas rgyal ba lta //
analyzed: zhi la mos pas rgyal ba lta //
translated: And with a peaceful attitude, they looked at the Victorious One.

original: 'khor rnams rnam par dang bas na /
analyzed: 'khor rnams rnam par dang bas na /
translated: The retinue was filled with faith,

original: bde gshegs sras la yang smras pa //
analyzed: bde gshegs sras la yang smras pa //
translated: And they also spoke to the children of the Sugata:

original: dam chos spyod pa'i spyod pa rnams //
analyzed: dam chos spyod pa'i spyod pa rnams //
translated: “Please teach the conduct of practicing the sublime Dharma

original: brgyad pa'i gong du yang gsungs shig /
analyzed: brgyad pa'i gong du yang gsungs shig /
translated: Even higher than the eighth stage.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vajra garbha said:

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag; de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ni de lta bu'i blo tshad med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pas de nas gong du rnam par thar pa zhi ba la mos par zhe non
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag; de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ni de lta bu'i blo tshad med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pas de nas gong du rnam par thar pa zhi ba la mos par zhe non
translated: “O children of the Victorious One, in this way, the bodhisattva who is on the eighth bodhisattva ground, through the wisdom of such immeasurable intelligence, has analyzed things.

original: cing / de nas gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnam par dpyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i che ba nyid rnam par dbye ba dang /
analyzed: cing / de nas gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnam par dpyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i che ba nyid rnam par dbye ba dang /
translated: Then, he is interested in the higher, peaceful liberation, and he enters into the analysis of the wisdom of the tathāgatas, which is completely perfected, and he enters into the engagement with the secret of the tathāgatas, the analysis of the greatness of inconceivable wisdom,

original: gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rab tu dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba khong du chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
analyzed: gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin rab tu dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba khong du chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
translated: the purification of the analysis of dhāraṇī and samādhi, the accomplishment of the vast higher perceptions, the comprehension of the analysis of the world systems, the power of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su mi 'phrogs pa sbyang bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su mi 'phrogs pa sbyang bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
translated: the powers, the fearlessnesses, the unique qualities of a buddha, and the knowledge of all aspects, and to purify the qualities of the tathāgatas, the turning of the wheel of the Dharma, and the display of the power of the lord of the herd,

original: snying rje chen @188b po'i mthu phyung ba yongs su mi gtong bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa yongs su gnon te /
analyzed: snying rje chen @188b po'i mthu phyung ba yongs su mi gtong bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa yongs su gnon te /
translated: and to not give up the power of great compassion, he conquers the ninth bodhisattva bhūmi, that of The One of Brilliant Intelligence.

original: de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: “When he is on this bodhisattva bhūmi,

original: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang; lung du ma bstan pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang; lung du ma bstan pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: he knows exactly what is virtuous, nonvirtuous, and neutral.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsam du med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /🔽nges pa dang / ma nges pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsam du med pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
translated: He also correctly and thoroughly knew the conditioned phenomena of the world and the unconditioned phenomena of the world, the conditioned phenomena of the world beyond the world and the unconditioned phenomena of the world beyond the world, the conditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas and the unconditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas, the conditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas and the unconditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas, the conditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas and the unconditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas, and the conditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas and the unconditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas.🔽He also correctly and thoroughly knew the conditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas and the unconditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas, the conditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas and the unconditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas, the conditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas and the unconditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas, and the conditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas and the unconditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas.

original: 'dus byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shas  so //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon par 'du bya ba yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shas  so //
translated: He also correctly and thoroughly knew the conditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas and the unconditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas, the conditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas and the unconditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas, the conditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas and the unconditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas, and the conditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas and the unconditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas.🔽He also correctly and thoroughly knew the conditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas and the unconditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas, the conditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas and the unconditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas, the conditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas and the unconditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas, and the conditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas and the unconditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas.🔽He also correctly and thoroughly knew the conditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas and the unconditioned phenomena of the śrāvakas, the conditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas and the unconditioned phenomena of the pratyekabuddhas, the conditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas and the unconditioned phenomena of the bodhisattvas, and the conditioned phenomena of the tathāgatas

original: de de lta bu'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'i blos sems can thams cad kyi sems thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'i blos sems can thams cad kyi sems thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: With a mind that has realized such knowledge, he knows just as it is the deep, dark processes of the minds of all sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / las thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / dbang po thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / mos pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / las thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / dbang po thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / mos pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang /
translated: He knows just as it is the deep, dark processes of the afflictions, the deep, dark processes of karma, the deep, dark processes of the faculties, the deep, dark processes of inclinations, the deep, dark processes of the elements,

original: bsam pa dang bag la @189a *//
analyzed: bsam pa dang bag la @189a *//
translated: the deep, dark processes of intentions and latent tendencies,

original: nyal ba'i thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / skye ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / phung po gsum du rnam par gnas pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyal ba'i thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / skye ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thibs po rab tu rgyu ba dang / phung po gsum du rnam par gnas pa thibs po rab tu rgyu ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: the deep, dark processes of birth, the deep, dark processes of the latent propensities, and the deep, dark processes of the three heaps.

original: de ni sems can rnams kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de ni sems can rnams kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: They know the various minds of sentient beings just as they are.

original: sems rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sems skad cig tu myur du 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang / mi 'jig pa dang / sems lus med pa dang / sems mtha' yas shing thams cad du dbang byed pa dang / sems 'od gsal zhing dang ba dang /
analyzed: sems rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sems skad cig tu myur du 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang / mi 'jig pa dang / sems lus med pa dang / sems mtha' yas shing thams cad du dbang byed pa dang / sems 'od gsal zhing dang ba dang /
translated: They know the various minds, the minds that quickly change from moment to moment, the minds that do not change, the minds that are formless, the minds that are limitless and all-pervading, the minds that are luminous and clear,

original: sems nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / sems nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems bcings pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang; sems sgyu ma lta bur rnam par bsgrub pa dang / sems 'gro ba'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nas /
analyzed: sems nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / sems nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems bcings pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang; sems sgyu ma lta bur rnam par bsgrub pa dang / sems 'gro ba'i rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nas /
translated: the minds that are afflicted, the minds that are unafflicted, the minds that are bound, the minds that are liberated, the minds that are established as being like illusions, the minds that remain in accordance with the mind streams of beings,

original: sems rnam pa sna tshogs stong phrag du ma'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems rnam pa sna tshogs stong phrag du ma'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: and so forth, up to the various minds in the many thousands of ways, just as they are.

original: de ni nyon mongs pa rnams ring du song ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de ni nyon mongs pa rnams ring du song ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: He knows perfectly the far-reaching of the passions,

original: sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lhan cig skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba'i gnas gcig pa dang / sems dang ldan pa dang / mi ldan pa dang / skye ba'i mtshams sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang / lhan cig skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba'i gnas gcig pa dang / sems dang ldan pa dang / mi ldan pa dang / skye ba'i mtshams sbyor ba dang /
translated: their infinity of application, their innate and inseparable nature, their latent and manifest forms, their single basis, their association with and dissociation from the mind, their continuity in the series of lives,

original: lam gyi rgyud @189b ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa dang / khams gsum rnam par phye ba dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zug rngu dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug gi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang /
analyzed: lam gyi rgyud @189b ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa dang / khams gsum rnam par phye ba dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zug rngu dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug gi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang /
translated: their presence in the series of the paths, their division according to the three realms, their great sins of craving, ignorance, and false views, their great sins of pride and delusion,

original: las rnam pa gsum gyi gzhi rgyun mi 'chad pa nas mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du rjes su 'jug par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: las rnam pa gsum gyi gzhi rgyun mi 'chad pa nas mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du rjes su 'jug par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: their continuity as the basis of the three kinds of actions, and in brief, he knows perfectly the eighty-four thousand streams of passions that are to be eliminated.

original: de ni las dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de ni las dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: It is to know correctly what is virtuous, unvirtuous, and neutral.

original: rnam par dmigs pa dang / rnam par mi dmigs pa dang / sems dang lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / rang gi ngang gis skad cig tu rgyus 'byung zhing 'jig la 'bras bu chud mi za bar mtshams sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: rnam par dmigs pa dang / rnam par mi dmigs pa dang / sems dang lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / rang gi ngang gis skad cig tu rgyus 'byung zhing 'jig la 'bras bu chud mi za bar mtshams sbyor ba dang /
translated: It is to know what is conceptual and what is nonconceptual, what is simultaneous with the mind and what is not separate from the mind, what arises naturally, what arises from causes, what disintegrates, what is the continuity of the result of an action that is not lost,

original: rnam par smin pa yod pa dang; rnam par smin pa med pa dang / nag po dang / dkar po dang / mi dkar ba dang / mi gnag pa dang / phyogs du ma'i las yongs su len pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / las kyi zhing tshad med pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa yod pa dang; rnam par smin pa med pa dang / nag po dang / dkar po dang / mi dkar ba dang / mi gnag pa dang / phyogs du ma'i las yongs su len pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / las kyi zhing tshad med pa dang /
translated: what has ripening and what does not have ripening, what is black and what is white, what is not white and what is not black, and what is the acceptance of the manifold actions of the various directions and the immeasurable fields of action.

original: 'phags pa dang / 'jig rten pa rnam par phye ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa dang / nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa dang / 'jig rten pa rnam par phye ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam par dgod pa dang / nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang /
translated: the noble and the worldly, the establishment of supramundane phenomena, that with appropriation and that without appropriation, the conditioned and the unconditioned,

original: tshe 'di dang / skye ba dang / rgyud gzhan du tshor bar 'gyur ba dang / theg pa dang theg pa ma yin par nges pa dang ma nges pa nas /
analyzed: tshe 'di dang / skye ba dang / rgyud gzhan du tshor bar 'gyur ba dang / theg pa dang theg pa ma yin par nges pa dang ma nges pa nas /
translated: the present life, rebirth, and the experience of a different continuum, and the definite and indefinite with regard to the vehicles.

original: @190a *// las rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: @190a *// las rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows in accordance with reality the eighty-four thousand different kinds of karma.

original: de ni dbang po zhan pa dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de ni dbang po zhan pa dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: He knows in accordance with reality the weak, middling, and strong faculties.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar tha dad pa dang / tha mi dad pa dang / yangs pa dang / 'bring dang / tha ma dang / nyon mongs pa dang; lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / theg pa dang /🔽theg pa ma yin par nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'dul ba dang / dbang po'i dra ba'i rjes su 'brang zhing myur du 'jig pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang / dbang po'i dbang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar tha dad pa dang / tha mi dad pa dang / yangs pa dang / 'bring dang / tha ma dang / nyon mongs pa dang; lhan cig tu skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / theg pa dang / theg pa ma yin par nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / yongs su smin pa'i tshul bzhin du 'dul ba dang / dbang po'i dra ba'i rjes su 'brang zhing myur du 'jig pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang / dbang po'i dbang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
translated: the past and the future, being different or not being different, being vast, middling, or small, being simultaneously born and not being different from the afflictions, being certain or uncertain with regard to the vehicle or not being a vehicle, being trained in accordance with the way of ripening, being quickly destroyed by following the net of the senses, being a sign-grasping, being unconquerable by the power of others with regard to the senses,

original: dbang po'i rnam pa phyir bzlog tu rung ba dang / phyir bzlog tu ma rung ba dang / ring du song ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa nas /
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam pa phyir bzlog tu rung ba dang / phyir bzlog tu ma rung ba dang / ring du song ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa nas /
translated: being reversible or not reversible with regard to the aspects of the senses, being far-reaching, being simultaneously born and having various differences,

original: dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows perfectly the eighty-four thousand different kinds of faculties.

original: de ni mos pa zhan pa dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas /
analyzed: de ni mos pa zhan pa dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas /
translated: He knows perfectly the weak, middling, and strong kinds of faith,

original: dbang po'i tshul bzhin du mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dbang po'i tshul bzhin du mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: and he knows perfectly the eighty-four thousand different kinds of faith that are in accordance with the faculties.

original: de ni khams tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas /
analyzed: de ni khams tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas /
translated: He knows perfectly the inferior, middling, and superior elements,

original: @190b khams rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: @190b khams rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: and he knows perfectly the eighty-four thousand different kinds of elements.

original: de ni bsam pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas /
analyzed: de ni bsam pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas /
translated: He knows perfectly the inferior, middling, and superior aspirations,🔽and he knows perfectly the eighty-four thousand different kinds of aspirations.

original: bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag du ma'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa stong phrag du ma'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows in accordance with reality the many thousands of different thoughts.

original: de ni bag la nyal ba rnams bsam pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / sems dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / sems dang ldan pa dang / sems dang mi ldan pa dang / ring du song ba dang / thog ma med pa nas gud du ma bskyod pa dang /
analyzed: de ni bag la nyal ba rnams bsam pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / sems dang lhan cig skyes pa dang / sems dang ldan pa dang / sems dang mi ldan pa dang / ring du song ba dang / thog ma med pa nas gud du ma bskyod pa dang /
translated: He knows the latent tendencies that arise together with thoughts, that arise together with the mind, that are associated with the mind, that are not associated with the mind, that have gone far, that have not moved from the beginningless beginning,

original: bsam gtun dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa bzod par dka' ba dang / khams gsum pa'i mtshams shin tu sbyor ba dang / thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu rgyu bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtun dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa bzod par dka' ba dang / khams gsum pa'i mtshams shin tu sbyor ba dang / thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu rgyu bar byed pa dang /
translated: that are difficult to bear in terms of meditative concentration, liberation, samādhi, meditative absorption, and superknowledge, that are well-connected to the three realms, and that move through the continuum of mind from beginningless time.

original: skye ba'i sgo kun nas 'byung ba rnam par dmigs par byed pa dang / gnyen po thob pas dngos por mi 'gyur ba dang / sa'i skye mched dang phrad pa dang / mi 'phrad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam tha dad pa med pas yang dag par bsal ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽de ni skye ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: skye ba'i sgo kun nas 'byung ba rnam par dmigs par byed pa dang / gnyen po thob pas dngos por mi 'gyur ba dang / sa'i skye mched dang phrad pa dang / mi 'phrad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam tha dad pa med pas yang dag par bsal ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // de ni skye ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born, the various ways of being reborn, the various ways of being conceived, the various ways of being produced, the various ways of being generated, the various ways of being manifested, the various ways of being created, the various ways of being transformed, the various ways of being born from eggs, the various ways of being born from wombs, the various ways of being born from warm moisture, and the various ways of being born miraculously.🔽He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the hells, the various ways of being born as an animal, the various ways of being born as a hungry ghost, the various ways of being born as an asura, the various ways of being born as a human, and the various ways of being born as a god.

original: las ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dvags dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / lha'i gnas rnam par @191a *//
analyzed: las ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dvags dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / lha'i gnas rnam par @191a *//
translated: He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the desire realm, the various ways of being born in the form realm, and the various ways of being born in the formless realm.🔽He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the realm of desire, the various ways of being born in the realm of form, and the various ways of being born in the formless realm.🔽He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the realm of desire, the various ways of being born in the realm of form, and the various ways of being born in the formless realm.🔽He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the realm of desire, the various ways of being born in the realm of form, and the various ways of being born in the formless realm.🔽He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the realm of desire, the various ways of being born in the realm of form, and the various ways of being born in the formless realm.🔽He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the realm of desire, the various ways of being born in the realm of form, and the various ways of being born in the formless realm.🔽He knows perfectly the way things are, in terms of the various ways of being born in the realm of desire, the various ways of being born in the realm of form, and the various

original: dgod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med par skye ba dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes med par skye ba dang / las kyi zhing dang / sred pa'i rlan dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis yang srid pa rab tu 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: dgod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med par skye ba dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes med par skye ba dang / las kyi zhing dang / sred pa'i rlan dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyis yang srid pa rab tu 'byung ba dang /
translated: He knows the arising of the world, which is the arising of the world of form, the formless world, the world of perception, the world without perception, the field of action, the moisture of craving, the darkness of ignorance, and the seed of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs lhan cig skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / srid bar mgo yud khyer zhing sred pas mngon par mos pa'i mtshams sbyor ba dang / spyod par 'dod pa dang / 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / sems can la mos pa dang /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs lhan cig skyes shing tha mi dad pa dang / srid bar mgo yud khyer zhing sred pas mngon par mos pa'i mtshams sbyor ba dang / spyod par 'dod pa dang / 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / sems can la mos pa dang /
translated: He knows the arising of existence, which is the arising of the world of name and form, which are not separate, the arising of the connection of craving, which is the arising of the connection of craving that is directed by the desire for existence, the arising of the connection of craving that is directed by the desire for rebirth, and the arising of the connection of craving that is directed by the desire for the continuation of existence.🔽He knows the arising of the world, which is the arising of the world of form, the formless world, the world of perception, the world without perception, the field of action, the moisture of craving, the darkness of ignorance, and the seed of consciousness.

original: thog ma dang / tha ma med pa dang / khams gsum pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / srid pa nyid kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: thog ma dang / tha ma med pa dang / khams gsum pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / srid pa nyid kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the arising of existence, which is the arising of the world of name and form, which are not separate, the arising of the connection of craving, which is

original: de ni bag chags rnams rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /🔽lam gyi rgyud gang dang ji ltar 'brel ba'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa dang / sems can spyad pa spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgos pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa la goms pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgos pa dang / dge ba dang /
analyzed: de ni bag chags rnams rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te / lam gyi rgyud gang dang ji ltar 'brel ba'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa dang / sems can spyad pa spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgos pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa la goms pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgos pa dang / dge ba dang /
translated: They know accurately how the latent tendencies flow and do not flow.🔽They know the latent tendencies that are infused by the connection with the continuum of the path, the latent tendencies that are infused by the conduct of sentient beings, the latent tendencies that are infused by the habituation to karma and afflictions, and the latent tendencies that are infused by the habituation to virtuous, nonvirtuous, and neutral karma.

original: mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i las la goms pas bsgos pa dang / yang srid par 'gro bar bsgos pa dang / mthar gyis bsgos pa dang / ring du song zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas bsgos pa dang /
analyzed: mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i las la goms pas bsgos pa dang / yang srid par 'gro bar bsgos pa dang / mthar gyis bsgos pa dang / ring du song zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas bsgos pa dang /
translated: They know the latent tendencies that lead to rebirth, the latent tendencies that are gradual, the latent tendencies that are far-reaching and uninterrupted, and the latent tendencies that are infused by the removal of afflictions.

original: dngos por gyur pa dang / dngos por ma gyur @191b pas bsgos pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing thos pas bsgos pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //🔽de ni sems can gyi phung po yang dag par nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / gnyis kar ma nges pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa dang / dngos por ma gyur @191b pas bsgos pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing thos pas bsgos pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // de ni sems can gyi phung po yang dag par nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / gnyis kar ma nges pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: He knows perfectly the impressions of those who have become real things and those who have not become real things, and the impressions of those who have seen and heard the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and tathāgatas.🔽He knows perfectly the groups of sentient beings who are definitely good, definitely bad, and not definitely either.

original: yang dag par lta bas yang dag par nges pa dang / log par lta bas log par nges pa dang / de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga las gang yang rung bar log par nges pa dang / dbang po lngar yang dag par nges pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par lta bas yang dag par nges pa dang / log par lta bas log par nges pa dang / de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga las gang yang rung bar log par nges pa dang / dbang po lngar yang dag par nges pa dang /
translated: He knows those who are definitely good because of their right view, those who are definitely bad because of their wrong view, those who are not definitely either because they are free from both, those who are definitely bad because of any one of the five heinous actions, and those who are definitely good because of the five faculties.

original: de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang / log pa brgyad du log par nges pa dang / yang dag pa la yang dag par nges pa dang / phyis byar med pa dang / de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang /
analyzed: de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang / log pa brgyad du log par nges pa dang / yang dag pa la yang dag par nges pa dang / phyis byar med pa dang / de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa dang /
translated: the eight kinds of wrong certainty, the eight kinds of right certainty, the eight kinds of certainty of nonaction, the eight kinds of uncertainty, the eight kinds of wrong certainty, the eight kinds of right certainty, the eight kinds of certainty of nonaction, and the eight kinds of uncertainty.

original: ser sna dang / phrag dog dang / snying mi brtse ba la nye bar spyod pa ma btang bas log par nges pa dang / 'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam bsgoms pas yang dag par nges pa dang / de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa'i phung por bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: ser sna dang / phrag dog dang / snying mi brtse ba la nye bar spyod pa ma btang bas log par nges pa dang / 'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam bsgoms pas yang dag par nges pa dang / de gnyis ka dang bral bas ma nges pa'i phung por bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He also knows perfectly the aggregates of stinginess, jealousy, and lack of compassion, which are wrong certainty; the aggregates of the practice of the noble path, which is right certainty; and the aggregates of the absence of both, which is uncertainty.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag ;de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag ;de ltar de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste /
translated: “O Children of the Victorious Ones, the bodhisattva who possesses such wisdom is said to be abiding in the bodhisattva ground Perfect Intellect.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa @192a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa @192a *//
translated: The bodhisattva ground

original: legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa de lta bu dag yongs su shes nas /
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa de lta bu dag yongs su shes nas /
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this Perfect Understanding stage, having understood such different kinds of beings’ conduct,

original: de'i tshul bzhin du thar pa nye bar bsgrubs pa nye bar bsgrub bo //
analyzed: de'i tshul bzhin du thar pa nye bar bsgrubs pa nye bar bsgrub bo //
translated: establishes them in the right way to attain liberation.

original: de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: He also knows beings’ development as it really is.

original: sems can gdul ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems can gdul ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows as it really is the teaching of the Disciples’ Vehicle, the teaching of the Solitary Buddhas’ Vehicle, the teaching of the Bodhisattvas’ Vehicle, and the teaching of the Tathāgatas’ stage.

original: des de ltar shes nas sems can rnams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston te bsam pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang / dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang /
analyzed: des de ltar shes nas sems can rnams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston te bsam pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang / dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang /
translated: Having understood in that way, they teach the Dharma to sentient beings in a way that is completely true and just, in a way that is in accordance with the way of discerning thoughts, the way of discerning latent tendencies, the way of discerning faculties,

original: mos pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang / spyod yul rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa dang / spyod yul thams cad kyi rgyus khong du chud pa dang / khams thibs po yongs su rgyu ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: mos pa rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba dang / spyod yul rnam par dbye ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa dang / spyod yul thams cad kyi rgyus khong du chud pa dang / khams thibs po yongs su rgyu ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
translated: the way of discerning aspirations, the way of discerning objects, the way of accomplishing wisdom, the way of comprehending all objects, and the way of following the way of the movement of the thick elements.

original: skye ba dang nyon mongs pa'i las kyi bag chags rnam pa gang dang gang yod pa phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / phung po rnam par dgod pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du tshul dang sbyar ba dang / theg pa gang la @192b mos pa'i rnam par thar pa thob par bya bas chos ston te /
analyzed: skye ba dang nyon mongs pa'i las kyi bag chags rnam pa gang dang gang yod pa phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / phung po rnam par dgod pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du tshul dang sbyar ba dang / theg pa gang la @192b mos pa'i rnam par thar pa thob par bya bas chos ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in order to eliminate whatever habitual tendencies of birth, affliction, and karma there are, in order to apply the methods for arranging the aggregates in the right way, and in order to attain the liberation that is in accord with whichever vehicle one is interested in.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang la gnas shing /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang la gnas shing /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi of Perfect Joy is a great Dharma teacher.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod yongs su srung ba yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod yongs su srung ba yin /
translated: He is a protector of the Tathāgata’s Dharma treasure.

original: de chos smra ba'i chos dang ldan pas ye shes la mkhas pa tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis chos ston te /
analyzed: de chos smra ba'i chos dang ldan pas ye shes la mkhas pa tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis chos ston te /
translated: With the Dharma of a Dharma teacher, he teaches the Dharma with bodhisattva speech that is endowed with infinite skill in wisdom and is accomplished through the four kinds of correct understanding.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad cing ma 'dres par yang dag par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad cing ma 'dres par yang dag par 'byung ngo //
translated: The four unhindered knowledges of the bodhisattva always and uninterruptedly arise in an unmixed way.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'o //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'o //
translated: the unhindered knowledge of phenomena, the unhindered knowledge of meaning, the unhindered knowledge of expression, and the unhindered knowledge of eloquence.

original: de chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so //
translated: By the unhindered knowledge of phenomena, one knows the individual characteristics of phenomena.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
translated: By the unhindered knowledge of meaning, one knows the classification of phenomena.

original: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams ma 'dres par bstan pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams ma 'dres par bstan pa rab tu shes so //
translated: By the unhindered knowledge of expression, one knows how to teach phenomena without mixing them up.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams mthun par rjes su mtshams sbyar ba rgyun mi 'chad pa rab tu shes so //🔽gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes @193a *//
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams mthun par rjes su mtshams sbyar ba rgyun mi 'chad pa rab tu shes so // gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes @193a *//
translated: By the analytical knowledge of inspired speech, he knows the uninterrupted continuity of the teaching of the Dharma in accord with the various aspirations of beings.

original: pas chos rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: pas chos rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa rab tu shes so //
translated: “Moreover, by the analytical knowledge of the teaching, he knows the non-existence of the intrinsic nature of all things.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu shes so //🔽nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa rgyun chad pa med par chos ston to //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu shes so // nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa rgyun chad pa med par chos ston to //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of meanings, he knows the arising and passing away of all things.🔽By the analytical knowledge of inspired speech, he teaches the Dharma without interruption, establishing all things.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas ji ltar rnam par dgod pa bzhin du 'khrugs pa med pa mtha' yas pas chos ston to //
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas ji ltar rnam par dgod pa bzhin du 'khrugs pa med pa mtha' yas pas chos ston to //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of perspicuity, he teaches the Dharma with infinite eloquence, without confusing the various expositions.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas da ltar byung ba'i chos rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas da ltar byung ba'i chos rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
translated: “Moreover, by the analytical knowledge of the teaching, he knows the classification of all present things.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
translated: By the perfect knowledge of the distinct meaning, he knows the classification of past and future phenomena.

original: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas /
translated: By the perfect knowledge of the distinct expression,

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar 'byung ba ma 'dres par chos ston to //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang; da ltar 'byung ba ma 'dres par chos ston to //
translated: he teaches the Dharma without confusion regarding the past, future, and present.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas dus re re zhing chos kyi snang ba mu med par chos ston to //
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas dus re re zhing chos kyi snang ba mu med par chos ston to //
translated: By the perfect knowledge of the distinct eloquence, he teaches the Dharma with an uninterrupted flow of eloquence at every moment.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi bye brag rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi bye brag rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, by the perfect knowledge of the distinct Dharma, he knows the distinctions of the Dharma.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas don gyi bye brag rab tu shes so //🔽nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas skad ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas don gyi bye brag rab tu shes so // nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas skad ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to //
translated: By the perfect knowledge of the distinct meaning, he knows the distinctions of the meaning.🔽By the perfect knowledge of the distinct expression, he teaches the Dharma in accordance with the languages of sentient beings.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos ston to //
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos ston to //
translated: By the perfect knowledge of the distinct eloquence, he teaches the Dharma in accordance with the aspirations of sentient beings.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang @193b dag par shes pas chos kyi rgyus rnam par dbye ba ma 'dres pa mkhas pas rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang @193b dag par shes pas chos kyi rgyus rnam par dbye ba ma 'dres pa mkhas pas rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, by means of the correct knowledge of the differentiation of the teachings, the bodhisattva knows well the unmixed analysis of the teachings.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes de bzhin nyid rnam par dgod pa rab tu shes so //🔽nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas kun rdzob kyi rgyus yang dag par bstan pas chos ston to //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes de bzhin nyid rnam par dgod pa rab tu shes so // nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas kun rdzob kyi rgyus yang dag par bstan pas chos ston to //
translated: By means of the correct knowledge of the differentiation of meanings, he knows well the establishment of the suchness of the knowledge of the subsequent attainment.🔽By means of the correct knowledge of the differentiation of expressions, he teaches the Dharma by means of the conventional.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas don dam pa'i rgyus la mkhas pas chos ston to //
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas don dam pa'i rgyus la mkhas pas chos ston to //
translated: By means of the correct knowledge of the differentiation of eloquence, he teaches the Dharma by means of the ultimate.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams tshul gcig las mi 'gyur ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos rnams tshul gcig las mi 'gyur ba rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, by means of the correct knowledge of the differentiation of the teachings, the bodhisattva knows well that the teachings do not change from a single principle.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mkhas par khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par 'jug go /
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mkhas par khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par 'jug go /
translated: By means of the correct knowledge of the different meanings, he penetrates the aggregates, elements, sense-media, and dependent origination.

original: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par smon pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis chos ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par smon pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis chos ston to //
translated: By means of the correct knowledge of the different etymologies, he teaches the Dharma with a pleasant voice, with a sound that delights all beings.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas phyi phyir zhing dran pa mtha' yas pas chos ston to //
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas phyi phyir zhing dran pa mtha' yas pas chos ston to //
translated: By means of the correct knowledge of the different kinds of eloquence, he teaches the Dharma again and again with infinite memory.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba tha dad pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba tha dad pa rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, by means of the correct knowledge of the different Dharmas, he knows the different kinds of orientation toward the one vehicle.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa rab tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa rab tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes so //
translated: By means of the correct knowledge of the different meanings, he knows the different aspects of the well-proclaimed vehicle.

original: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa thams cad tha dad pa med par shin tu ston to //🔽spobs pa tha dad pa @194a *//
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas theg pa thams cad tha dad pa med par shin tu ston to // spobs pa tha dad pa @194a *//
translated: By the analytical knowledge of the etymologies of words, he teaches the non-differentiation of all vehicles.

original: yang dag par shes pas theg pa re re la yang chos kyi snang ba mu med par shin tu ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par shes pas theg pa re re la yang chos kyi snang ba mu med par shin tu ston to //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of ready speech, he teaches the infinite illumination of the Dharma in each vehicle.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu 'jug go /
translated: Moreover, by the analytical knowledge of the teaching, he enters into the comprehension of the knowledge of all the bodhisattva practices, the practices of knowledge and the practices of the Dharma.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sa bcu rnam par dgod cing shin tu bstan pa rnam par phye ba la yang dag par 'jug go /
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sa bcu rnam par dgod cing shin tu bstan pa rnam par phye ba la yang dag par 'jug go /
translated: By the analytical knowledge of the meanings, he enters into the differentiation of the exposition of the arrangement of the ten stages.

original: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsgrub pa tha mi dad par yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsgrub pa tha mi dad par yang dag par ston to //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of the etymologies of words, he teaches the non-differentiation of the accomplishment of the stages and the paths, just as they are.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sa re re zhing rnam pa mu med pa yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sa re re zhing rnam pa mu med pa yang dag par ston to //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of inspired speech, he teaches the boundless aspects of each stage.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu 'jug go /
translated: Moreover, by the analytical knowledge of the teaching, he penetrates the single principle of all the Tathagatas.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas dus dang / dngos po dang / mtshan nyid rnam par phye ba sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so //🔽nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas khong du chud pa rnam par phye ba bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to; ;spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi tshig re re la yang bskal pa mtha' yas par rgyun mi 'chad
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas dus dang / dngos po dang / mtshan nyid rnam par phye ba sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so // nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas khong du chud pa rnam par phye ba bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to; ;spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi tshig re re la yang bskal pa mtha' yas par rgyun mi 'chad
translated: By the analytical knowledge of the meaning, he knows how to penetrate the various distinctions of time, thing, and principle.🔽By the analytical knowledge of inspired speech, he teaches the Dharma by means of the teaching that is adapted to the various kinds of people to be trained.

original: par chos ston to //
analyzed: par chos ston to //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of perspicuity, he teaches the Dharma without interruption for endless aeons with each word of the Dharma.

original: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag @194b par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos tha dad pa yang dag @194b par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul dang /
translated: Moreover, through the knowledge of the distinctions of phenomena, he knows how to realize the speech of all the Tathāgatas, their powers, fearlessnesses, buddhadharmas, great love, great compassion, and the way of the knowledge of distinctions,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtog par bya ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtog par bya ba rab tu shes so //
translated: the turning of the wheel of the Dharma, and omniscient wisdom.

original: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sems can gyi spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sems can gyi spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu shes so //
translated: Through the knowledge of the distinctions of meaning, he knows the Tathāgata’s teachings according to the eighty-four thousand kinds of conduct of sentient beings, their inclinations, faculties, and aspirations.

original: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rjes su bsgrags pas chos ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rjes su bsgrags pas chos ston to //
translated: Through the correct understanding of the different etymologies, he teaches the Dharma by proclaiming the speech of the Tathāgata, which is unmixed with the conduct of all sentient beings.

original: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'od gsal ba dang / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mos pas chos ston to //
analyzed: spobs pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'od gsal ba dang / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mos pas chos ston to //
translated: Through the correct understanding of the different kinds of eloquence, he teaches the Dharma by illuminating the wisdom of the Tathāgata and by inspiring the circle of his retinue.

original: kye; rgal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors,

original: de ltar tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob cing /
analyzed: de ltar tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob cing /
translated: the bodhisattva who possesses such wisdom of the correct understanding of the different kinds of eloquence has attained the treasury of the Dharma of the Tathāgata.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa chos smra ba chen po'i go 'phang la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: When he is on the ninth bodhisattva bhūmi and is a great Dharma teacher,

original: don dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
translated: he has attained the dhāraṇī of meaning.

original: chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
translated: He has attained the dhāraṇī of the Dharma.

original: ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa @195a *//
analyzed: ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa @195a *//
translated: He has attained the dhāraṇī of wisdom.

original: dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
translated: They have attained the dhāraṇī of retention.🔽

original: snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
translated: He has attained the dhāraṇī of possessing light.

original: blo gros bzang po dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / grags pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzungs dang / mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /
analyzed: blo gros bzang po dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / grags pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang / chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzungs dang / mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs dang /
translated: He has attained the dhāraṇī of possessing good intelligence, the dhāraṇī of possessing jewels, the dhāraṇī of possessing fame, the dhāraṇī of possessing splendor, the dhāraṇī of the door of nonattachment, the dhāraṇī of possessing infinity,

original: don sna tshogs kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: don sna tshogs kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa yin /
translated: and the dhāraṇī of possessing the treasury of various meanings.

original: de gzungs de dag la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su tshang bar thob ste /
analyzed: de gzungs de dag la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su tshang bar thob ste /
translated: He has attained these dhāraṇīs and so on, and has attained the complete perfection of countless hundreds of thousands of dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas de snyed du tshad med pa nyid dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos chos ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas de snyed du tshad med pa nyid dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos chos ston to //
translated: With the skill in the branches of speech endowed with countless hundreds of thousands of dhāraṇī gateways, he teaches the Dharma with the method of the classification of limitless eloquence.

original: de de ltar tshad med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pas tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos nyan cing thos nas kyang brjod par mi byed de /
analyzed: de de ltar tshad med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pas tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos nyan cing thos nas kyang brjod par mi byed de /
translated: In this way, through countless hundreds of thousands of doors of dhāraṇī, he listens to the Dharma from countless blessed buddhas and, having heard it, he does not speak of it.

original: ji skad du thos pa yang tshad med par rnam par phye bas shin tu ston to //
analyzed: ji skad du thos pa yang tshad med par rnam par phye bas shin tu ston to //
translated: He teaches it extensively by means of countless analyses of what he has heard.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed de /
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed de /
translated: He comprehends the Dharma through countless hundreds of thousands of doors of dhāraṇī from a single thus-gone one.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs @195b med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa las gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong grangs @195b med pa phrag bcus chos khong du chud par byed do //
translated: Just as he does with a single thus-gone one, he comprehends the Dharma through countless hundreds of thousands of doors of dhāraṇī from infinite perfect buddhas.

original: de smon pa tsam gyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las chos kyi sgo snang ba ches mang du yang dag par 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: de smon pa tsam gyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las chos kyi sgo snang ba ches mang du yang dag par 'dzin gyi /
translated: He receives from the perfect buddhas a great many more doors of Dharma by merely wishing to do so.

original: nyan thos shin tu mang du thos pa dang ldan pa thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa rnams kyis ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang gzung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de ltar mi zin to //
analyzed: nyan thos shin tu mang du thos pa dang ldan pa thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa rnams kyis ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang gzung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de ltar mi zin to //
translated: The hearers, who have listened a great deal and attained the power of retention that holds what they have heard, cannot retain it even in a hundred thousand eons by the power of their retention.

original: de ltar de lta bu'i gzungs thob cing spobs pa thob pas chos kyi gtam bya ba'i phyir 'dug na /
analyzed: de ltar de lta bu'i gzungs thob cing spobs pa thob pas chos kyi gtam bya ba'i phyir 'dug na /
translated: When they sit down to give a Dharma discourse, having attained such a power of retention and eloquence,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: they fill the entire trichiliocosm

original: chos kyi stan la 'dug cing sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye zhing chos ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi stan la 'dug cing sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye zhing chos ston to //
translated: and, sitting on their Dharma seat, teach the Dharma to beings, analyzing it according to their individual dispositions.

original: de'i chos kyi stan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa ma gtogs par thams cad las 'phags shing snang ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: de'i chos kyi stan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa ma gtogs par thams cad las 'phags shing snang ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: Their Dharma seat is superior to all others, except for those of the tathagatas and the bodhisattvas who have attained the level of empowerment, and it is endowed with immeasurable radiance.

original: de 'dod na chos kyi stan la 'dug cing dbyangs gcig gis 'khor thams cad du sgra skad sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yang dag par go bar byed do //
analyzed: de 'dod na chos kyi stan la 'dug cing dbyangs gcig gis 'khor thams cad du sgra skad sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yang dag par go bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can sit on a Dharma seat and make his voice understood in all the assemblies by means of various different sounds.

original: 'dod na sgra skad sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag tha dad pa rnam par phye bas 'khor thams cad mngon par go bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na sgra skad sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag tha dad pa rnam par phye bas 'khor thams cad mngon par go bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make himself understood in all the assemblies by means of various different sounds and different aspects of melody.

original: 'dod na 'od zer gyi sgo nye bar bsgrubs pas chos kyi sgo shin tu brjod do //
analyzed: 'dod na 'od zer gyi sgo nye bar bsgrubs pas chos kyi sgo shin tu brjod do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make the Dharma door well proclaimed by means of the establishment of the door of light rays.

original: 'dod na ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dbyangs rnam par phye ba shin tu brjod @196a *//
analyzed: 'dod na ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dbyangs rnam par phye ba shin tu brjod @196a *//
translated: If he wishes, he can make the divisions of melody well proclaimed from all the pores of his skin.

original: do; ;'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba ji snyed yod pa'i gzugs su snang ba de dag las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: do; ;'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba ji snyed yod pa'i gzugs su snang ba de dag las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make the sound of Dharma come forth from all the appearances of forms that exist in the great trichiliocosm.

original: 'dod na dbyangs kyi yan lag gcig gi sgras chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na dbyangs kyi yan lag gcig gi sgras chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make the whole of the realm of phenomena understood by means of the sound of a single aspect of melody.

original: 'dod na sgra dang dbyangs thams cad chos kyi sgrar byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: 'dod na sgra dang dbyangs thams cad chos kyi sgrar byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: If he wishes, he can bless all sounds and voices to be the sound of Dharma.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i glu dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i glu dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can cause the sound of Dharma to come forth from all the songs and music and the sound of all the musical instruments in all the world systems.

original: 'dod na yi ge gcig gi sgra las chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu phye ba'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na yi ge gcig gi sgra las chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu phye ba'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can cause the sound of the explanation of all Dharma words to come forth from the sound of a single letter.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing brjod du med pa'i sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi phung po rdul shin tu phra rab rnam par phye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba re re las chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing brjod du med pa'i sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi phung po rdul shin tu phra rab rnam par phye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba re re las chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can cause the sound of the Dharma to come forth from each of the atoms of the heaps of earth, water, fire, and wind in the inexpressibly numerous world systems.

original: gal te de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'ongs te /
analyzed: gal te de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'ongs te /
translated: If the beings who belong to the world systems of the great trichiliocosm were to come to him

original: skad cig yud tsam thang gcig tu dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing /
analyzed: skad cig yud tsam thang gcig tu dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing /
translated: In a single instant, a single moment, a single second, they ask questions,

original: de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris par gyur la /
analyzed: de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris par gyur la /
translated: and each of them asks questions with countless different sounds.

original: gcig gis gang dris pa de gzhan mi 'dri bar gyur na yang /
analyzed: gcig gis gang dris pa de gzhan mi 'dri bar gyur na yang /
translated: Although one of them does not ask the same question as the others,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' des sems can de dag thams cad kyi sgra tshig so so dang / yi ge'i 'bru @196b yan chad ma lus par bzung ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' des sems can de dag thams cad kyi sgra tshig so so dang / yi ge'i 'bru @196b yan chad ma lus par bzung ste /
translated: the bodhisattva hears all the words, phrases, and syllables of all those beings without exception.

original: bzung nas kyang tshig gcig mngon par brjod pas sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa tshim par byed pa nas /
analyzed: bzung nas kyang tshig gcig mngon par brjod pas sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa tshim par byed pa nas /
translated: Having heard them, he satisfies the minds and thoughts of all those beings with a single utterance,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam du dri ba yongs su dris te /🔽de dag re re zhing yang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas 'dri bar gyur la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam du dri ba yongs su dris te /🔽de dag re re zhing yang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas 'dri bar gyur la /
translated: and he satisfies the minds and thoughts of all the beings in worlds as numerous as the atoms in a buddha-field.🔽He satisfies the minds and thoughts of all the beings in worlds as numerous as the atoms in a double-world system, a triple-world system, a four-continent world system, a small chiliocosm, a medium dichiliocosm, a great trichiliocosm, a double-great trichiliocosm, a triple-great trichiliocosm, a four-great-trichiliocosm world system, a small chiliocosm, a medium dichiliocosm, a great trichiliocosm, a double-great trichiliocosm, a triple-great trichiliocosm, a four-great-trichiliocosm world system, up to worlds as numerous as the atoms in a buddha-field, and he satisfies the minds and thoughts of all the beings in worlds as numerous as the atoms in an anabhilāpyānabhilāpya-buddhakṣetra.

original: gcig gis ci dris pa de gzhan mi 'dri bar gyur na yang /
analyzed: gcig gis ci dris pa de gzhan mi 'dri bar gyur na yang /
translated: Even if one person asks one thing and another person asks something else,

original: de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ma lus par bzung ste /
analyzed: de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ma lus par bzung ste /
translated: the bodhisattva will, in a single instant, retain all of them without exception.

original: sgra gcig brjod pas de dag thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: sgra gcig brjod pas de dag thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
translated: And by uttering a single sound, he will satisfy them all.

original: de 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams la bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to //
analyzed: de 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang rgyas par bkang zhing sems can rnams la bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to //
translated: He will fill up worlds, up to and including inexpressibly inexpressible numbers of worlds, and he will teach the Dharma to beings in accordance with their aspirations, faculties, and inclinations.

original: chos kyi gtam la zhugs pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs len cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas pa yin /
analyzed: chos kyi gtam la zhugs pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs len cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyi sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas pa yin /
translated: When he engages in Dharma discourse, he will receive the blessings of the thus-gone ones and will remain present to all beings in order to perform all the activities of the buddhas.

original: yang de 'di lta bu'i ye shes snang bas 'dzin pa yongs su rtsom ste /
analyzed: yang de 'di lta bu'i ye shes snang bas 'dzin pa yongs su rtsom ste /
translated: “Moreover, he will commence the apprehension of such wisdom illumination.

original: gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de snyed du tshad med par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan te /
analyzed: gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de snyed du tshad med par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos bstan te /
translated: If the thus-gone ones were to teach the Dharma in a circle of disciples as immeasurable as the number of world systems, as numerous as the atoms in an inexpressible number of buddhafields, in each tip of every hair of every being in all those world systems,🔽

original: de bzhin @197a *//🔽gshegs pa de dag re res kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin @197a *// gshegs pa de dag re res kyang /
