translated: If there were as many thus-gone ones as there are atoms in inexpressibly numerous world systems in the tip of a single hair, and if they were to teach the Dharma in assemblies of disciples that were as limitless as that,

original: de snyed kyi sems can tshad med pa la chos rnam pa tha dad par shin tu bstan te /
analyzed: de snyed kyi sems can tshad med pa la chos rnam pa tha dad par shin tu bstan te /
translated: and if each of those thus-gone ones were to teach the Dharma in different ways to limitless numbers of sentient beings,

original: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud re re la yang de snyed du chos nye bar bsgrub pa tshad med par nye bar bsgrub par gyur la /
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud re re la yang de snyed du chos nye bar bsgrub pa tshad med par nye bar bsgrub par gyur la /
translated: and if they were to establish limitless teachings of the Dharma for each and every mind stream of sentient beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du ste /
translated: and if all the thus-gone ones were to do the same in all the assemblies of disciples,

original: skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de ltar gyur kyang de dag thams cad zin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad du de ltar gyur kyang de dag thams cad zin par 'gyur na /
translated: Just as it is on a single hair tip, so it is on all the hair tips in the entire realm of phenomena, and all of them are included in that.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de tsam dag gi sems can rnams kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de tsam dag gi sems can rnams kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: So what need is there to mention the beings in just that many world systems?

original: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin mtshan du yid la bsam pa gzhan med par sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob cing byang chub
analyzed: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin mtshan du yid la bsam pa gzhan med par sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob cing byang chub
translated: “The bodhisattva who has attained this bodhisattva bhūmi of Perfect Joy, day and night, with no other thought, enters the domain of the buddhas and thus attains the company of the tathāgatas.

original: sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa zab mo rab tu thob pa yin /
analyzed: sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa zab mo rab tu thob pa yin /
translated: He attains the profound liberation of the bodhisattvas.

original: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing mnyam par bzhag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba yongs su mi spong ste /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing mnyam par bzhag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba yongs su mi spong ste /
translated: “Endowed with such wisdom, he never abandons seeing the tathāgatas, even though he is in samādhi.

original: bskal pa re re zhing sangs rgyas du ma nas /
analyzed: bskal pa re re zhing sangs rgyas du ma nas /
translated: In each eon he sees many buddhas, many hundreds of buddhas, many thousands of buddhas, many hundreds of thousands of buddhas, many millions of buddhas, many tens of millions of buddhas, many billions of buddhas, many tens of billions of buddhas, many trillions of buddhas, and many quintillions of buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig lta zhing mthong nas kyang rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig lta zhing mthong nas kyang rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa byed de /
translated: They see hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of buddhas and make offerings to them.

original: sangs rgyas mthong zhing mchod @197b pa bya ba rgya chen po yongs su mi gtong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong zhing mchod @197b pa bya ba rgya chen po yongs su mi gtong ngo //
translated: They never give up seeing buddhas and making offerings to them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhu ba yongs su zhu ba yang byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhu ba yongs su zhu ba yang byed de /
translated: They ask those tathagatas questions and make requests.

original: chos kyi gzungs rab tu bstan pa las shin tu byung ba yin /
analyzed: chos kyi gzungs rab tu bstan pa las shin tu byung ba yin /
translated: They have emerged from the teaching of the dharani of Dharma.

original: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang shin tu byang zhing mi 'phrogs par 'gyur te //
analyzed: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sngon pas kyang shin tu byang zhing mi 'phrogs par 'gyur te //
translated: Those roots of virtue are purified and cannot be taken away.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan du byas te /
analyzed: dper na / gser gyi sa le sbram de nyid mgar ba mkhas pas rgyan du byas te /
translated: For example, that same refined gold, made into ornaments by a skilled goldsmith,

original: yongs su zin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo 'am mgul du btags na /
analyzed: yongs su zin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo 'am mgul du btags na /
translated: is worn on the head or the neck by a universal monarch,

original: khams kyi rgyal po thams cad dang / gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pas mi thub cing mi 'phrogs pa yin no //
analyzed: khams kyi rgyal po thams cad dang / gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pas mi thub cing mi 'phrogs pa yin no //
translated: They are not surpassed or outshone by the ornaments of all the kings of the realms or of all the beings of the four continents.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang /
translated: In the same way, the roots of virtue of the bodhisattvas who are on this bodhisattva bhūmi of Perfect Joy

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi thub pa yin /
translated: are not surpassed or outshone by those of the hearers, solitary buddhas, or bodhisattvas on lower bhūmis.

original: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snang ba des ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te de nyid nas phyir ldog go /
analyzed: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba snang ba des ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te de nyid nas phyir ldog go /
translated: The light of their roots of virtue illuminates the afflictions and the darkness of the minds of sentient beings, and then returns.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na; stong gnyis la dbang ba'i tshangs pa chen po ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi thibs po dma' bar gzhol ba yongs su snang bar byed do //
analyzed: dper na; stong gnyis la dbang ba'i tshangs pa chen po ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi thibs po dma' bar gzhol ba yongs su snang bar byed do //
translated: For example, a great Brahma god who rules over the second order of a thousand worlds illuminates the entire second order of a thousand worlds, which is covered by darkness.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victorious ones,

original: @198a *// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snang ba de yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te /
analyzed: @198a *// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snang ba de yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar byas te /
translated: in the same way, the light of the roots of virtue of a bodhisattva who is in this bodhisattva bhūmi Good Intelligence illuminates the darkness of the afflictions and the mind of sentient beings

original: de nyid nas phyir ldog go /
analyzed: de nyid nas phyir ldog go /
translated: and then returns.

original: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shas che ba yin te /
translated: From among the ten perfections, the perfection of power is predominant,

original: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang ci tshul ci nus su yang dag par mi sgrub par ni ma yin no //
translated: but this is not to say that he does not practice the other perfections as well, to the best of his ability and as much as he can.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victorious ones,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste /
translated: this is the bodhisattva bhūmi Good Intelligence.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: This concludes the brief presentation of the ninth bodhisattva stage.

original: rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pa'i bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgya cher ni bskal pa mu med pa'i bstan pa'i mthar thug par shes par bya'o //
translated: The extensive explanation should be understood as taught in the sutra, up to the end of the teaching of the limitless eons.

original: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher tshangs pa chen por gyur te /
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher tshangs pa chen por gyur te /
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this stage is for the most part a great Brahma

original: stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa /
analyzed: stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa /
translated: who has attained great power and strength,

original: stong gnyis la dbang zhing zil gyis gnon la gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa /
analyzed: stong gnyis la dbang zhing zil gyis gnon la gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa /
translated: who has power and sovereignty over the second order of cosmic units, who is not overwhelmed by others,

original: mthun pa'i don mthong ba /
analyzed: mthun pa'i don mthong ba /
translated: who sees the meaning of what is suitable,

original: dbang shin tu thob pa /
analyzed: dbang shin tu thob pa /
translated: who has attained mastery,

original: sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ston pa la mkhas shing mthu yod pa ste /
translated: and who is skilled and powerful in teaching all the perfections of the disciples, the solitary sages, and the bodhisattvas to sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin /
translated: He is unassailable in teaching the questions of the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: de sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'am /
translated: Whatever roots of virtue he may create, whether by generosity,

original: ngag snyan pa'am /🔽don bsgrub pa'am /
analyzed: ngag snyan pa'am / don bsgrub pa'am /
translated: by kind words,🔽by beneficial actions,

original: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
analyzed: don mthun pas dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci rtsom yang rung ste /
translated: or by the demonstration of equality,

original: de @198b thams cad ji ltar na /
analyzed: de @198b thams cad ji ltar na /
translated: How is it that all of these are?🔽

original: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur /🔽gtso bor 'gyur /🔽thu bor 'gyur /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur / gtso bor 'gyur / thu bor 'gyur /
translated: How can I become the best of all sentient beings?🔽How can I become the foremost?

original: phul du 'gyur /
analyzed: phul du 'gyur /
translated: How can I become the most preeminent?🔽How can I become the most excellent?

original: dam par 'gyur /
analyzed: dam par 'gyur /
translated: How can I become the most sublime?

original: bla na med par 'gyur /
analyzed: bla na med par 'gyur /
translated: How can I become the unsurpassed?🔽How can I become the guide?

original: 'dren par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dren par 'gyur /
translated: How can I become the leader?

original: yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
analyzed: yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam ste /
translated: How can I become the support for the wisdom of omniscience?

original: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yid la bya ba dang /
translated: He should think, ‘I will bring to mind the Buddha, I will bring to mind the Dharma, I will bring to mind the Saṅgha, I will bring to mind the bodhisattvas, I will bring to mind the conduct of the bodhisattvas, I will bring to mind the levels of the bodhisattvas,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas /
translated: I will bring to mind the perfections, I will bring to mind the powers, I will bring to mind the fearlessnesses, I will bring to mind the distinct qualities of a buddha,

original: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
translated: They are never separate from the mental states that lead to the knowledge of all aspects, which is endowed with the highest of all aspects.

original: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang /
analyzed: de 'dod na skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob cing de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong ba dang /
translated: If they wish, in one instant, a short moment, a small fraction of time, they can attain and rest in as many meditative stabilities as there are atoms in a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand countless buddhafields, and they can see as many buddhas as there are atoms in a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand countless buddhafields.

original: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang / sangs @199a *//
analyzed: de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyod pa dang / sangs @199a *//
translated: They can understand the blessings of those buddhas, and they can shake as many world systems as there are atoms in a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand countless buddhafields.

original: rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed snang bar bya ba dang /
translated: They went to as many buddha realms as there are atoms in a hundred thousand countless buddha realms,🔽they illuminated as many world systems as there are atoms in a hundred thousand countless buddha realms,

original: sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gnas par bya ba dang /
translated: they ripened as many beings as there are atoms in a hundred thousand countless buddha realms, and they remained for as many eons as there are atoms in a hundred thousand countless buddha realms.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par 'byed pa dang /
translated: They engage in the past and future for as many eons as there are atoms in a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand countless buddha realms; they discern as many Dharma doors as there are atoms in a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand countless buddha realms;

original: lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
analyzed: lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su bstan pa dang / lus re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yang dag par bstan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo //
translated: they manifest as many bodies as there are atoms in a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand countless buddha realms; and they manifest in each body as many bodhisattva retinues as there are atoms in a hundred thousand times a hundred thousand countless buddha realms.

original: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams /
analyzed: de yan chad byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthu can rnams /
translated: From that point on, the bodhisattvas who have the power of aspiration

original: smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
analyzed: smon lam gyi khyad par gyis rnam par 'phrul te /
translated: manifest through the power of their special aspirations.

original: de dag gi @199b lus sam /
analyzed: de dag gi @199b lus sam /
translated: It is difficult to count their bodies,

original: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
analyzed: 'od dam / rdzu 'phrul lam /
translated: their light, their miracles,

original: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
analyzed: mig gam / spyod yul lam /
translated: their eyes, their range of action,

original: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
analyzed: dbyangs sam / spyod pa'am /
translated: their voices, their conduct,

original: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
analyzed: rgyan tam / byin gyi rlabs sam /
translated: their ornaments, their blessings,

original: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
analyzed: mos pa'am / mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang bgrang bar dka'o //
translated: their aspirations, or their activities, even in many eons, even in many hundreds of eons, even in many thousands of eons, even in many hundreds of thousands of eons, even in many millions of eons, even in many billions of eons.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so; ;de dag tshad med stobs kyi blo yis rnam dpyod cing //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos sa'i don 'di nyid yang brtag par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so; ;de dag tshad med stobs kyi blo yis rnam dpyod cing //
translated: “They have the power of discernment with immeasurable intelligence,

original: ye shes phra ba'i dam pa 'gro bas shes dka' ba //
analyzed: ye shes phra ba'i dam pa 'gro bas shes dka' ba //
translated: And subtle, sublime wisdom that is difficult for the world to know.

original: de bzhin bde gshegs gsang ba'i gnas la yang dag 'jug /
analyzed: de bzhin bde gshegs gsang ba'i gnas la yang dag 'jug /
translated: They are truly engaged in the secret abode of the sugatas,

original: 'gro ba'i don byed de dag sa dgu yongs su gnon //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don byed de dag sa dgu yongs su gnon //
translated: And they conquer the ninth stage in order to benefit beings.🔽They have the supreme dhāraṇī, the supreme great samādhi,🔽And the vast higher cognitions, and likewise infinite entry into realms,🔽The power and realization of wisdom, the abode of the Victorious One,

original: de dag gzungs mchog ting 'dzin che ba nyid mchog dang // mngon shes yangs dang de bzhin zhing 'jug mtha' yas dang // stobs dang rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i brten gnas dang // smon lam snying rje'i bsam pas mkhas pa dgu la 'jug /
analyzed: de dag gzungs mchog ting 'dzin che ba nyid mchog dang // mngon shes yangs dang de bzhin zhing 'jug mtha' yas dang // stobs dang rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i brten gnas dang // smon lam snying rje'i bsam pas mkhas pa dgu la 'jug /
translated: And the aspiration to compassion—the wise ones enter the ninth.

original: sa dgu ldan pa de dag rgyal ba'i mdzod 'dzin cing //
analyzed: sa dgu ldan pa de dag rgyal ba'i mdzod 'dzin cing //
translated: They possess the ninth stage and hold the treasury of the Victorious One,

original: dge ba'i chos dang mi dge lung du ma bstan dang // zag dang bcas dang 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa dang // bsam du rung dang bsam du mi rung mkhas pas shes //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos dang mi dge lung du ma bstan dang // zag dang bcas dang 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa dang // bsam du rung dang bsam du mi rung mkhas pas shes //
translated: They know the knowable and the unknowable.

original: nges pa'i chos dang ma nges @200a *//
analyzed: nges pa'i chos dang ma nges @200a *//
translated: “They know the definite and the indefinite,

original: chos kyang rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: chos kyang rab tu rtogs //
translated: And they know the Dharma of the noble ones.

original: theg gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i bya ba yongs su 'jal //
analyzed: theg gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i bya ba yongs su 'jal //
translated: They know the activities that are perfect in the three vehicles.🔽“They know the classifications, the enumeration, and the causes of conditioned things,

original: 'dus byas rnam par phye dang grangs dang rgyu ba dang // 'jig rten ji ltar mngon byed de la rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: 'dus byas rnam par phye dang grangs dang rgyu ba dang // 'jig rten ji ltar mngon byed de la rab tu 'jug /
translated: And they know how the world comes into being.

original: de dag de 'dra'i shes ldan blo mchog phra ldan pa //
analyzed: de dag de 'dra'i shes ldan blo mchog phra ldan pa //
translated: Those who have such knowledge have the most subtle of minds.

original: sems can sems kyi thibs po yongs su rtog pa byed //
analyzed: sems can sems kyi thibs po yongs su rtog pa byed //
translated: “They know the dense forests of the minds of beings.🔽They know the arising of the infinite consciousnesses,

original: rnam shes sna tshogs myur du 'gyur zhing ldog pa dang // rnam shes mtha' yas 'byung la rtag tu mkhas pa 'jug /
analyzed: rnam shes sna tshogs myur du 'gyur zhing ldog pa dang // rnam shes mtha' yas 'byung la rtag tu mkhas pa 'jug /
translated: Which quickly change and turn around.

original: nyon mongs mtha' yas sbyor dang grogs su 'gyur ba dang // kun nas 'khor dang bag nyal 'gro rgyud mtshams sbyor dang // las rnams sna tshogs rnam par phye la'ang de bzhin 'jug /
analyzed: nyon mongs mtha' yas sbyor dang grogs su 'gyur ba dang // kun nas 'khor dang bag nyal 'gro rgyud mtshams sbyor dang // las rnams sna tshogs rnam par phye la'ang de bzhin 'jug /
translated: And the various classifications of karma.

original: rgyu dang 'gog dang de bzhin 'bras bu 'jig pa'ang yang dag 'jug /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'gog dang de bzhin 'bras bu 'jig pa'ang yang dag 'jug /
translated: They are applied to the causes, the cessation, and likewise the results, and to destruction.🔽They are applied to the sharp, dull, middling, extensive,

original: dbang po rno dang tha ma 'bring dang yangs pa dang // tha dang sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' la'ang yang dag 'jug /🔽mos pa dge dang mi dge sna tshogs du ma dag /
analyzed: dbang po rno dang tha ma 'bring dang yangs pa dang // tha dang sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' la'ang yang dag 'jug / mos pa dge dang mi dge sna tshogs du ma dag /
translated: And inferior faculties, and to the past and future.🔽They are applied to the various, numerous,

original: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi kun la yang dag 'jug /
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi kun la yang dag 'jug /
translated: And eighty-four thousand kinds of virtuous and nonvirtuous aspirations.

original: khams kyi rnam pa nyon mongs lta ba srid pa rnams //
analyzed: khams kyi rnam pa nyon mongs lta ba srid pa rnams //
translated: They are applied to the various elements, the afflictions, the views, and existence,🔽To the thickets, the absence of past and future, the absence of interruption,

original: thibs por gyur ba snga phyi med cing 'chad med dang // bag nyal bsam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyud rnams kyi //
analyzed: thibs por gyur ba snga phyi med cing 'chad med dang // bag nyal bsam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyud rnams kyi //
translated: And the latent states, intentions, and innate continuums.

original: sems rnams kun rgyu 'brel cing rgyun chad mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: sems rnams kun rgyu 'brel cing rgyun chad mi 'gyur ba //
translated: They are applied to the minds that are the causes and effects, which are connected and uninterrupted.

original: bsam pa bag nyal rgyud yod dngos po ma yin te //
analyzed: bsam pa bag nyal rgyud yod dngos po ma yin te //
translated: “The latent tendencies of thought are not real things.

original: yul la mi gnas bsam pa yongs su 'bral mi 'gyur //
analyzed: yul la mi gnas bsam pa yongs su 'bral mi 'gyur //
translated: They do not dwell on objects, and thoughts do not become separated from them.

original: shes pa dka' @200b ba'i bsam gtan yul las phyir mi ldog /
analyzed: shes pa dka' @200b ba'i bsam gtan yul las phyir mi ldog /
translated: The difficult-to-attain concentration does not turn back from objects.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i lam gyis chod 'gyur gzhan gyis min //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i lam gyis chod 'gyur gzhan gyis min //
translated: It is cut off by the vajra path, not by anything else.

original: rgyud drug skye ba rnam par phye la rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: rgyud drug skye ba rnam par phye la rab tu 'jug /
translated: “They engage in the analysis of the six existences.🔽Craving is the moisture, ignorance is the darkness, and the field is karma.

original: sred rlan ma rig mun pa de bzhi las kyi zhing; ;rnam shes sa bon can 'byung myu gu ming dang gzugs //
analyzed: sred rlan ma rig mun pa de bzhi las kyi zhing; ;rnam shes sa bon can 'byung myu gu ming dang gzugs //
translated: Consciousness is the seed, and name and form are the sprout.

original: khams gsum sngon mtha' med par de dag rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: khams gsum sngon mtha' med par de dag rab tu 'jug /
translated: They engage in the beginningless past of the three realms.

original: de dag bag chags tshul dang nyon mongs las dang sems //
analyzed: de dag bag chags tshul dang nyon mongs las dang sems //
translated: “They have habitual tendencies, afflictions, karma, and mind.

original: 'dod chags bral bas lam gyi rgyud du 'byung ba min //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral bas lam gyi rgyud du 'byung ba min //
translated: They are free from desire and do not arise in the stream of the path.

original: sems can phung po gsum du nges pa yang dag shes //
analyzed: sems can phung po gsum du nges pa yang dag shes //
translated: They have correct knowledge of the three definite groups of beings.

original: lta bar bying ba shes pa'i lam dang de dag ldan //
analyzed: lta bar bying ba shes pa'i lam dang de dag ldan //
translated: They have the path of knowledge that is immersed in views.

original: de 'dra'i shes ldan sa mchog 'di la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: de 'dra'i shes ldan sa mchog 'di la gnas pa ste //
translated: “Those who have such knowledge abide on this supreme bhūmi.

original: sems can bsam pa mos pa dbang po'i tshul bzhin du //
analyzed: sems can bsam pa mos pa dbang po'i tshul bzhin du //
translated: In accordance with the inclinations, aspirations, and faculties of beings,

original: chos rnams rnam par phye zhing shin tu ston pa byed //
analyzed: chos rnams rnam par phye zhing shin tu ston pa byed //
translated: They teach the Dharma in a differentiated way.

original: tha dad yang dag don shes nges tshig spobs pa yis //
analyzed: tha dad yang dag don shes nges tshig spobs pa yis //
translated: They have the knowledge of the meaning of the different etymologies, and they have eloquence.

original: de dag chos smra'i tshul la gnas pa rab tu thob //
analyzed: de dag chos smra'i tshul la gnas pa rab tu thob //
translated: They have attained the state of being a Dharma teacher.

original: seng ge khyu mchog dpe 'dra ri yi rgyal po 'dra //
analyzed: seng ge khyu mchog dpe 'dra ri yi rgyal po 'dra //
translated: They are like a lion, the king of beasts, or like the king of mountains.

original: bdud rtsi sprin chen zhim pa'i char yang rab tu 'babs //
analyzed: bdud rtsi sprin chen zhim pa'i char yang rab tu 'babs //
translated: They rain down the sweet nectar of the great clouds.

original: klu yi dbang pos rgya mtsho rgyas pa byed pa bzhin //
analyzed: klu yi dbang pos rgya mtsho rgyas pa byed pa bzhin //
translated: They are like the lords of the nāgas who fill the ocean.

original: don gyi don shes de bzhin chos nyid rab tu shes //
analyzed: don gyi don shes de bzhin chos nyid rab tu shes //
translated: They know the meaning of the meaning, and they know the nature of phenomena.

original: nges tshig rjes su song zhing spobs pa rab tu thob //
analyzed: nges tshig rjes su song zhing spobs pa rab tu thob //
translated: They have attained the knowledge of the etymologies.

original: de dag grangs med stong phrag bcu yi gzungs thob bas //
analyzed: de dag grangs med stong phrag bcu yi gzungs thob bas //
translated: They have attained the dhāraṇīs of the ten thousand incalculable eons.

original: chos rnams 'dzin pa rgya mtsho sprin chen char 'dzin bzhin //
analyzed: chos rnams 'dzin pa rgya mtsho sprin chen char 'dzin bzhin //
translated: They hold the Dharma like the ocean holds the great clouds.

original: de dag de 'dra'i ting 'dzin gzungs gsal thob gyur pas //
analyzed: de dag de 'dra'i ting 'dzin gzungs gsal thob gyur pas //
translated: They have attained the clarity of samādhi and dhāraṇī.

original: skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas mang po stong yang mthong //
analyzed: skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas mang po stong yang mthong //
translated: In a single instant, they see many thousands of buddhas.

original: rin @201a *// chen chos rnams thos nas yang du ston byed de //
analyzed: rin @201a *// chen chos rnams thos nas yang du ston byed de //
translated: Having heard the precious Dharma, they teach it again and again.

original: tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnam dag dbyangs kyi yan lag ldan //🔽'dod na stong gsum 'jig rten khams su gtogs pa yi //
analyzed: tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnam dag dbyangs kyi yan lag ldan // 'dod na stong gsum 'jig rten khams su gtogs pa yi //
translated: With a pure circle of words, they have the melodious voice.🔽If they wish, they can ripen the various thoughts of beings

original: sems can bsam sems sna tshogs tshul bzhin smin byed cing //
analyzed: sems can bsam sems sna tshogs tshul bzhin smin byed cing //
translated: In the three-thousand great one-thousand worlds.

original: thams cad bsam pa dbang po ji bzhin tshim par byed //
analyzed: thams cad bsam pa dbang po ji bzhin tshim par byed //
translated: They satisfy all according to their thoughts and faculties.

original: gling bzhi rgya mtsho'i sprin bzhin yang dag rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: gling bzhi rgya mtsho'i sprin bzhin yang dag rab tu 'jug /
translated: They enter like a cloud over the four continents and the oceans.

original: de bas gong du legs ldan brtson 'grus rab thob pa //
analyzed: de bas gong du legs ldan brtson 'grus rab thob pa //
translated: Those who are even more excellent than that, who have attained the highest diligence,

original: skra rtse'i go gcig bsam gyis mi khyab sems pa byed //
analyzed: skra rtse'i go gcig bsam gyis mi khyab sems pa byed //
translated: Think of the inconceivability of a single hair-tip.

original: sems can sna tshogs mang la bde gshegs chos ston pa //
analyzed: sems can sna tshogs mang la bde gshegs chos ston pa //
translated: The Sugata teaches the Dharma to many various beings.

original: thos nas sa bon kun 'dzin sa bzhin yongs su 'dzin //
analyzed: thos nas sa bon kun 'dzin sa bzhin yongs su 'dzin //
translated: Having heard it, they hold it like the earth holds all seeds.

original: phyogs rnams bcu po'i sems can mang po ji snyed pa //
analyzed: phyogs rnams bcu po'i sems can mang po ji snyed pa //
translated: As many beings as there are in the ten directions,

original: de dag thams cad 'khor gcig 'dus par 'khod gyur kyang //
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'khor gcig 'dus par 'khod gyur kyang //
translated: They all sit together in a single assembly,

original: de dag bsam pa skad cig gcig gis bsam byas shing //
analyzed: de dag bsam pa skad cig gcig gis bsam byas shing //
translated: And in a single instant they know their thoughts.

original: sgra skad gcig gis de dag thams cad tshim par byed //
analyzed: sgra skad gcig gis de dag thams cad tshim par byed //
translated: With a single sound they satisfy them all.🔽Those who are established in this become Dharma kings,

original: 'di la gnas pa chos rgyal lha mi mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa chos rgyal lha mi mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: Supreme rulers over gods and humans.

original: rgyal ba'i sras po chos kyis yongs su skyong ba yin //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras po chos kyis yongs su skyong ba yin //
translated: They are the Buddha’s sons, who are protected by the Dharma.

original: nyin mtshan kun tu rgyal ba rnams dang rtag par 'grogs //
analyzed: nyin mtshan kun tu rgyal ba rnams dang rtag par 'grogs //
translated: Day and night they are always in the company of the victorious ones.

original: zab yangs ye shes rnam par thar pa ldan par gnas //
analyzed: zab yangs ye shes rnam par thar pa ldan par gnas //
translated: They are established in profound and vast wisdom and liberation.

original: de dag yang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig bsnyen bkur byed //
analyzed: de dag yang du sangs rgyas khrag khrig bsnyen bkur byed //
translated: They serve many quintillions of buddhas.

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyan bzang yongs su byang ba bzhin //
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyan bzang yongs su byang ba bzhin //
translated: They are like the well-purified, excellent ornaments of a universal monarch.

original: de yi 'od kyang nyon mongs thibs po snang ba byed //
analyzed: de yi 'od kyang nyon mongs thibs po snang ba byed //
translated: Their light illuminates the thick darkness of the afflictions,

original: tshangs pa'i 'od kyis stong @201b gnyis 'jig rten ji bzhin no //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'od kyis stong @201b gnyis 'jig rten ji bzhin no //
translated: Just as the light of Brahmā illuminates the worlds of the billion-world universe.

original: 'di la gnas pa legs ldan tshangs chen 'jig rten du //
analyzed: 'di la gnas pa legs ldan tshangs chen 'jig rten du //
translated: Those who are established in this become great Brahmās in the world,

original: skye 'gyur theg gsum ston la mkhas shing mthu yod pa //
analyzed: skye 'gyur theg gsum ston la mkhas shing mthu yod pa //
translated: They will be skilled and powerful in teaching the three vehicles.

original: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir ci tsam gang yang rung //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir ci tsam gang yang rung //
translated: “They will dedicate whatever they have to the benefit of all beings,

original: yon tan shes ldan bde gshegs ye shes ldan pa bsngo //
analyzed: yon tan shes ldan bde gshegs ye shes ldan pa bsngo //
translated: To the knowledge of the sugatas, and to those who possess knowledge.🔽“In an instant, with firm concentration, they will attain

original: grangs med zhing du gtogs pa'i rdul phran du yod pa //
analyzed: grangs med zhing du gtogs pa'i rdul phran du yod pa //
translated: As many samādhis as there are atoms in countless realms,

original: de snyed ting 'dzin skad cig gcig tu brtan pas thob; ;phyogs rnams kun gyi rgyal ba mthong zhing gsung yang nyan //
analyzed: de snyed ting 'dzin skad cig gcig tu brtan pas thob; ;phyogs rnams kun gyi rgyal ba mthong zhing gsung yang nyan //
translated: And they will see the jinas in all directions and hear their speech.

original: yan chad smon lam ldan pa tshad med rnam par 'phrul //
analyzed: yan chad smon lam ldan pa tshad med rnam par 'phrul //
translated: “From then on, with their infinite prayers, they will have emanations.

original: 'di ni sa rab dgu pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni sa rab dgu pa ste //
translated: This is the ninth bhūmi,🔽The bhūmi of the wise one, the one with great wisdom.

original: ye shes chen pos rnam par spyod; ;zab cing blta dka' shin tu phra //
analyzed: ye shes chen pos rnam par spyod; ;zab cing blta dka' shin tu phra //
translated: “It is profound, difficult to see, and subtle,

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin //🔽legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis bstan pa yin // legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Taught by the jinas’ heirs.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'o ///
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'o ///
translated: This is the ninth bodhisattva bhūmi,

original: bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa /
translated: The bhūmi called Perfect Understanding.

original: spyod pa bla na med pa 'di thos nas //
analyzed: spyod pa bla na med pa 'di thos nas //
translated: “When they hear this unsurpassable conduct,

original: gtsang gnas lha rnams bye ba rab tu dga'//
analyzed: gtsang gnas lha rnams bye ba rab tu dga'//
translated: The devas in the Pure Abodes are overjoyed.

original: dbang po tshim par bar snang mkha' la gnas //
analyzed: dbang po tshim par bar snang mkha' la gnas //
translated: And they are satisfied in the sky above.

original: bde bar gshegs la rje sar mchod pa byed //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs la rje sar mchod pa byed //
translated: They make offerings to the Sugata.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba bsam yas pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba bsam yas pa //
translated: Innumerable millions of bodhisattvas

original: bar snang mkha' gnas rab tu dga' gyur cing //
analyzed: bar snang mkha' gnas rab tu dga' gyur cing //
translated: Are in the sky above, filled with joy.

original: spos sprin tshad med yid du 'ong ba dag /
analyzed: spos sprin tshad med yid du 'ong ba dag /
translated: They make offerings of fragrant incense

original: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel ba dri zhim bdug pa byed //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel ba dri zhim bdug pa byed //
translated: That removes the afflictions of beings.

original: lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur rab dga' zhing //
analyzed: lha yi dbang po dbang sgyur rab dga' zhing //
translated: The lord of the gods, the one with power, is delighted.🔽With a retinue of a trillion gods,

original: bar snang gnas las lha 'khor khrag khrig dang // rim gro bcas par gos rnams 'dor bar byed //
analyzed: bar snang gnas las lha 'khor khrag khrig dang // rim gro bcas par gos rnams 'dor bar byed //
translated: He makes offerings of clothing from the sky.

original: @202a *// yid 'ong gos brgya yongs su bskor ba byas //
analyzed: @202a *// yid 'ong gos brgya yongs su bskor ba byas //
translated: He makes offerings of hundreds of beautiful garments.

original: lha yi bu mo mang po shin tu dga'//
analyzed: lha yi bu mo mang po shin tu dga'//
translated: Many goddesses are filled with joy.

original: bde bar gshegs la rjes sa mchod pa byed //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs la rjes sa mchod pa byed //
translated: They make offerings to the Sugata.

original: rol mo brdung ba bye ba khrag khrig byed //
analyzed: rol mo brdung ba bye ba khrag khrig byed //
translated: They play trillions of musical instruments.

original: 'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs kun las byung bar gyur //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i sgra dbyangs kun las byung bar gyur //
translated: Such beautiful sounds come from them.

original: zhing mchog gcig na bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs //
analyzed: zhing mchog gcig na bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs //
translated: In one supreme realm, the Sugata resides.

original: zhing rnams kun tu sku gzugs rab tu bstan //
analyzed: zhing rnams kun tu sku gzugs rab tu bstan //
translated: And in all the realms, they manifest their bodies.

original: sku gzugs khrag khrig sna tshogs yid du 'ong //
analyzed: sku gzugs khrag khrig sna tshogs yid du 'ong //
translated: They manifest many quintillions of bodies, delightful,

original: chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas par gang //
analyzed: chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas par gang //
translated: Filling the vast realm of phenomena.

original: spu gcig rtse nas bde gshegs 'od bkye ba //
analyzed: spu gcig rtse nas bde gshegs 'od bkye ba //
translated: From the tip of one hair, Sugatas radiate light

original: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs yongs su zhi bar 'phro //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs yongs su zhi bar 'phro //
translated: That pacifies the afflictions of beings.

original: zhing gi rdul khams zad par nus 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: zhing gi rdul khams zad par nus 'gyur gyi //
translated: One could count the atoms in all the realms,

original: de dag bgrang bas shes par mi nus so //🔽la las sangs rgyas mtshan rab mnga' bar mthong //
analyzed: de dag bgrang bas shes par mi nus so // la las sangs rgyas mtshan rab mnga' bar mthong //
translated: But one cannot know their number.🔽Some see the Buddha with the best of names,

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dam par la las mthong //
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dam par la las mthong //
translated: Some see him as a supreme chakravartin.

original: zhing rnams la lar spyod pa mchog mdzad cing //
analyzed: zhing rnams la lar spyod pa mchog mdzad cing //
translated: In some realms, he performs supreme conduct,

original: dag cing zhi bar rkang gnyis dam pa mthong //
analyzed: dag cing zhi bar rkang gnyis dam pa mthong //
translated: And is seen as the best of humans, pure and peaceful.🔽The Lord dwells in the Tuṣita realm,

original: dga' ldan gnas na mgon po bzhugs pa dang // 'pho dang gshegs par de bzhin rab tu snang //
analyzed: dga' ldan gnas na mgon po bzhugs pa dang // 'pho dang gshegs par de bzhin rab tu snang //
translated: And likewise appears to be passing away.🔽In millions of realms, he dwells in his mother’s womb,

original: zhing rnams bye bar yum gyi skur bzhugs dang // zhing rnams la lar skye ba de bzhin snang //
analyzed: zhing rnams bye bar yum gyi skur bzhugs dang // zhing rnams la lar skye ba de bzhin snang //
translated: And likewise appears to be born in some realms.

original: 'gro ba'i don du mgon po 'byung mdzad dang; ;byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang rgya ba'i //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don du mgon po 'byung mdzad dang; ;byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang rgya ba'i //
translated: And attain supreme, excellent enlightenment.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo mya ngan 'da' ba dag /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo mya ngan 'da' ba dag /
translated: They turn the wheel of the Dharma and pass into nirvāṇa,

original: zhing mang khrag khrig kun na de bzhin snang //
analyzed: zhing mang khrag khrig kun na de bzhin snang //
translated: Manifesting in this way in many millions of realms.

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po mkhas par lobs gyur pa //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po mkhas par lobs gyur pa //
translated: Just as a skilled magician,

original: @202b ji ltar 'tsho phyir gzugs mang ston pa bzhin //
analyzed: @202b ji ltar 'tsho phyir gzugs mang ston pa bzhin //
translated: In order to live, displays many forms,

original: de bzhin ston pa ye shes mchog mkhyen pa //
analyzed: de bzhin ston pa ye shes mchog mkhyen pa //
translated: In the same way, the Teacher, who knows the highest wisdom,

original: sku gzugs kun tu 'gro ba rnams la ston //
analyzed: sku gzugs kun tu 'gro ba rnams la ston //
translated: Manifests forms for all beings.

original: stong pa zhi ba rang bzhin mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: stong pa zhi ba rang bzhin mtshan nyid med //
translated: Emptiness, peace, and the characteristic of no intrinsic nature,

original: chos nyid bar snang mkha' dang mnyam par yang //🔽sangs rgyas ston pa don dam de nyid du //
analyzed: chos nyid bar snang mkha' dang mnyam par yang // sangs rgyas ston pa don dam de nyid du //
translated: The nature of phenomena is the same as space.🔽The Teacher, the Buddha, has taught the ultimate truth

original: sangs rgyas spyod yul mchog gis yang dag bstan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyod yul mchog gis yang dag bstan //
translated: And the supreme sphere of activity of the buddhas.

original: bde gshegs spyod yul rang bzhin ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: bde gshegs spyod yul rang bzhin ci 'dra ba //
translated: The nature of the sphere of activity of the sugatas

original: sems can kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ste //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ste //
translated: Is the same as the nature of all beings.

original: mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dra //
analyzed: mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dra //
translated: It is the same through the sameness of characteristics and the basis of characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid med pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog /
translated: The supreme of all phenomena is without characteristics.

original: bde gshegs ye shes don du su gnyer bas //
analyzed: bde gshegs ye shes don du su gnyer bas //
translated: Those who seek the Sugata’s wisdom

original: rtog dang rnam rtog yongs rtog yongs su spangs //
analyzed: rtog dang rnam rtog yongs rtog yongs su spangs //
translated: Should abandon all conceptual thoughts and discriminations.

original: dngos dang dngos med mnyam nyid shes par gyis //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med mnyam nyid shes par gyis //
translated: Know the equality of things and nonthings.

original: myur du mi yi gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur //🔽'di 'dra'i sgra skad stong snyed du //
analyzed: myur du mi yi gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur // 'di 'dra'i sgra skad stong snyed du //
translated: They will quickly become supreme leaders of humans.🔽Such sounds and voices,

original: snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
analyzed: snyan pa'i dbyangs su brjod byas nas //
translated: Thousands of them, were expressed in melodious tones.

original: lha yi bu mo mi smra zhing //🔽zhi la dga' bar bde gshegs lta //
analyzed: lha yi bu mo mi smra zhing // zhi la dga' bar bde gshegs lta //
translated: The celestial maidens became silent🔽And gazed at the Sugata with peaceful joy.

original: 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas //
analyzed: 'khor rnams zhi bar shes gyur nas //
translated: The retinue understood peace

original: rnam thar zla ba 'jigs med pas //
analyzed: rnam thar zla ba 'jigs med pas //
translated: And the fearless moon of liberation

original: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa //
translated: Said to the fearless vajra heart

original: rgyal sras de la yang smras pa //
analyzed: rgyal sras de la yang smras pa //
translated: And the other bodhisattvas:

original: bcu par yang dag 'phar ba yi //
analyzed: bcu par yang dag 'phar ba yi //
translated: “In the tenth ground,🔽The aspects, qualities, objects of activity,

original: rnam pa yon tan spyod yul dang // mtshan ma dag dang cho 'phrul rnams //
analyzed: rnam pa yon tan spyod yul dang // mtshan ma dag dang cho 'phrul rnams //
translated: Signs, and miracles—

original: mkhas pas kun kyang bstan par mdzod //
analyzed: mkhas pas kun kyang bstan par mdzod //
translated: All of these should be taught by the wise.🔽”

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vajra Heart said:

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i bar du shes @203a *//
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i bar du shes @203a *//
translated: In this way, the bodhisattvas, up to the ninth bodhisattva ground,🔽with a mind that thoroughly investigates immeasurable objects of knowledge,

original: par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su brtags pa'i blos rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba /
analyzed: par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su brtags pa'i blos rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba /
translated: with a thorough differentiation of the categories,

original: chos dkar po shin tu rdzogs pa bsags par bya ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa shin tu bsags pa /
analyzed: chos dkar po shin tu rdzogs pa bsags par bya ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa shin tu bsags pa /
translated: with the complete perfection of virtuous qualities, with the thorough accumulation of infinite accumulations to be gathered,

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyis tshogs yongs su zin pa /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyis tshogs yongs su zin pa /
translated: with the complete embrace of the accumulations of merit and wisdom,

original: snying rje chen po shin tu yangs pa thob pa /
analyzed: snying rje chen po shin tu yangs pa thob pa /
translated: with the attainment of the vast expanse of great compassion,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa /
translated: with expertise in the different classifications of world systems,

original: sems can gyi khams thibs pos nye bar spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thibs pos nye bar spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: with the thorough engagement in the conduct of the dense realm of sentient beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa can stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i rjes su song ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa can stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i rjes su song ba ni /
translated: They have the perception and attention that engages the domain of the tathagatas, and they are focused on the powers, fearlessnesses, and qualities of the buddhas.🔽

original: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is also called the stage of consecration into the knowledge of all the aspects of omniscience.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victorious ones,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: the bodhisattva who has attained the stage of consecration and possesses such knowledge actualizes the bodhisattva’s samādhi called ‘stainless.’

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang; 'od zer gyi me tog rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings rnam par phye ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang; 'od zer gyi me tog rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba dang /
translated: the bodhisattva samādhi called entering the division of the realm of phenomena, the bodhisattva samādhi called the division of the adornments of the seat of awakening, the bodhisattva samādhi called the flowers of light rays in all forms,

original: rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / rgya mtsho'i rgya zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa zhes bya ba dang / chos @203b thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / rgya mtsho'i rgya zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa zhes bya ba dang / chos @203b thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang /
translated: the bodhisattva samādhi called the essence of the ocean, the bodhisattva samādhi called the seal of the ocean, the bodhisattva samādhi called the vastness of the realm of space, the bodhisattva samādhi called the division of the nature of all phenomena, the bodhisattva samādhi called the mind and conduct of all beings,

original: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te /
translated: and the bodhisattva samādhi called the presence of all the buddhas of the present.

original: de la de dag la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag grangs med pa phrag bcu mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la de dag la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag grangs med pa phrag bcu mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: “They will manifest countless quintillions of samādhis such as these.

original: de ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ngo //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ngo //
translated: He enters and arises from all those meditative stabilities.

original: de ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: He is skilled in meditative absorption,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pa de dag thams cad la'ang rab tu spyod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pa de dag thams cad la'ang rab tu spyod do //
translated: and he practices all the purposes of meditative absorption.

original: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu'i tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu'i tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te /
translated: “At the end of ten hundred thousand countless meditative stabilities, the bodhisattva’s meditative absorption called the special consecration of the wisdom of omniscience manifests.

original: de mngon du gyur ma thag tu stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i tha gru dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i padmo chen po rin po che thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du spras shing brgyan pa; 'jig rten thams cad kyi spyod yul las 'das pa /
analyzed: de mngon du gyur ma thag tu stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i tha gru dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i padmo chen po rin po che thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du spras shing brgyan pa; 'jig rten thams cad kyi spyod yul las 'das pa /
translated: As soon as it manifests, a great lotus made of jewels, equal in size to a hundred thousand trichiliocosms, is adorned with all kinds of jewels and ornaments, and it transcends the entire world.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas byung ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas byung ba /
translated: It arises from the roots of merit that transcend the world.

original: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang spyod yul gyis yongs su grub pa /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang spyod yul gyis yongs su grub pa /
translated: the nature of illusion, and the domain of the totally perfect;

original: chos kyi dbyings la shin tu gnas par snang ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la shin tu gnas par snang ba /
translated: appearing as the basis of the realm of phenomena;

original: lha rdzas kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa /
translated: beyond the domain of divine substances;

original: nor bu rin po che bee d'u rya'i chu ba chen po can /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che bee d'u rya'i chu ba chen po can /
translated: with a great stem of the precious jewel vaiḍūrya;

original: tsan dan gyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i snying po can /
analyzed: tsan dan gyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i snying po can /
translated: with the essence of the king of sandalwood;

original: @204a *// aasma garbha rab kyi ze ba can /
analyzed: @204a *// aasma garbha rab kyi ze ba can /
translated: with a pericarp of asmagarbha;

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gis gser ltar snang ba'i lo ma can /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gis gser ltar snang ba'i lo ma can /
translated: with leaves shining like the gold of the Jambū River;

original: 'od zer tshad med pas shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun can /
analyzed: 'od zer tshad med pas shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun can /
translated: with a vast body of immeasurable light rays;

original: rin po che thams cad kyi nang yongs su spras pa /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi nang yongs su spras pa /
translated: adorned with all precious substances;

original: rin po che mu med pa'i dra bas kun nas yog pa /
analyzed: rin po che mu med pa'i dra bas kun nas yog pa /
translated: covered with a net of limitless jewels;

original: stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rin po che'i padmo chen po'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rin po che'i padmo chen po'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: and surrounded by a retinue of as many great precious lotuses as there are atoms in a hundred thousand quintillion three-thousand great world systems.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang rkyen du 'tsham zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang rkyen du 'tsham zhing /
translated: The bodhisattva’s body is also in accord with those conditions.

original: de'i tshul dang mthun par gnas so //
analyzed: de'i tshul dang mthun par gnas so //
translated: It remains in accordance with that way.

original: de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag tu rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de la 'dug par snang ste /
analyzed: de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khyad par gyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag tu rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de la 'dug par snang ste /
translated: As soon as he attains the samādhi called the empowerment of the special wisdom of omniscience, he appears to be seated upon that great precious king of lotuses.

original: rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' de 'dug ma thag tu rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de'i 'khor rin po che'i padmo ji snyed byung ba de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su
analyzed: rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' de 'dug ma thag tu rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po chen po de'i 'khor rin po che'i padmo ji snyed byung ba de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' de yongs su
translated: As soon as the bodhisattva is seated upon that great precious king of lotuses, as many bodhisattvas as there are great precious king of lotuses that have arisen surround that bodhisattva

original: bskor te / rin po che'i padmo chen po de dag la 'khod nas /
analyzed: bskor te / rin po che'i padmo chen po de dag la 'khod nas /
translated: and sit upon those great precious lotuses.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing /
translated: They look at that bodhisattva.

original: de dag re re yang ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu bcu la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: de dag re re yang ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu bcu la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: Each of them enters into ten thousand samādhis.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As soon as those bodhisattvas and those bodhisattvas enter into samādhi, the entire world-realm shakes.

original: ngan @204b song thams cad rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngan @204b song thams cad rtse zhil bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All the lower realms are pacified.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The entire realm of phenomena is filled with light.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: All world-realms become pure.

original: zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sgra grag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sgra grag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The sound of the Buddha resounds in all realms.

original: skal ba dang spyod pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skal ba dang spyod pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All bodhisattvas with similar aspirations and conduct gather.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang mi'i rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang mi'i rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sounds of the music and song of gods and humans resound in all world-realms.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the happiness of all sentient beings will also be produced.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro yang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro yang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And inconceivable worship and service will be produced for all the perfect buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kyang rnam par dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kyang rnam par dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: And the maṇḍalas of the retinue of all the tathāgatas will be perceived.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O sons of the victors!

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ni rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po de la 'dug ma thag tu rkang pa'i mthil gnyis kyi 'og nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ni rin po che'i padmo'i rgyal po de la 'dug ma thag tu rkang pa'i mthil gnyis kyi 'og nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ngo //
translated: As soon as that bodhisattva sits on that king of precious lotuses, from under both his feet ten times a hundred thousand countless light rays emerge.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad snang bar byas te /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad snang bar byas te /
translated: Having emerged, they illuminate the great Avīci hell and so on in the ten directions.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
translated: And they pacify all suffering.

original: pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /🔽byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byol song gi skye gnas kyi gnas @205a *//
analyzed: pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste / byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byol song gi skye gnas kyi gnas @205a *//
translated: Ten times countless hundreds of thousands of light rays come forth from his two knees.

original: thams cad snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: thams cad snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having come forth, they illuminate all the animal realms in the ten directions.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
translated: They also completely pacify the sufferings .

original: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: Ten times countless hundreds of thousands of light rays come forth from his navel.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having come forth, they illuminate all the worlds of the Lord of Death in the ten directions.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
translated: They also completely pacify the sufferings .

original: g-yas g-yon gyi rtsib logs gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: g-yas g-yon gyi rtsib logs gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: Ten times countless hundreds of thousands of light rays come forth from his two sides.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur mi'i gnas rnams snang bar byas te /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur mi'i gnas rnams snang bar byas te /
translated: Having come forth, they illuminate the human realms in the ten directions.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
translated: They also completely pacify the sufferings .

original: lag pa'i mthil gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: lag pa'i mthil gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: Ten times one hundred thousand light rays emerge from the palms of his hands.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur lha dang lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur lha dang lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having emerged, they illuminate the abodes of the gods and asuras in the ten directions.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
translated: They also pacify all suffering.

original: phrag pa gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: phrag pa gnyis nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: Ten times one hundred thousand light rays emerge from his two shoulders.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi gnas snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi gnas snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having emerged, they illuminate the abodes of those in the Hearers’ Vehicle in the ten directions.

original: chos snang ba'i sgo yang nye bar bsgrub bo //
analyzed: chos snang ba'i sgo yang nye bar bsgrub bo //
translated: They also establish the gateway of the light of the Dharma.🔽Ten times one hundred thousand light rays emerge from his back and neck.

original: rgyab dang mgul nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste; byung nas kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: rgyab dang mgul nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste; byung nas kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having emerged, they illuminate all the abodes of the solitary buddhas.

original: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo'ang nye bar sgrub bo //
analyzed: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo'ang nye bar sgrub bo //
translated: They also establish the gateway of the method of the samādhi of peace.

original: kha'i sgo nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs @205b med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: kha'i sgo nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs @205b med pa phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: From his mouth come forth countless hundreds of thousands of light rays.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having come forth, they illuminate the bodhisattvas in the ten directions, from the first production of the thought of awakening up to the attainment of the ninth stage.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi tshul gyi sgo yang nye bar bsgrub bo //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi tshul gyi sgo yang nye bar bsgrub bo //
translated: They also establish the gateway of the method of wisdom.

original: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcur 'byung ste /
analyzed: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcur 'byung ste /
translated: From his forehead come forth countless hundreds of thousands of light rays.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyi mnan te /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyi mnan te /
translated: Having come forth, they overpower all the abodes of Mara in the ten directions.

original: dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas nas de dag gi lus su nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas nas de dag gi lus su nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: They illuminate the bodhisattvas who have attained the stage of consecration and then disappear into their bodies.

original: yan lag dam pa'i spyi gtsug nas 'od zer stong gsum brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ste /
analyzed: yan lag dam pa'i spyi gtsug nas 'od zer stong gsum brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ste /
translated: From his sublime crown protrusion come forth as many light rays as there are atoms in countless hundreds of thousands of billion-world universes.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te /
translated: Having arisen, it illuminates all the circles of retinue of the Tathagatas in the ten directions.

original: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor ba byas nas steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dug ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor ba byas nas steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dug ste /
translated: Having circled the world ten times, it remains in the realm of the sky above.

original: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du byas nas /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du byas nas /
translated: Having become a circle of a net of light rays,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba 'od shin tu gsal ba zhes bya ba rab tu byed do //🔽mchod pa dang rim gro de la sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro byas pas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba 'od shin tu gsal ba zhes bya ba rab tu byed do // mchod pa dang rim gro de la sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro byas pas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: it performs worship and service to the Tathagata, called the performance of the very bright light.🔽In that worship and service, from the time of taking up the first production of the thought up to the time of attaining the ninth stage, the worship and service to the Tathagata does not approach even a hundredth part.

original: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig gi cha dang / khrag @206a *//
analyzed: stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig gi cha dang / khrag @206a *//
translated: It does not approach a thousandth part, a hundred thousandth part, a one with a hundred zeros, a one with a thousand zeros, a one with a hundred thousand zeros, a one with a million zeros, a one with a billion zeros, a one with a trillion zeros, a one with a quintillion zeros, a one with a sextillion zeros, a one with a septillion zeros, a one with an octillion zeros, a one with a nonillion zeros, a one with a decillion zeros, a one with a hundred decillions of zeros, a one with a thousand decillions of zeros, a one with a hundred thousand decillions of zeros, a one with a million decillions of zeros, a one with a billion decillions of zeros, a one with a trillion decillions of zeros, a one with a quintillion decillions of zeros, a one with a sextillion decillions of zeros, a one with a septillion decillions of zeros, a one with an octillion decillions of zeros, a one with a nonillion decillions of zeros, a one with a hundred decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a thousand decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a hundred thousand decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a million decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a billion decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a trillion decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a quintillion decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a sextillion decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with a septillion decillions of nonillions of zeros, a one with an octillion dec

original: khrig brgya'i cha dang / khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽grangs dang; cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
analyzed: khrig brgya'i cha dang / khrag khrig stong gi cha dang / khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // grangs dang; cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
translated: It does not approach even a hundred-thousandth part, a hundred-thousand-millionth part, a hundred-thousand-trillionth part, or even a hundred-thousand-quintillionth part of it.

original: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog go /
analyzed: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du'ang mi chog go /
translated: It does not approach it in terms of number, fraction, calculation, simile, or cause, up to not even being able to bear comparison.

original: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de las phyogs bcu na me tog tu gdags pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de las phyogs bcu na me tog tu gdags pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: “From that great maṇḍala of a web of light rays, in the ten directions there were designated flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, clothes, parasols, banners,

original: ba dan dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po cher gdags pa ci yod pa de dag thams cad las lhag cing 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis grub pa dag sprin chen po'i char bzhin du mngon par 'bab bo //
