analyzed: ba dan dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po cher gdags pa ci yod pa de dag thams cad las lhag cing 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis grub pa dag sprin chen po'i char bzhin du mngon par 'bab bo //
translated: They are superior to all the banners, precious ornaments, and precious jewels that exist, and they are created by the power of roots of virtue that transcend all worldly realms.

original: mchod pa de dag sems can gang gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchod pa de dag sems can gang gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: All the sentient beings who see those offerings will become destined for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mchod pa dang rim gro'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byas nas kyang 'od zer de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: mchod pa dang rim gro'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byas nas kyang 'od zer de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas nas /
translated: After making those kinds of offerings and services, those light rays illuminate all the maṇḍalas of the retinue of tathāgatas.

original: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor ba byas te /
analyzed: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor ba byas te /
translated: They circle the world ten times

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @206b rnams kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @206b rnams kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur te /
translated: It will disappear into the soles of the feet of the tathagatas, the arhats, the utterly perfected buddhas.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa che ge mo zhig tu de lta bu'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud do //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa che ge mo zhig tu de lta bu'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud do //
translated: Then the tathagatas and the bodhisattvas will know that the time has come for the bodhisattva in that particular world system to receive empowerment.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the buddhas,

original: der phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa 'ongs te /
analyzed: der phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa 'ongs te /
translated: from the ten directions, bodhisattvas who are on the ninth bodhisattva level and who are infinite in number will come.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de la kun nas bskor nas mchod pa chen po byas te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de la kun nas bskor nas mchod pa chen po byas te /
translated: They will gather around the bodhisattva and make great offerings to him.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu la so so nas mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu la so so nas mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: They will look at the bodhisattva and each of them will enter ten thousand samadhis.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams kyi dpal gyi be'u dang / rdo rje dang / bkra shis las bdud kyi dgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po gcig 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu dang ldan par 'byung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams kyi dpal gyi be'u dang / rdo rje dang / bkra shis las bdud kyi dgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po gcig 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu dang ldan par 'byung ste /
translated: For the bodhisattvas who have attained the level of consecration, a great light ray called Victory over the Enemy of Demons arises from the auspicious knot, the vajra, and the swastika, accompanied by a retinue of countless hundreds of thousands of light rays.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having arisen, it illuminates the ten directions.

original: cho 'phrul mu med par yang dag par bstan te /
analyzed: cho 'phrul mu med par yang dag par bstan te /
translated: It displays boundless miracles.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de'i dpal gyi be'u dang / rdo rje dang / bkra shis su nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de'i dpal gyi be'u dang / rdo rje dang / bkra shis su nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: It disappears into the auspicious knot, the vajra, and the swastika of that bodhisattva.

original: 'od zer de dag der nub ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs dang / mthu yang brgya phrag stong gyur pas kyang lhag par mngon par 'phel bar snang ngo //
analyzed: 'od zer de dag der nub ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs dang / mthu yang brgya phrag stong gyur pas kyang lhag par mngon par 'phel bar snang ngo //
translated: As soon as that light ray disappears there, the power and strength of that bodhisattva appear to increase a thousandfold.

original: @207a *// kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: @207a *// kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dang ldan pa 'byung ste
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dang ldan pa 'byung ste
translated: Then from the ūrṇā hair between the eyebrows of those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas, a circle of light rays called endowed with the higher knowledge of omniscience and accompanied by countless circles of light rays emerges.

original: / de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: / de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas /
translated: Those light rays illuminate all the world systems in the ten directions without exception.

original: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor te /
analyzed: 'jig rten lan bcur bskor te /
translated: They circle the world ten times,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po bstan nas; byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang dag par bskul nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po bstan nas; byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang dag par bskul nas /
translated: display the great magical emanations of the tathāgatas, inspire many quintillions of bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu bskyod de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu bskyod de /
translated: and shake all the infinite buddha realms in six ways.

original: ngan song thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud dang / skye ba dang / shi 'pho rab tu zhi bar byas nas /
analyzed: ngan song thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud dang / skye ba dang / shi 'pho rab tu zhi bar byas nas /
translated: They pacify the realms of rebirth and death in all the lower realms,🔽and

original: bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis mnan te /
analyzed: bdud kyi gnas thams cad zil gyis mnan te /
translated: It outshone all the abodes of the māras.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdan yang dag par bstan nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdan yang dag par bstan nas /
translated: It revealed the buddha seats of the tathāgatas’ full awakening to buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i mthu rab tu bstan te /🔽'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i mthu rab tu bstan te / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: It revealed the power of the adornments of the retinues of all the buddhas.🔽It illuminated all world systems as far as the limits of space and the realm of phenomena.

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad snang bar byas nas phyir log ste @207b byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng nas bskor ba byas te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad snang bar byas nas phyir log ste @207b byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng nas bskor ba byas te /
translated: It then returned and circled above the entire retinue of bodhisattvas.

original: rgyan chen po bstan nas 'od zer de dag byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi dam par nub bo //
analyzed: rgyan chen po bstan nas 'od zer de dag byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi dam par nub bo //
translated: It revealed its great adornments and then disappeared into the bodhisattva’s crown protrusion.

original: de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams kyang de ltar tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgor nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams kyang de ltar tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgor nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The light rays of the retinue also disappeared into the crowns of the bodhisattvas who had gathered there.

original: 'od zer de dag gis phog ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngan chad ma thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu rab tu thob bo //
analyzed: 'od zer de dag gis phog ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngan chad ma thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu bcu rab tu thob bo //
translated: As soon as those light rays touch them, those bodhisattvas attain ten thousand samādhis that they had not attained before.

original: 'od zer de dag kyang dus gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan chad dam pa la 'char bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'od zer de dag kyang dus gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan chad dam pa la 'char bar 'gyur te /
translated: Those light rays also shine upward from those bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' de yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
translated: and those bodhisattvas are said to be consecrated in the domain of the perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bgrang ba yang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bgrang ba yang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having perfected the ten powers, they attain the state of being counted as perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa las btsas pa /
analyzed: dper na / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa las btsas pa /
translated: For example, the eldest son of a cakravartin king, born of a great queen,

original: rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos lha'i glang po rin po che la gser gyi khri dam pa'i steng du bzhag ste; steng du bla re bres shing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo brdung ba dang /
analyzed: rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos lha'i glang po rin po che la gser gyi khri dam pa'i steng du bzhag ste; steng du bla re bres shing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo brdung ba dang /
translated: The universal monarch places the prince, who bears the marks of a universal monarch, on the back of the precious elephant of the gods, on a golden throne, and covers him with a canopy.

original: dkrol ba dang / glu'i dbyangs la sogs pa'i rgyan chen po byas te /
analyzed: dkrol ba dang / glu'i dbyangs la sogs pa'i rgyan chen po byas te /
translated: He is adorned with a great array of parasols, victory banners, flags, music,

original: rgya mtsho @208a *//
analyzed: rgya mtsho @208a *//
translated: and songs.

original: chen po bzhi las chu blangs pa gser gyi bum pas bcus te /
analyzed: chen po bzhi las chu blangs pa gser gyi bum pas bcus te /
translated: He takes water from the four great oceans in a golden vase,

original: chu des gzhon nu de'i spyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur na dbang bskur ma thag tu de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
analyzed: chu des gzhon nu de'i spyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur na dbang bskur ma thag tu de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
translated: and with that water he consecrates the prince’s head. As soon as he is consecrated, he is counted as a king who has been consecrated on the crown of the head.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas ni 'khor los bsgyur bar bgrang ba rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas ni 'khor los bsgyur bar bgrang ba rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: When he has completed the path of the ten virtuous actions, he attains the rank of a universal monarch.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dbang bskur ma thag tu ye shes kyi dbang mngon par bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dbang bskur ma thag tu ye shes kyi dbang mngon par bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
translated: In the same way, as soon as the bodhisattvas are consecrated by those blessed buddhas, they are said to be consecrated by the consecration of the consecration of wisdom.

original: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o //
translated: And when they have perfected the ten powers, they are counted as truly perfect buddhas.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di ni gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba brgya stong du ma rtsom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba brgya stong du ma rtsom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva consecration for which bodhisattvas undertake hundreds of thousands of hardships.

original: de de ltar mngon par dbang bskur zhing yon tan dang ye shes rnam par 'phel ba ni /
analyzed: de de ltar mngon par dbang bskur zhing yon tan dang ye shes rnam par 'phel ba ni /
translated: When they are thus consecrated and their qualities and wisdom increase,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: they are said to abide on the bodhisattva ground Cloud of Dharma.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: The bodhisattva who is on the bodhisattva bhūmi Cloud of Dharma knows the establishment of the element of phenomena just as it is.

original: 'dod pa'i khams @208b yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams @208b yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
translated: He knows the establishment of the element of desire, the establishment of the element of form, the establishment of the formless element, the establishment of the world element, the establishment of the element of sentient beings,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i khams bstan pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i khams bstan pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
translated: the establishment of the element of consciousness, the establishment of the element of the compounded and the uncompounded, the establishment of the element of space, and the establishment of the teaching of the element of the real and the unreal.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows perfectly the realm of nirvana, the various views, and the afflictions.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'du ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / nyan thos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'du ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / nyan thos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
translated: He knows perfectly the formation and dissolution of the world, the practice of the disciples, the practice of the solitary sages, and the practice of the bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / chos kyi sku yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / chos kyi sku yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
translated: He knows perfectly the powers, the fearlessnesses, the form body, and the Dharma body of the Tathagata, and he knows perfectly the gnosis of omniscience in all its aspects, and he awakens to highest genuine full Awakening.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bzlog pa bstan pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / mdor bsdu @209a *//
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bzlog pa bstan pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / mdor bsdu @209a *//
translated: the turning of the wheel of the Dharma, the demonstration of the reversal of the wheel of the Dharma, and the demonstration of the establishment of the wheel of the Dharma.

original: na chos thams cad rnam par phye ba la 'jug cing shin tu brtag pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: na chos thams cad rnam par phye ba la 'jug cing shin tu brtag pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: In brief, he knows perfectly as it truly is the engagement in the analysis of all phenomena and the establishment of the thorough analysis.

original: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i blos gong du sems can rnams kyi sprul pa'i las yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i blos gong du sems can rnams kyi sprul pa'i las yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: “With a mind endowed with such knowledge, he correctly knows, as it is, the emanated actions of sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sprul pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa'i sprul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprul pa dang / chos kyi khams kyi sprul pa dang / nyan thos kyi sprul pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sprul pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa'i sprul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprul pa dang / chos kyi khams kyi sprul pa dang / nyan thos kyi sprul pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa dang /
translated: He knows the emanation of afflictions, the emanation of the aspects of views, the emanation of the world systems, the emanation of the element of phenomena, the emanation of śrāvakas, the emanation of pratyekabuddhas, the emanation of bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / sprul pa thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa dang / rnam par mi dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / sprul pa thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa dang / rnam par mi dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the emanations of the Tathāgata and all emanations, whether they are manifested or not, just as they are.

original: de sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the blessings of the Buddha just as they are.

original: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dge 'dun gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / nyon mongs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mchod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
analyzed: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dge 'dun gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / nyon mongs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / dus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mchod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
translated: He knows the blessings of the Dharma, the blessings of the Saṅgha, the blessings of karma, the blessings of afflictions, the blessings of time, the blessings of aspirations, the blessings of worship,

original: spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: the blessings of conduct, the blessings of eons, and the blessings of wisdom just as they are.

original: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /
translated: It is the subtle knowledge of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas,

original: @209b spyod pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: @209b spyod pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the subtle knowledge of conduct,

original: skye ba dang 'pho ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: skye ba dang 'pho ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the subtle knowledge of birth and transference,

original: sku tshe phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: sku tshe phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the subtle knowledge of lifespan,🔽the subtle knowledge of renunciation,

original: mngon par 'byung ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam; mngon par byang chub pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: mngon par 'byung ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam; mngon par byang chub pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the subtle knowledge of enlightenment,

original: rnam par 'phrul pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the subtle knowledge of miracles,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the subtle knowledge of turning the wheel of Dharma,

original: sku tshe'i tshad byin gyi rlabs pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad byin gyi rlabs pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the subtle knowledge of the blessing of lifespan,

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: and the subtle knowledge of parinirvāṇa.

original: bstan pa gnas pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bstan pa gnas pa phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows all those wisdoms that engage with the subtle abiding of the teachings just as they are.

original: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba la 'jug pa'i gnas 'di lta te /
analyzed: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba la 'jug pa'i gnas 'di lta te /
translated: “This is the secret of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas:

original: sku'i gsang ba'am /
analyzed: sku'i gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of the body,

original: gsung gi gsang ba'am /
analyzed: gsung gi gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of speech,

original: thugs kyi gsang ba'am /
analyzed: thugs kyi gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of mind,

original: dus dang dus ma yin pa thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba'am /
analyzed: dus dang dus ma yin pa thugs su chud pa'i gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of understanding the right and wrong time,

original: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i gsang ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of the bodhisattvas’ predictions,

original: sems can bsdu ba dang / tshar gcad pa gsang ba'am /
analyzed: sems can bsdu ba dang / tshar gcad pa gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of gathering and subduing beings,

original: theg pa tha dad pa gsang ba'am /
analyzed: theg pa tha dad pa gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of the different vehicles,

original: sems can gyi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnam par phye ba gsang ba'am /
analyzed: sems can gyi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnam par phye ba gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of the different behaviors and faculties of beings,

original: las dang bya ba la 'jug pa gsang ba'am /
analyzed: las dang bya ba la 'jug pa gsang ba'am /
translated: the secret of engaging in actions and deeds,🔽and the secret of the different kinds of wisdom.

original: spyod pa dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa thugs su chud pa gsang ba de dag thams @210a *//
analyzed: spyod pa dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa thugs su chud pa gsang ba de dag thams @210a *//
translated: He knows all those secret aspects of the nature of conduct and manifest enlightenment that are to be understood.

original: cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
analyzed: cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows them all just as they are.

original: gang 'di dag bskal pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /🔽bskal pa gcig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal pa la bskal pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: gang 'di dag bskal pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste / bskal pa gcig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal pa la bskal pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
translated: “He has the wisdom that engages with eons, as follows:🔽He engages with one eon as countless eons, with countless eons as one eon, and with countless eons as countless eons.

original: bskal pa gcig la bskal pa dang / bskal pa la skad cig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa la bskal pa ma yin par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: bskal pa gcig la bskal pa dang / bskal pa la skad cig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa la bskal pa ma yin par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
translated: He engages with one eon as an instant, with an instant as an eon, with an instant as not an instant, and with an eon as not an eon.

original: sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /🔽da ltar byung ba la da ltar byung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal par 'jug cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la da ltar byung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal par 'jug cing /
translated: They know how to enter an eon without a buddha into an eon with a buddha, and how to enter an eon with a buddha into an eon without a buddha.🔽They know how to enter the past, future, and present into the present, and how to enter the present, past, and future into the past and future.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa ring po la bskal pa thung ngur yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thung ngu la bskal pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa ring po la bskal pa thung ngur yang dag par 'jug pa dang / bskal pa thung ngu la bskal pa ring por yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
translated: They know how to enter a long eon into a short eon, and how to enter a short eon into a long eon.🔽They know how to enter all eons into a single eon, and how to enter a single eon into all eons.

original: bskal pa thams @210b cad la ming du btags par yang dag par 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bskal pa thams @210b cad la ming du btags par yang dag par 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
translated: They know all of this as it truly is.

original: gang 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'i ye shes 'di lta ste /
translated: It is the wisdom that is understood by the thus-gone ones, namely,

original: skra'i rtse mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: skra'i rtse mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the wisdom that engages the tips of hairs,

original: rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the wisdom that engages the subtlest particles,

original: zhing mang po mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: zhing mang po mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the wisdom that engages the manifest awakening in many realms,

original: sems can gyi lus dang / sems mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: sems can gyi lus dang / sems mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the wisdom that engages the manifest awakening of the bodies and minds of sentient beings,🔽the wisdom that engages the manifest awakening that pervades everything,

original: thams cad du khyab pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam; snrel zhi'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa'i ye shes sam /🔽lugs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: thams cad du khyab pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam; snrel zhi'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa'i ye shes sam / lugs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the wisdom that reveals the conduct of the crisscross,🔽the wisdom that engages the teaching of the conduct that accords with the system,

original: lugs dang mi mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: lugs dang mi mthun pa'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: the wisdom that engages the teaching of the conduct that does not accord with the system,🔽and

original: 'jig rten bsam du rung ba dang / bsam du mi rung ba dang / rnam par shes par rung ba dang / rnam par shes par mi rung ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
analyzed: 'jig rten bsam du rung ba dang / bsam du mi rung ba dang / rnam par shes par rung ba dang / rnam par shes par mi rung ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes sam /
translated: It is the knowledge that engages in teaching the conduct that is suitable or unsuitable for the world, and that is suitable or unsuitable for consciousness.

original: nyan thos kyis shes par bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpas shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba @211a *//
analyzed: nyan thos kyis shes par bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpas shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par bya ba'i spyod pa yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba @211a *//
translated: It is the knowledge that engages in teaching the conduct that is to be known by the śrāvakas, the conduct that is to be known by the pratyekabuddhas, the conduct that is to be known by the bodhisattvas, and the conduct that is to be known by the tathāgatas.

original: bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bzhin du des rab tu shes so //
translated: All of those he knows perfectly and as they are.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the victors,

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes shin tu yangs pa tshad med pas sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyang tshad med do //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes shin tu yangs pa tshad med pas sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyang tshad med do //
translated: in that way, the bodhisattvas who are on this bhūmi have immeasurable knowledge that engages in teaching the conduct that is to be known by the śrāvakas, the conduct that is to be known by the pratyekabuddhas, the conduct that is to be known by the bodhisattvas, and the conduct that is to be known by the tathāgatas.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, the one called Immovability, attains the bodhisattva liberation called “inconceivable.”

original: bsgribs pa med pa zhes bya ba dang / rnam par dag pa rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / sgo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba dang / 'khor lo thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa zhes bya ba dang / rnam par dag pa rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / sgo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba dang / 'khor lo thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /
translated: He also attains the bodhisattva liberations called “unobstructed,” “the discernment of purity,” “the illumination of all gates,” “the treasury of the tathāgatas,” “endowed with the unobstructed wheel,”

original: dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba dang / yul ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba dang / yul ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: “the one that follows the three times,” “the essence of the realm of phenomena,” “the illumination of the maṇḍala of liberation,” and “the one that is without exception with regard to objects.”

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa /
translated: These ten kinds of bodhisattva liberation are the doors to countless hundreds of thousands of other kinds of liberation.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas rab tu thob ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas rab tu thob ste /
translated: “The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi, the bodhisattva Stainless Light, attains countless hundreds of thousands of doors of liberation such as these ten liberations.

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag stong dang / gzungs brgya phrag @211b stong dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa brgya phrag stong yang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag stong dang / gzungs brgya phrag @211b stong dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa brgya phrag stong yang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: “He attains hundreds of thousands of samādhis, hundreds of thousands of dhāraṇīs, and hundreds of thousands of accomplishments of higher cognitions.

original: de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i blo dang / tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i dran pa mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i blo dang / tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i dran pa mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: “He has a mind endowed with such wisdom and has skill in the infinite aspects of mindfulness.

original: de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin to //
analyzed: de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin to //
translated: “In one instant, a short moment, a small fraction of time, he receives from countless bhagavān buddhas of the ten directions the great illumination of the Dharma, the great light of the Dharma, and the great cloud of the Dharma.

original: mos par byed do //🔽yang dag par len to //
analyzed: mos par byed do // yang dag par len to //
translated: They are made to be interested.🔽They are taken up.

original: bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: bdag gir byed do //
translated: They are made one’s own.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:🔽A great mass of water that is released from the clouds of the king of nāgas of the ocean cannot be endured,🔽taken up,

original: dper na / rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i sprin las rnam par bkye ba'i chu'i phung po chen po ni rgya mtsho chen po ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis bzod pa'am /🔽bdag gir bya ba dang / blang ba'am /
analyzed: dper na / rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po'i sprin las rnam par bkye ba'i chu'i phung po chen po ni rgya mtsho chen po ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis bzod pa'am / bdag gir bya ba dang / blang ba'am /
translated: or held by any place on earth other than the great ocean.

original: gzung bar mi nus so; ;kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: gzung bar mi nus so; ;kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O jinaputras!

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po de dag ni sems can thams cad dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po de dag ni sems can thams cad dang /
translated: In the same way, those great clouds of the Dharma of the tathāgatas, those great lights of the Dharma, those great radiances of the Dharma, those great rains of the Dharma cannot be endured,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa'i bar la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang bzod pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sa dang po nye bar bzung ba yan chad sa dgu pa'i bar la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang bzod pa'am /
translated: It is not easy for all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and also for the bodhisattvas who are on the first stage up to the ninth stage, to accept,🔽take up,

original: blang ba'am / yang dag par gzung ba'am /🔽bdag gir bya bar sla ba ma yin te /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i @212a *//
analyzed: blang ba'am / yang dag par gzung ba'am / bdag gir bya bar sla ba ma yin te / byang chub sems dpa'i @212a *//
translated: uphold,🔽or appropriate this Dharma discourse called “The White Lotus of the Good Dharma.”

original: sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag thams cad la mos par byed do //
analyzed: sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag thams cad la mos par byed do //
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva stage Cloud of Dharma can accept,🔽take up,

original: yang dag par len to //
analyzed: yang dag par len to //
translated: uphold,

original: yang dag par 'dzin te; ;bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin te; ;bdag gir byed do //
translated: and appropriate all of them.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / rgya mtsho chen po ni klu'i rgyal po chen po gcig gi sprin chen po yang bzod do //
analyzed: dper na / rgya mtsho chen po ni klu'i rgyal po chen po gcig gi sprin chen po yang bzod do //
translated: For example, the great ocean can accept,🔽take up,

original: len to // 'dzin to //🔽bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: len to // 'dzin to //🔽bdag gir byed do //
translated: uphold,🔽and appropriate the great cloud of a single great king of the nāgas.

original: klu'i rgyal po chen po gnyis dang / gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar gyi sprin chen po dag kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis bzod do //🔽len to // 'dzin to; ;bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: klu'i rgyal po chen po gnyis dang / gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar gyi sprin chen po dag kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis bzod do // len to // 'dzin to; ;bdag gir byed do //
translated: He can also endure, take up, hold, and possess the great clouds of the two great nāga kings, the three, and so on up to the immeasurable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgya mtsho chen po de tshad med par rgya che zhing yangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po de tshad med par rgya che zhing yangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because that great ocean is immeasurable, vast, and extensive.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /🔽de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa rnams bzod do //🔽yang dag par len to //
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa rnams bzod do // yang dag par len to //
translated: “O jinaputras!🔽In the same way, the bodhisattva on this bodhisattva bhūmi Cloud of Dharma can endure, take up, hold, and possess the great Dharma illumination, the great Dharma light, and the great Dharma cloud of a single tathāgata in a single instant, a single moment.

original: yang dag par 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin to //
translated: He can also endure, take up, hold, and possess the great Dharma illumination, the great Dharma light, and the great Dharma cloud of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas of the ten directions in the east, and so on up to the immeasurable.

original: bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: bdag gir byed do //
translated: Why is that?🔽It is because this bodhisattva has attained the great cloud of the Dharma of the bodhisattva bhūmi Cloud of Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis dang / gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar dag las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa bzod @212b do; ;yang dag par 'dzin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis dang / gsum nas tshad med pa'i bar dag las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po tshad med pa bzod @212b do; ;yang dag par 'dzin to //
translated: I can also endure, take up, and hold the great light of the Dharma, the great radiance of the Dharma, and the great clouds of the Dharma from two, three, up to infinite tathāgatas in an instant, a short moment, a brief moment.

original: yang dag par len to //
analyzed: yang dag par len to //
translated: I can also take them up,🔽I can also possess them,

original: bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: bdag gir byed do //
translated: and I can also uphold them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
analyzed: sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
translated: This bhūmi is called the Cloud of Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vimukti candra said:

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang; chos kyi sprin chen po bzod par byed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang; chos kyi sprin chen po bzod par byed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /
translated: From how many tathāgatas can a bodhisattva endure, take up, and hold the great light of the Dharma, the great radiance of the Dharma, and the great clouds of the Dharma in an instant, a short moment, a brief moment?

original: yang dag par len cing bdag gir byed pa de dag bgrang bar nus sam /
analyzed: yang dag par len cing bdag gir byed pa de dag bgrang bar nus sam /
translated: Can you count the number of those who have taken up and accepted them?”

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vajra garbha said,

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po bzod cing yang dag par len pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin cing bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyed cig las byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba chen po dang / chos kyi 'od chen po dang / chos kyi sprin chen po bzod cing yang dag par len pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin cing bdag gir byed do //
translated: In one instant, a short moment, a small instant, the bodhisattva can endure, take up, hold, and accept the great light of the Dharma, the great light of the Dharma, and the great cloud of the Dharma from this many thus-gone ones.

original: zhes grangs kyis shin tu bstan pa'i tshul du bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes grangs kyis shin tu bstan pa'i tshul du bgrang bar sla ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not easy to count them in the manner of teaching through numbers.

original: 'on kyang dpe tsam du bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang dpe tsam du bstan par bya'o //
translated: However, I will teach through an analogy.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the victors!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: dper na / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa; bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na /
analyzed: dper na / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa; bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na /
translated: For example, in the worlds of the ten directions, in buddha realms as numerous as the atoms in buddha realms inexpressibly numerous times one hundred thousand myriads of koṭis,

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i tshul du ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can gcig cig thos pa @213a *//
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i tshul du ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can gcig cig thos pa @213a *//
translated: In the same way, there was a bodhisattva mahāsattva named Sūryaprabha, who had attained the retention of hearing.

original: 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to //
translated: He had attained the retention of hearing.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dper na / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje padmo'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dge slong rnam par rgyal ba chen po zhes bya ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan thos chen po thos pa 'dzin pa'i🔽mchog tu phyin par gyur la; rnam pa de lta bu'i thos pa 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sems can gcig po de ldan par gyur te /
analyzed: dper na / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje padmo'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dge slong rnam par rgyal ba chen po zhes bya ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan thos chen po thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu phyin par gyur la; rnam pa de lta bu'i thos pa 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sems can gcig po de ldan par gyur te /
translated: it was like the bhikṣu Mahāvikrāmin, who was the attendant of the bhagavān, the tathāgata, the arhat, the perfectly enlightened buddha Vajra­padma­guru.🔽He had attained the highest retention of hearing.

original: sems can gcig po de ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad dang ldan par gyur la /
analyzed: sems can gcig po de ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad dang ldan par gyur la /
translated: In the same way, all the beings in all those worlds had attained the power and strength of the retention of hearing.

original: gcig gis gang bzung ba de bzhin gyis bzung na /
analyzed: gcig gis gang bzung ba de bzhin gyis bzung na /
translated: If one of them were to retain what the other one has retained,

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors,

original: de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de la ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de dag tshad med cing mang ba yin mod /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de dag tshad med cing mang ba yin mod /
translated: Are the retentions of those beings’ retentive consciousnesses not immeasurable and vast?”

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vimukti candra said,

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors,

original: sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de ni mang ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa de ni mang ste /
translated: the retentions of those beings’ retentive consciousnesses are vast,

original: tshad kyang med do //
analyzed: tshad kyang med do //
translated: and they are immeasurable.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva Vajra garbha said,

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors,

original: khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang yid ches par bya na /
analyzed: khyod kyis khong du chud pa dang yid ches par bya na /
translated: you should understand and believe that

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig @213b tu chos kyi snang ba dang / 'od dang / sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las kyang skad cig yud tsam thang cig @213b tu chos kyi snang ba dang / 'od dang / sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to //
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi Cloud of Dharma, in a single instant, a single moment, receives from a single tathāgata the great Dharma illumination, the great Dharma radiance, and the great Dharma cloud called the treasury of the dharmadhātu of the three times.🔽

original: yang dag par 'dzin to //🔽bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin to // bdag gir byed do //
translated: The bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva bhūmi Cloud of Dharma, in a single instant, a single moment, receives, holds, and possesses from a single tathāgata the great Dharma illumination, light, and cloud called the treasury of the realm of phenomena of the three times.🔽He receives, holds, and possesses the knowledge that receives the great Dharma illumination, light, and cloud.

original: chos kyi snang ba dang / 'od dang / sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin pa'i shes pa de la thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba dang / 'od dang / sprin chen po yang dag par 'dzin pa'i shes pa de la thos pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: That previous knowledge that receives the Dharma does not approach even a hundredth part of it.

original: stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang /
analyzed: stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang /
translated: a thousandth part, a hundred thousandth part, a ten millionth part, a thousand millionth part, a ten thousand millionth part, a million millionth part, a hundred thousand million millionth part, a count,

original: cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang; rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
analyzed: cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang; rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
translated: a fraction, a comparison, an illustration, or an example, up to being equal in number.

original: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du yang mi chog go /
analyzed: bsgrun pa tsam gyi bar du yang mi chog go /
translated: It is not even possible to say that it is a mere fraction.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu chos kyi snang ba dang /
translated: Just as it is with one tathāgata, so it is with as many perfectly awakened buddhas as there are atoms in all the world systems in the ten directions, and even more than that, with immeasurable tathāgatas. In one instant, a short moment, a small fraction of time, the light of the Dharma

original: 'od dang / sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to //
analyzed: 'od dang / sprin chen po chos kyi dbyings dus gsum gyi mdzod ces bya ba bzod cing yang dag par len to //
translated: He is patient and accepts the great cloud of light called the treasury of the dharmadhātu of the three times.

original: yang dag par 'dzin to; ;bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin to; ;bdag gir byed do //
translated: He holds it, he possesses it, and he makes it his own.

original: de bas na sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na sa 'di yang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this bhūmi is called Cloud of Dharma.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems @214a *//
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems @214a *//
translated: “O jinaputras!

original: dpa' ni rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs kyis snying brtse ba dang / snying rje chen po'i sprin chos kyi snang ba chen po rab tu sgrog pa'i 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog pa mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i glog rnam par 'gyur ba 'od zer chen po'i rlung gis shin tu bskyod pa /
analyzed: dpa' ni rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang shugs kyis snying brtse ba dang / snying rje chen po'i sprin chos kyi snang ba chen po rab tu sgrog pa'i 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog pa mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i glog rnam par 'gyur ba 'od zer chen po'i rlung gis shin tu bskyod pa /
translated: “Furthermore, the bodhisattva who is on the bodhisattva bhūmi Cloud of Dharma, through the power and strength of his own prayers, with a cloud of great love and compassion that is accompanied by the great light of Dharma, with the great thunder of the sound of the Dharma, with the lightning of higher knowledge, awareness, and fearlessness, and with the great wind of light rays,

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sprin gyi dra ba stug pos kun nas khebs pa /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sprin gyi dra ba stug pos kun nas khebs pa /
translated: he is covered by the thick net of the cloud of merit and wisdom.

original: lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi glog yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi glog yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He manifested clouds of various bodies like lightning

original: chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu sgrog pa bdud kyi 'khor thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa yongs su bslang ste /
analyzed: chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu sgrog pa bdud kyi 'khor thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa yongs su bslang ste /
translated: and made a great sound of Dharma to completely destroy the retinue of Māra.

original: skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang; de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i 'jig🔽rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang; de dag pas kyang ches mang zhing tshad med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: In an instant, a short moment, a brief second, he filled as many worlds as there are atoms in the ten directions of the previous worlds, and even more, with countless quintillions of worlds.

original: dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen pos bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa las langs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen pos bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa las langs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do //
translated: He filled them and with a great rain of the nectar of virtue, he completely pacified the flames of the dust of the afflictions that arise from ignorance in the minds of sentient beings, in accordance with their thoughts.

original: de bas na sa 'di'ang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na sa 'di'ang chos kyi sprin ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this ground is called Cloud of Dharma.

original: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye; rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: Furthermore, the Bodhisattva who is on the Bodhisattva ground Cloud of Dharma

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na @214b bzhugs pa nas bzung ste /🔽'pho ba dang / yum gyi skur bzhud pa dang / sku na bzhugs pa dang / tshe dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na @214b bzhugs pa nas bzung ste / 'pho ba dang / yum gyi skur bzhud pa dang / sku na bzhugs pa dang / tshe dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /
translated: can, in a single world system, from the time he is dwelling in the Tuṣita heaven🔽until he demonstrates great parinirvāṇa, bless all the activities of the Tathāgata in accordance with the inclinations and dispositions of sentient beings.🔽He can bless the descent into the womb, the birth, the life, the renunciation, the attainment of manifest, complete enlightenment, the entreaty to turn the wheel of Dharma,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul dang / 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul dang / 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: and the demonstration of great parinirvāṇa.

original: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa'i bar dag tu yang🔽dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis nas 'jig rten gyi khams snga ma de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag pas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa'i bar dag tu yang dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas bzung ste /
translated: In the same way, in two world systems, up to in world systems as numerous as the atoms in two inexpressibly, indescribably many buddha-fields, he blessed all the deeds of the Tathagata, in accordance with the inclinations and dispositions of beings, from his dwelling in the Tusita heaven,

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul dang / 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i bar du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul dang / 'dul ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las thams cad byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: up to his great parinirvana.

original: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po thob pas /🔽'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa yangs par byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: de de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po thob pas / 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa yangs par byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: Endowed with such knowledge, having attained the great superknowledges of discernment,🔽if he wishes, he can make a small world system vast,

original: yangs pa yang dog par byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: yangs pa yang dog par byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: and a vast world system small.

original: 'dod na kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: 'dod na kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: If he wishes, he can bless the completely afflicted to be completely purified.

original: rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyis rlob bo //🔽de bzhin du rgya chen po dang / @215a *//
analyzed: rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyis rlob bo // de bzhin du rgya chen po dang / @215a *//
translated: He can bless the completely purified to be completely afflicted.🔽In the same way, he can bless all world systems, vast and extremely vast,🔽immeasurable and subtle, of great extent, inverted, and upside-down,

original: shin tu yangs pa dang / tshad med pa dang / phra ba dang / tha gru chen po dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / gzhi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas mngon par bsgrub pa de dang der byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: shin tu yangs pa dang / tshad med pa dang / phra ba dang / tha gru chen po dang / snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / gzhi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas mngon par bsgrub pa de dang der byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: to be accomplished by the supernormal power of the best of the best.

original: de 'dod na rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig kyang byin gyis rlob ste /
analyzed: de 'dod na rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig kyang byin gyis rlob ste /
translated: If he wishes, he can bless a single atom to be a world system with a surrounding mountain range, complete in all respects.

original: rdul shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la /
analyzed: rdul shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la /
translated: And that atom does not increase.

original: bya ba de dag kyang yongs su rton to //
analyzed: bya ba de dag kyang yongs su rton to //
translated: And those actions are accomplished.

original: rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du thams cad kyang khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan par byin gyis rlob ste /
analyzed: rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar du thams cad kyang khor yug gi 'obs dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad dang ldan par byin gyis rlob ste /
translated: He can bless a single atom to contain two world systems, three, four, five, up to an inexpressible number of world systems, each with their iron mountain ranges and all their characteristics.

original: rdul shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la /
analyzed: rdul shin tu phra ba de yang mi 'phel la /
translated: And that atom does not increase in size.

original: bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to //
analyzed: bya ba de dag kyang yongs su ston to //
translated: And he can display all those activities.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi rgyan yongs su ston to //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis kyi rgyan yongs su ston to //
translated: If he wishes, he can display the adornments of two world systems in one world system.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rgyan yongs su ston to //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rgyan yongs su ston to //
translated: If he wishes, he can display the adornments of up to inexpressibly many world systems in one world system.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis su yongs su ston to //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis su yongs su ston to //
translated: If he wishes, he can display the adornments of one world system in two world systems.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag tu yang yongs su ston to //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag tu yang yongs su ston to //
translated: If he wishes, he can display the adornments of one world system in up to inexpressibly many world systems.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams @215b brjod du med pa dag na /
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams @215b brjod du med pa dag na /
translated: If one wishes, one can shake inexpressibly🔽many world systems.

original: sems can gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sdud de /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sdud de /
translated: If he wishes, he can gather all the sentient beings of as many world systems as there are atoms in the inexpressibly numerous, extremely inexpressibly numerous world systems into a single world system.

original: sems can de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na /
analyzed: sems can de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro // 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na /
translated: And he does so without harming those sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sdud de /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par sdud de /
translated: If he wishes, he can gather all the sentient beings of a single world system into as many world systems as there are atoms in the inexpressibly numerous, extremely inexpressibly numerous world systems.

original: sems can de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //🔽'dod na skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig ston to //🔽'dod na sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i bar du ston to //
analyzed: sems can de dag la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro // 'dod na skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa gcig ston to // 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa brjod du med pa'i bar du ston to //
translated: And he does so without harming those sentient beings.🔽If he wishes, he can display a single buddha field adorned with all the adornments of a buddha field in a single hair.🔽If he wishes, he can display as many buddha fields as there are atoms in inexpressibly numerous, extremely inexpressibly numerous buddha fields, adorned with all the adornments of a buddha field.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag na /
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa dag na /
translated: If he wishes, he can display a single buddha field adorned with all the adornments of a buddha field in as many buddha fields as there are atoms in inexpressibly numerous, extremely inexpressibly numerous buddha fields.

original: rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lus skad cig yud tsam thar cig tu shin tu sprul pa byed do //
analyzed: rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lus skad cig yud tsam thar cig tu shin tu sprul pa byed do //
translated: In one instant, a short moment, a small fraction of time, they can emanate bodies as numerous as the most subtle particles in all buddhafields.

original: lus re re la yang de snyed kyi lag pa yongs su ston to //
analyzed: lus re re la yang de snyed kyi lag pa yongs su ston to //
translated: In a single instant, he emanates bodies as numerous as the atoms in all the buddha-fields, and in each body he manifests as many hands.

original: lag pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed de /
analyzed: lag pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcur sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed de /
translated: And with all those hands he worships the Buddhas of the ten directions.

original: lag pa re res kyang me tog gi phung po chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par 'thor ro //
analyzed: lag pa re res kyang me tog gi phung po chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par 'thor ro //
translated: With each hand he scatters as many flower-offerings as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River.

original: me tog ji lta ba bzhin du spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
analyzed: me tog ji lta ba bzhin du spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyang yongs su 'bul lo //
translated: And as with flowers, so also with incense, perfumes, garlands, unguents, aromatic powders, cloths, parasols, banners, and flags.

original: lus re re la yang de snyed kyi mgo byin gyis rlob @216a *//🔽cing; mgo re re la yang de snyed kyi lce byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: lus re re la yang de snyed kyi mgo byin gyis rlob @216a *//🔽cing; mgo re re la yang de snyed kyi lce byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: And in each body he manifests as many heads,🔽and in each head as many tongues as there are atoms in all the buddha-fields.

original: de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan shin tu rjod pa byed do; ;sems bskyed pa re re la yang phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par 'gro ste /
analyzed: de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan shin tu rjod pa byed do; ;sems bskyed pa re re la yang phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par 'gro ste /
translated: With each production of the thought, they pervade the ten directions.

original: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa tshad med pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa tshad med pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyi bar du byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: By merely producing the thought, they bless the infinite perfect awakenings, up to the adornments of the great transcendence of suffering.

original: dus gsum gyi lus tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlob ste /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi lus tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlob ste /
translated: They bless infinite bodies in the three times.

original: rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan tshad med pa byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: rang gi lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan tshad med pa byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: In their own bodies, they bless the infinite qualities and ornaments of the buddha-fields of the infinite Blessed Buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang / 'du ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus la byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang / 'du ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus la byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: They bless in their own bodies all the destructions and formations of world-realms.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas gtong ste /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas gtong ste /
translated: They send forth all the wind-circles from a single pore.

original: sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi byed do //
translated: And they do not harm sentient beings.

original: 'dod na chu'i phung po yan chad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: 'dod na chu'i phung po yan chad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: If they wish, they can bless a world system up to the peak of existence with water.

original: der yang pad mo chen po byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: der yang pad mo chen po byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: And they can bless a great lotus there.

original: pad mo chen po de'i 'od rnam par phye bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa rgyas par gang bar byed de /
analyzed: pad mo chen po de'i 'od rnam par phye bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa rgyas par gang bar byed de /
